They remember their eons of servitude and, compared to their mysterious masters, humans, elves, dwarves and other intelligent beings are mere specks which crawl upon the surface of the world, indistinguishable from animals. When a shoggoth rolls its immense, hideous body over a band of explorers, engulfing them in a gelatinous press of flesh and gnawing teeth, it is not so much evil as uncaring.

Shoggoths can become the object of worship for humanoid cults dedicated to chaos and entropy. The shoggoth does not respond to this worship, but it can be counted on to consume any hapless victim the cult can capture and sacrifice to it. Rumors of shoggoths that have developed even greater intellects are, one would hope, just that, for the damage a shoggoth capable of reasoning could wreak upon a world is unsettling to say the least.

6Y0H1qKcOuLLE2PK.name: Maddening Cacophony
6Y0H1qKcOuLLE2PK.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A shoggoth constantly voices syllables and mutterings that mortals were not meant to hear. A creature entering the aura or starting its turn in the aura must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:38] save or become confused for 1 round ([[/br 2d4 #rounds]]{2d4轮} on a critical failure). A creature that successfully saves is temporarily immune for 24 hours.

HknPH5MLDixmpO4o.name: 紧勒 Constrict
HknPH5MLDixmpO4o.description:
[[/r {2d10+15}[bludgeoning]]]{2d10+15钝击}, @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40|basic:true]

Note: A DC was not provided for this ability by Paizo. The DC present here is a moderate DC for the creature level according to the Gamemastery Guide creature building Tables.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Constrict]

avV91CD5YGdSAFSf.name: Eat Away
avV91CD5YGdSAFSf.description: A creature that begins its turn inside the shoggoth takes [[/r {9d6}[acid]]]{9d6酸液伤害}.

Shuln.name: 地鼠怪 Shuln
Shuln.senses: scent 30 feet, 震颤感知(模糊感官)60尺
Shuln.publicNotes:
Scourges of the upper Darklands, these enormous, mole-like monstrosities slice and burrow through solid stone with massive forearms and adamantine-strong claws. Shulns grow to about 20 feet long and have four tiny, nearly imperceptible eyes; a long, pale snout; four thick-muscled legs that end in long, serrated claws; and a stubby pink tail. As a young shuln matures, its unique metabolism produces adamantine that becomes infused throughout its skeletal system. In addition to making their claws and fangs nearly unbreakable, this unique physiological trait makes shulns unparalleled burrowers and highly sought by monster hunters who hope to harvest the precious material from their corpses.

Shulns have a ravenous appetite and eat nearly anything they can catch, but their preferred diet consists almost entirely of large invertebrates, especially cave worms. They rely on tiny sensory whiskers that cover their snoutfland allow them to detect subtle movements in the air and ground without the use of vision. When it detects suitable prey, a shuln bites the target at the first opportunity, injecting it with a potent paralytic toxin present in its saliva. So strong is this poison that it is capable of subduing even the near-unstoppable purple worm, making the shuln a valuable companion to have for anyone making excursions into worm-infested regions of the Darklands. Shulns' notoriously ill-tempered dispositions and their knack for digging into areas of an underground settlement where digging ought not occur makes them frustrating creatures to keep around, but when the alternative is an unpredictable but deadly visit from an enormous, hungry cave worm, the annoyances are well worth the trouble.

Encounters with much larger shuln-like entities on the Plane of Earth suggest that these creatures may have originated from that place. The larger shulns still retain their elemental qualities, are quite a bit smarter, and have their own suite of earth-themed innate primal spells-but for all that, they still love the taste of cave worm.

uuMoWLbelNwKPIUM.name: Armor-Rending
uuMoWLbelNwKPIUM.description: Any time the shuln scores a critical hit with a melee Strike, it also deals the same amount of damage to the target's armor, bypassing any Hardness lower than 10, like adamantine.

2V1LMw2K5gNCyFjF.name: Shuln Saliva
2V1LMw2K5gNCyFjF.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6毒素伤害}, and slowed 1 (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {4d6}[poison]]]{4d6毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for [[/br 2d6 #Paralysis Duration]]{2d6 hours}. Shuln saliva overcomes the inexorable ability.

gzVcZTMtslepZxcC.name: Unstoppable Burrow
gzVcZTMtslepZxcC.description: Shulns can burrow into solid rock and any metal with a hardness less than that of adamantine like it is soil or loose rubble, leaving a tunnel 10 feet in diameter.

Shaitan.name: 土巨灵 Shaitan
Shaitan.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)60 feet; detect magic
Shaitan.publicNotes:
Hailing from the Plane of Earth, shaitans are proud and brazen genies. They value physical skill and love bargaining, games of chance, and working with metal and stone. Immense gemstones and veins of precious metal crisscross their home plane, and the industrious shaitans have built a vast mercantile empire from these abundant natural resources.

每个元素位面对对应一种独特的巨灵，巨灵的身体是由与它们的原生位面（native plane）相对应的元素物质组成的：风巨灵由风、云和风暴组成；火巨灵的身体则由火组成；水巨灵由水构成；而土巨灵则由金属、宝石和石头组成。最后，小巨灵是由全部四种元素组成的，并且也是巨灵中最弱的。

vgW6UmniZ0N09eeE.name: 奥术内在法术 Arcane Innate Spells

BHo40spxmEC4gZmk.name: 异界传送(只能前往星界、元素位面、主物质位面) Plane Shift (to Astral Plane, Elemental Planes, or Material Plane Only)
BHo40spxmEC4gZmk.description: 你和你的盟友穿过位面之间的屏障。目标移动到另一个位面，例如火焰位面（Plane of Fire），阴影位面（Shadow Plane），或者深渊（Abyss）。你必须对目的地位面有所了解，并且使用该位面的材料制作的魔法共鸣音叉作为该法术的器材。多数主要位面的共鸣音叉，如同异界传送法术本身一样，罕贵度为罕见。鲜为人知的位面和半位面的共鸣音叉通常罕贵度为稀有。该法术非常不精确，你会在某个目标（由你选择）上次到达该位面时所在的位置相距1d20×25英里的位置出现。如果对所有目标而言均是第一次旅行到特定位面，你会在位面上的一个随机位置出现。异界传送 不会提供返程的方法，但是通过再次施放异界传送令你能回到你之前所在的位面，除非有什么另外情况。

IsERU8I2n8sZhbmW.name: 塑石术(随意施法) Shape Stone (At Will)
IsERU8I2n8sZhbmW.description:
你将目标石块变成你选择的粗糙形状。该塑形过程十分粗糙，无法制造复杂的组件，细致的细节，可动部分，或者其他类似的东西。当你塑形一个石头时，站在其上的生物必须尝试一次反射豁免或者特技（Acrobatics）检定。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标在石头上 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} 。

大失败 该生物从石头上摔落（如可能）并且倒地着地。

0exgyYYie8t1Xsi7.name: 隐匿之纱(仅限自身) Veil (Self Only)
0exgyYYie8t1Xsi7.description:
你将目标伪装为另一个身形相似身高相仿体重相近的生物。该伪装能够隐藏目标的身份，或者令其如同其他族裔，但这不足以令其扮作另一个特定个人。该法术不会改变声音，气味，或者仪态。你为每个目标分别选择伪装；例如，你可以令一个目标看起来是矮人，另一个看起来是精灵。施放隐匿之纱视为假扮（Impersonate）动作的设立伪装。这令目标忽视任何可能会从扮作不熟悉生物中获得的减值，并且会赋予其在避免他人看破你的伪装的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训你也加上其等级。你可以解消任一或者所有这些伪装。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术也会伪装目标的声音和气味；并获得听觉特征。

升阶 (7环级) 该目标外观上可以是任何相同体型的生物，甚至是特定个人。你必须曾见过特定个人，才能重现其外观。该法术也会伪装目标的声音和气味；并获得听觉特征。

Ua4Khu52dxBq42sM.name: 侦测魔法(恒定法术) Detect Magic (Constant)
Ua4Khu52dxBq42sM.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

ztr88bB5WvLP8Ykt.name: Earth Glide
ztr88bB5WvLP8Ykt.description: The shaitan can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.H6v1VgowHaKHnVlG]{Burrow} through dirt and stone at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

d8HnQHeqQlzrKyFt.name: Shove into Stone
d8HnQHeqQlzrKyFt.description: When the shaitan Pushes a creature into a stone barrier, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:22] save or become merged with the barrier (as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vh1RpbWfqdNC4L3P]{Meld into Stone}). The victim can attempt to Escape (DC 28).

Skeletal Champion.name: 骷髅勇士 Skeletal Champion
Skeletal Champion.publicNotes:
These skeletons retain the cunning they possessed in life.

Made from bones held together by foul necromancy, skeletons are among the most common types of undead, found haunting old dungeons and forgotten cemeteries.

6ROvbbPgi1hsjjkb.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

Skeletal Giant.name: 骷髅巨人 Skeletal Giant
Skeletal Giant.publicNotes:
The reanimated bones of giants make excellent necromantic thralls.

Made from bones held together by foul necromancy, skeletons are among the most common types of undead, found haunting old dungeons and forgotten cemeteries.

4gkC6A8D27Jzv7nH.name: Broad Swipe
4gkC6A8D27Jzv7nH.description: The giant makes two Strikes with its glaive against two adjacent foes, both of whom are within its reach. The multiple attack penalty does not increase until after both attacks are resolved.

emPcqeSFXdyr6CgV.name: Terrifying Charge
emPcqeSFXdyr6CgV.description:
The giant Strides and makes a horns Strike with a +4 circumstance bonus to damage.

If the strike hits, the giant attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} the target.

Skeletal Horse.name: 骷髅马 Skeletal Horse
Skeletal Horse.publicNotes:
Skeletal horses are sometimes used as mounts by other undead or monsters.

Made from bones held together by foul necromancy, skeletons are among the most common types of undead, found haunting old dungeons and forgotten cemeteries.

ohwAZH20CeE3uGMp.name: Gallop
ohwAZH20CeE3uGMp.description: The horse Strides twice, with its Speed increased by 10 feet.

1AzFNDZFiaJxTAJf.name: Undead Steed
1AzFNDZFiaJxTAJf.description: Undead and creatures allied with them can @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.q9nbyIF0PEBqMtYe]{命令术 Command} a skeletal steed without needing to attempt a skill check.

Skeletal Hulk.name: 骷髅巨怪 Skeletal Hulk
Skeletal Hulk.publicNotes:
Huge giants and other enormous creatures make powerful skeletons.

Made from bones held together by foul necromancy, skeletons are among the most common types of undead, found haunting old dungeons and forgotten cemeteries.

Y1v59ZBvVAomH20U.name: Broad Swipe
Y1v59ZBvVAomH20U.description: The giant makes two Strikes with its claw against two adjacent foes, both of whom are within its reach. The multiple attack penalty does not increase until after both attacks are resolved.

TGIpZcekBlTtMIW2.name: Massive Rush
TGIpZcekBlTtMIW2.description: The hulk Strides and makes a claw Strike with a +4 circumstance bonus to damage. If the strike hits, the hulk automatically @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.7blmbDrQFNfdT731]{Shoves} the target 10 feet.

Skulltaker.name: 猎骨者 Skulltaker
Skulltaker.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. positive
Skulltaker.publicNotes: Swirling down from misty peaks and through howling mountain passes like an evil wind, the vortex of bones known as a skulltaker is a terrible manifestation of the delirium and agony experienced by doomed climbers and lost trailblazers just before they met their end. In some places, a skulltaker is also known as a saxra.

Msmv4qRjU8FEJbcm.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

jj8vv07lGAp4FELU.name: Skeletal Lore
jj8vv07lGAp4FELU.description: A skulltaker taps into the memories of the creatures whose bones make up its body. This gives it the Skeletal Lore skill, which it can use to Recall Knowledge of any kind. In addition, it can speak and understand all the languages known by the creatures whose bones make up its body (typically including Common and the regional language of the skulltakerʼs home region). The skulltaker can use Skeletal Lore as the primary skill check for the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.hp6Q64dl7xbdn4gQ]{Legend Lore} ritual, and it can cast legend lore without secondary casters.

AMOJU0wX8r6flwf4.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Positive

i9LmbR4DKZeW0lRN.name: Shard Storm
i9LmbR4DKZeW0lRN.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A cloud of bone shards surrounds the skulltaker. When a creature moves into the emanation or begins its turn there, shard storm attempts to counteract any @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward} effect on the creature ([[/r 1d20+30 #Counteract]]{+30 counteract modifier}) and then deals [[/r {4d6}[slashing]+{4d6}[negative]]]{4d6 slashing damage and 4d6负能量伤害} to the creature, with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:40|basic:true] save.

o6Y376tDDVyc2Cf8.name: Bonetaker
o6Y376tDDVyc2Cf8.description: Whenever a creature dies within 60 feet of a skulltaker, the skulltaker draws a portion of the creature's bones into its shard storm. The creature must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:40] save or rise as a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.RMSx2C27yty0MTva]{Skeletal Champion} in [[/br 1d4 #Skeletal Champion Transformation]]{1d4轮}. These skeletal champions are controlled by the skulltaker.

JOlynEzl2UrSa16n.name: Energy Drain
JOlynEzl2UrSa16n.description: When a skulltaker hits with a melee Strike, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed 1}.

1QVkgQh59Pmq5fP3.name: Splintered Ground
1QVkgQh59Pmq5fP3.description:
The skulltaker causes splintered bones to erupt from all solid surfaces in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:100], except for surfaces of worked stone. A creature moving through the bones takes [[/r {10}[piercing]+{10}[negative]]]{10 piercing damage and 10负能量伤害} for every 5 feet of movement. The first time each round a creature takes piercing damage from these splintered bones, it must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:40] save or take a -10-foot circumstance penalty to all Speeds for 10 minutes, or a -15-foot circumstance penalty for 24 hours on a critical failure. The bones remain in place until the skulltaker uses this action again or the bones are manually removed, which takes 10 minutes for each 5-foot square.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.86uYNsVXzYWxqLTV]{效果: Splintered Ground}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.hc7kR6quUE9ryRyj]{效果: Splintered Ground (Critical Failure)}

Skeleton Guard.name: 骷髅守卫 Skeleton Guard
Skeleton Guard.publicNotes:
The most common skeletal minions are mere guardians.

Made from bones held together by foul necromancy, skeletons are among the most common types of undead, found haunting old dungeons and forgotten cemeteries.

Skum.name: 鱼化人 Skum
Skum.publicNotes:
The most numerous of the alghollthus are the ulat-kinis, a servitor race created from human stock to serve as rank-and-file soldiers in alghollthu armies. At the zenith of alghollthu power, ulat-kinis formed massive legions and enjoyed significant power over other species. When the alghollthus retreated from the world, they abandoned teeming hordes of ulatkinis. Although these erstwhile soldiers tried to continue their conquering ways, their numbers declined rapidly in battlefield defeats and purposeful exterminations enacted by their enemies. Ulat-kini society degenerated, so that now only a few enclaves exist in the depths of the earth or along isolated coastlines. Few remember their own species' name, instead using the epithet their foes gave them: "skum."

在过去的几千年里，水生怪物阿尔古苏使用它们的神秘力量征服并统治了全世界大部分地区。它们的帝国里有无数被当做牲畜的奴隶。阿尔古苏们利用精神控制和肉体塑造的魔法创造了这些奴隶和忠于它们的其他族群。从无面潜伏者到拟形怪（mimics）都能溯源出被阿尔古苏影响的痕迹。阿尔古苏的统治者们，即所谓的“幕后尊主”，不断通过改造被控制的族群的形态来进一步塑造自身的社会。无论是位高权重的权贵亦或愁云惨雾的贫民，这些幕后尊主按照它们自己的黑暗计划操纵着这些社会，并以奴役、杀戮、以及恐怖的改造来对付那些发现自己计划或试图奋起反抗的人们。

随着时间的推移，阿尔古苏对它们昔日奴隶的崛起感到失望，并试图抹去过去犯下的错误——既能让一切回归原点，又能惩罚那些任性而背叛的种族。因此它们用不可思议的魔法力量发动了一场灾难，希望摧毁那些过去被它们操纵但是如今背叛了它们的社区。然而，它们错误地估计了信仰的力量以及自己曾经的爪牙和奴隶们的生存意志，最终整个世界恢复了元气，再次变得强大起来——这一次不再有阿尔古苏在背后影响它们了。

如今，阿尔古苏已经从它们曾经操纵过的地表世界中大规模地撤退，并且它们中的大部分只在深海区域活动，在那里它们依然是无可动摇的统治者。然而它们并没有完全放弃它们的阴谋，像无面潜伏者这样的奴隶种族重新出现在世界上就证明了这种可怕的可能性——阿尔古苏们那仇视的目光已经再次盯上了地表世界。

Slurk.name: 泥蛙 Slurk
Slurk.allSaves: +2 to all saves vs. grapple or shove
Slurk.publicNotes:
The slurk is a sticky, tusked frog-beast found in underground lairs and caves. It has two massive tusks, which it uses to gore prey and tangle with rival slurks. With the slurk's natural ability to climb walls and cling effortlessly to ceilings, it can be easy for unwary cave explorers to end up on the wrong end of the beast's formidable ivory tusks.

Slurks exude two very different types of foul-smelling secretions from their pale white skin. Large pustules on the slurk's back drip a sticky resin-like slime that quickly hardens upon exposure to air. By flexing its skin, the slurk can burst these pustules in the direction of intruders, covering its foes in sticky goo and severely limiting their ability to withstand the monster's other attacks, including the effects of its other secretion. Glands along the slurk's ventral side excrete an incredibly slippery and fetid grease, which protects the slurk from the immobilizing effects of its own back slime but also has the added benefit of making it extremely difficult to grapple and capture. The best way to discover if a slurk is in the vicinity is to look for hard clumps of such grease, which accumulate and dry in cave corners and amid rock piles where the slurk rests between meals.

Slurks are thought to be descendants of a failed dwarven attempt to domesticate and breed large subterranean frogs as food and labor animals. Despite this apparent failure, slurks are often befriended by others who live underground. The sticky frog-beasts have proven extremely desirable to kobolds, who now domesticate and train slurks as powerful mounts and guardians. While other creatures, particularly boggards, sometimes train slurks to serve as guardians, kobolds remain those who use these creatures the most. A kobold mounted on a slurk will often hide in the upper ledges of a cave, using the advantages of height and surprise to harry foes with ranged attacks. Kobold riders also take advantage of the slurk's ability to climb, and charge at their enemies from the walls of a cavern.

uLf1dk5gMycZYjBy.name: +2 to All Saves vs. Grapple or Shove

pbydRoHQnSpw50iV.name: Belly Grease
pbydRoHQnSpw50iV.description: The slurk extrudes a slippery grease from its ventral glands to coat the floor under it and in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5], turning the affected area into uneven ground for 10 minutes, after which it dries to a putrid crust. The DC to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.M76ycLAqHoAgbcej]{Balance} across the slime is @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:18|traits:action:balance,move].

Tf3oOPGPRrko1wvW.name: Entangling Slime
Tf3oOPGPRrko1wvW.description:
A creature struck by a slurk's slime squirt becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy} and takes a -5-foot penalty to Speed for 1 hour or until the slime is removed.

The slime can be removed with a total of three Interact actions by the entangled creature or creatures adjacent to the creature. These actions don't need to be consecutive or made by the same creature.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.jQmfZcPD6xVYx5nb]{效果: Entangling Slime}

Slothspawn.name: 懒惰罪生怪 Slothspawn
Slothspawn.senses: 黑暗视觉, 嗅探懒惰原罪(模糊感官) 30尺
Slothspawn.allSaves: 对抗魔法时所有豁免获得+1状态加值, 对抗心灵时获得+4状态加值
Slothspawn.publicNotes:
罪生怪是由被共称为符文领主（runelords）的七名古代巫师中的一位所创造的——他们每人接纳并呈现出七原罪中的一罪。第一名罪生怪由愤怒符文领主所创造，这源于他对影响并扭曲肉体的技术实践。这种技术在用于创造罪生怪不久之后便落入了其他符文领主手中，之后他们每人都尝试根据自己的设计创造变种，时至今日愤怒罪生怪仍旧是同类中数量最多也最知名的存在。罪生怪与肉体被重塑的类人原型之间只有极为模糊的相似之处，他们通常看起来骨瘦嶙峋，长着不自然地修长手臂和反关节的腿部，每根肢体末端都长着短粗的爪状指头。凸起的血管遍及罪生怪全身，血红色的凸起仿佛构成了扭曲的符文，其皮肤苍白无毛。他们的头部被拉长，五官只剩下鼻子、红色的双眼、以及从下巴处裂开成两瓣的下颚，其中露出长长的下垂舌头，舌头尖端分成了三根宛若手指的触须。罪生怪站起来有6.5尺，体重与同体型的人类相仿。罪生怪的行为模式与和其相关联的原罪有关，他们的体貌特征也会对此有所暗示。举例说明，贪婪罪生怪的血管里流淌的是金色的液体，而嫉妒罪生怪比其他类型的罪生怪更加瘦弱。

厚重且卷曲的额外皮肤耷拉在他那驼背的身躯上。

hk7qH9BpvzM7rFGe.name: 嗅探原罪(模糊感官) 30尺
hk7qH9BpvzM7rFGe.description: 罪生怪能通过嗅觉闻到生物所反映出的原罪，此能力在其他方面同灵敏嗅觉（scent）。由GM判断哪些生物与哪些原罪相符。

Y2DYcAAQLTtolq5o.name: 对抗心灵时获得+4状态加值

Fb73mys1NUmxKq5Q.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

MpNlJrdPvv9bECNE.name: 原罪之噬 Sinful Bite
MpNlJrdPvv9bECNE.description:
被罪生怪的啃咬命中的生物必须尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:18]豁免，因为他们的心智被充满罪孽的思维所侵袭。

大成功 不受影响

成功 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}

失败 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}

大失败 恶心2，速度会受到-10尺的状态减值，持续一分钟

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.9Qyu0HN5j6DO8Izc]{效果: 原罪之噬}

Smilodon.name: 剑齿虎 Smilodon
Smilodon.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60尺
Smilodon.publicNotes:
Smilodons are large saber-toothed cats, apex predators that are significantly more muscular and broader than the other species of big cats. They often kill prey with a quick stab to the throat or other vulnerable spot. The smilodon's oversized fangs are particularly sought after as trophies.

自然界中很少有掠食者能与猫的潜行能力相匹敌。

ONo2JspAa1GnoAlR.name: Pierce Armor
ONo2JspAa1GnoAlR.description:
The smilodon makes a fangs Strike against a creature it is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbing}.

If the attack hits, the creature is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}; if the creature is wearing armor with hardness 10 or lower, the armor is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6dNUvdb1dhToNDj3]{Broken}.

If this Strike breaks a creature's armor or damages a creature who is unarmored or wearing broken armor, the creature also takes @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success]. This Strike doesn't further damage armor that's already broken.

QtiX9tEriHb92lTU.name: Pounce
QtiX9tEriHb92lTU.description: The smilodon Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the smilodon began this action @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

WBvBXluaSwwxLaJ4.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
WBvBXluaSwwxLaJ4.description:
The smilodon deals 1d6 extra precision damage to creatures that are flat-footed.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Snapping Flytrap.name: 猛咬捕蝇草 Snapping Flytrap
Snapping Flytrap.publicNotes:
The snapping flytrap is a ravenous, carnivorous plant that is quick to bite at any creature that passes by. Snapping flytraps typically have two sets of tooth-edged leaves, each measuring 3 feet wide, at the end of 10-foot-long stalks.

捕蝇草是危险的生物，它们能像捕食巨大的昆虫一样捕食类人生物和其他大型猎物。

gXUEOhZBMg1NCOMw.name: 快速捕获 Quick Capture
gXUEOhZBMg1NCOMw.description:
触发 一个生物命中或触碰捕蝇草

效果 捕蝇草对触发此能力的生物进行一次叶荚打击，如果命中，则该生物被叶荚@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}。

QTipkgJAwLBZFcwu.name: 集中攻击 Focused Assault
QTipkgJAwLBZFcwu.description: The flytrap attacks a single target with both its leaves. 捕蝇草进行一次叶荚打击。一旦成功命中，捕蝇草造成一次叶荚打击的伤害，并且除了第一对叶荚外，每多一个叶荚就能造成额外[[/r {1d8}]]{1d8伤害}。即使攻击失败，捕蝇草仍然能造成一次叶荚伤害，但是它不能使用精通攫抓能力。大失败则完全失手。此能力计算捕蝇草的多重攻击减值，次数等于捕蝇草的叶荚数。

oB9Lh7ZFScaG3Z04.name: 饥饿猛击 Hungry Flurry
oB9Lh7ZFScaG3Z04.description: The flytrap makes two捕蝇草针对不同目标以-2减值进行两次叶荚打击。这些攻击计算捕蝇草的多重攻击减值，但是在攻击结束之后才会生效。

0JCakW3iPRouHFU2.name: 活吞 Swallow Whole
0JCakW3iPRouHFU2.description:
Medium, [[/r {1d8+1}[bludgeoning]+{1d6}[acid]]]{1d8+1 bludgeoning damage plus 1d6酸液伤害}, Rupture 5

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SwallowWhole]

Sod Hound.name: 苔犬 Sod Hound
Sod Hound.publicNotes:
Sod hounds are mossy extraplanar canines formed of packed dirt and pebbles.

土元素是洞穴探险者们的优秀保镖，也是重要的地下场所的理想守卫，例如地下室和国库。

hDYxH5VuENin7Q0I.name: Crystal Sense (Imprecise) 60尺
hDYxH5VuENin7Q0I.description: A sod hound can sense crystals or gems within 60 feet as if using the scent ability

59wy5xK7MEQmYRxg.name: Earth Glide
59wy5xK7MEQmYRxg.description: The sod hound can Burrow through any earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, the sod hound moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

Soulbound Doll (Chaotic Evil).name: 缚魂娃娃(混乱邪恶) Soulbound Doll (Chaotic Evil)
Soulbound Doll (Chaotic Evil).languages: One Spoken By Its Creator (Typically Common)
Soulbound Doll (Chaotic Evil).publicNotes:
Soulbound dolls are eerie mannequins or playthings that have been imbued with a small piece of a deceased mortal's soul. These little constructs are created for a variety of reasons-such as to serve as companions or servants-but their free will means their obedience to their creators is hardly a given. Followers of Pharasma generally abhor soulbound dolls, viewing them as a perversion of the natural cycle of souls, and those who worship the Lady of Graves see the destruction of a soulbound doll, regardless of the construct's alignment, as an important service to the Great Beyond. Soulbound dolls are the simplest in a series of soulbound constructs including human-sized soulbound mannequins, powerful soulbound shells, and sentinel soulbound terra-cotta warriors. Creating them from unwilling living creatures is evil, and an unwilling donor can resist the process with a successful Will save against the creator's Craft DC, ruining the doll if not preventing the donor's death. A non-evil doll can only be crafted from the soul of a person who has given consent to such use before their death occurred

Soulbound dolls encountered by adventurers are typically guardians of some sort; despite their diminutive size, the soul fragment's power makes the doll's flst more dangerous than a casual observer would expect. Further, it grants the doll a single spell of outsized power given its stature. Because of their autonomy and remarkable intelligence, soulbound dolls are occasionally employed by their crafters as administrators over much more powerful but mindless constructs such as golems, allowing such dolls to control defenses far beyond their own capabilities. Though soulbound dolls contain a small fragment of a soul extracted during or shortly after a person's death, this doesn't affect the deceased's resurrection or progress to the afterlife. This extraction process is lethal to otherwise-living prospective soul donors, though there are rumors of more expensive processes that allows someone to donate a fragment of a living soul without repercussions.

The soul fragment resides in a soul focus gem typically embedded in the doll's neck or chest. The soul fragment isn't static, and the doll continues to learn from its initial state, meaning its personality and abilities can change, possibly growing closer to the donor's or moving farther afield on its own individual path. The soulbound doll's focus gem retains the doll's memories even after the doll's destruction. The the intact soul focus gem of a destroyed doll can even be placed into a new doll body by someone knowledgeable in the creation of soulbound creatures, effectively reconstituting the soulbound doll.

AAFWcmRlGxb76Pps.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

iaTfEZ50lrTlV5Ku.name: Personality Fragments
iaTfEZ50lrTlV5Ku.description: A soulbound doll shares fragments of its donor soul's personality, though none of that creature's memories. This causes a soulbound doll to match the donor soul's alignment and gain the corresponding alignment traits.

Soulbound Doll (Chaotic Good).name: 缚魂娃娃(混乱善良) Soulbound Doll (Chaotic Good)

A non-evil doll can only be crafted from the soul of a person who has given consent to such use before their death occurred

Soulbound dolls encountered by adventurers are typically guardians of some sort; despite their diminutive size, the soul fragment's power makes the doll's flst more dangerous than a casual observer would expect. Further, it grants the doll a single spell of outsized power given its stature. Because of their autonomy and remarkable intelligence, soulbound dolls are occasionally employed by their crafters as administrators over much more powerful but mindless constructs such as golems, allowing such dolls to control defenses far beyond their own capabilities. Though soulbound dolls contain a small fragment of a soul extracted during or shortly after a person's death, this doesn't affect the deceased's resurrection or progress to the afterlife. This extraction process is lethal to otherwise-living prospective soul donors, though there are rumors of more expensive processes that allows someone to donate a fragment of a living soul without repercussions.

The soul fragment resides in a soul focus gem typically embedded in the doll's neck or chest. The soul fragment isn't static, and the doll continues to learn from its initial state, meaning its personality and abilities can change, possibly growing closer to the donor's or moving farther afield on its own individual path. The soulbound doll's focus gem retains the doll's memories even after the doll's destruction. The the intact soul focus gem of a destroyed doll can even be placed into a new doll body by someone knowledgeable in the creation of soulbound creatures, effectively reconstituting the soulbound doll.

Tarn Linnorm.name: 天池蛇龙 Tarn Linnorm
Tarn Linnorm.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Tarn Linnorm.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60 feet; 真视术
Tarn Linnorm.publicNotes:
Although more powerful linnorms exist, the multi-headed tarn linnorm can wreak an awe-inspiring amount of devastation.

古老且巨大的蛇龙生活在世界的北部地区，他们憎恨那些自己认定的劣等生物，并试图尽可能对这些不幸的受害者造成更多的痛苦。尽管这些残暴的蛇形生物不如大多数人想象中的带翼真龙强大，但他们确实拥有难以置信且致命的力量，使其可以与真龙的残暴一较高下。

cIlup2qYJhZmAmRn.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

EuaT5qjP1u5HzIZa.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
EuaT5qjP1u5HzIZa.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

ZNAHsWeRdyO9ciJP.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
ZNAHsWeRdyO9ciJP.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

FTA0YvX69f46caFj.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

YoKSGUjwXmt7kxnq.name: Curse of Death
YoKSGUjwXmt7kxnq.description: When a creature slays a tarn linnorm, it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:46] save or it can no longer recover Hit Points via any means, such as healing spells, the Medicine skill, or natural healing from rest.

8MiIAzmA9gWbpF5s.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
8MiIAzmA9gWbpF5s.description:
The tarn linnorm can expel either a @Template[type:line|distance:120] or a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] of acid dealing [[/r {20d6}[acid]]]{20d6酸液伤害} to creatures within the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:44|basic:true]豁免). The acid creates toxic fumes. At the beginning of the linnorm's next turn, those who failed the breath weapon's Reflex save must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:42] save or gain @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 4} from the poisonous fumes.

A tarn linnorm can't use Breath Weapon or Overwhelming Breath again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Attacks]]{1d4轮}.

TbFZxJr8aSgbgTZ6.name: Double Bite
TbFZxJr8aSgbgTZ6.description: The tarn linnorm Strides and then makes a jaws Strike with each of its heads, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the tarn linnorm's multiple attack penalty, and the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the tarn linnorm makes all of these attacks.

DWRBHDiwImN0PCp9.name: Overwhelming Breath
DWRBHDiwImN0PCp9.description:
A tarn linnorm uses its Breath Weapon twice. A creature attempts only one save and can take damage only once.

The tarn linnorm can't use Breath Weapon or Overwhelming Breath again for [[/br 2d4 #Recharge Breath Attacks]]{2d4轮}.

Bcm7iwcliF6ChhW7.name: Tarn Linnorm Venom
Bcm7iwcliF6ChhW7.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:44]

最大持续时间 10轮

阶段1 [[/r {7d6}[acid]]]{7d6酸液伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}

阶段2 [[/r {11d6}[acid]]]{11d6酸液伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}

Tengu Sneak.name: 天狗潜行者 Tengu Sneak
Tengu Sneak.publicNotes:
Crow-like humanoids, tengus are a canny and clever people who can be found across all of Golarion. Tengus are used to being minorities and facing suspicion wherever they travel, so by necessity many possess a knack for languages as well as for blades. They live on the fringes of society and tend to flock toward less-than-legal occupations, earning them their reputation for being streetwise and unscrupulous-a label that, in turn, perpetuates the tengus' oppressive cycle of discrimination and illegitimate work.

Although humanoid, tengus have very distinct, birdlike features, and many would say that they resemble crows more than they do humans. They have strong, thick beaks, as well as sharp talons at the ends of their arms and legs. Most of a tengu's body is covered in small feathers that range in color from dark brown and midnight blue to glossy black, with lighter colors being rare but not unheard of. Like many avian creatures, tengus have hollow bones, making them much lighter than other humanoids of their size, although few tengus possess the wings necessary to fly naturally. A tengu's speech might be punctuated by quick clucks or throaty cawing, and many tengus practice conversation diligently to rid themselves of these involuntary ticks. Ruffling of the feathers and compulsive, jerky movements of the neck are other trademark habits. Tengus reproduce by laying eggs: the average tengu egg is about 11 inches in diameter and 16 inches tall and takes 4 months to hatch.

Tengus are a people in diaspora and are almost always found within larger kingdoms and communities of other races. Perhaps because they are more visually distinctive than most other humanoid races, tengus tend to be distrusted and persecuted more often than, for example, elves or dwarves. As a result, tengus tend to gather in close-knit social groups composed of other outcasts and people of uncommon ancestry. Few true tengu communities exist, and those that do are often exiled to ghettos and other forgotten city quarters. From an early age, tengus learn that the world is not a friendly place and that they must look out for themselves.

v77PLs3ZMXpMZOWj.name: Go for the Eyes
v77PLs3ZMXpMZOWj.description:
触发 The tengu critically hits with a beak Strike.

效果 The tengu attempts to peck out its victim's eyes. The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17] save.

成功 不受影响.

失败 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for 1 round.

大失败 Blinded until healed to maximum HP.

xgyBlDJ39BUcAINW.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
xgyBlDJ39BUcAINW.description:
The tengu deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

DpI5QZQJMNjqef3w.name: Surprise Attacker
DpI5QZQJMNjqef3w.description: On the first round of combat, creatures that haven't acted yet are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the tengu.

Terotricus.name: 枯萎黏菌 Terotricus
Terotricus.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Terotricus.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)120尺
Terotricus.publicNotes:
The legendary terotricus is a massive slime-mold that hails from the Abyss. Its collective consciousness encapsulates entire regions, spreading as far as its ever-growing cloud of spores will take it. Once it has seeped onto the Material Plane from the Abyssal realm, a terotricus's agenda is to feed on all living creatures, infecting them with its spores, and its presence can spell doom for any in its way.

Terotricuses move by rapidly expanding and contracting their slimy "bodies," which are capable of burrowing through soil, gliding across water, and scrabbling up steep slopes. These behemoths of rot don't need to travel to see their plans come to fruition, though; their spores easily latch onto demons and other denizens of the Abyss, who in turn bring this blight to the Material Plane when the flends are summoned.

When a terotricus infects a creature with its spores, web-like fungal growths start appearing on the victim's skin until they cover the entire body, at which point the victim's mind is also subdued and bent to the terotricus's will. The terotricus's favored victims include animals, elves, and fey, though it is happy to infect any creature it can catch. Cults of Treerazer occasionally attempt to make contact with a terotricus, but such acts almost always simply result in a new sect of spore-blighted slaves.

9YuL1pu4ZHOAaxcZ.name: Spore Cloud
9YuL1pu4ZHOAaxcZ.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A creature entering the aura or starting its turn there is exposed to spore blight.

7O6Ud0aHDjF3hlFD.name: Infest Environs
7O6Ud0aHDjF3hlFD.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 The terotricus is in a swamp or forested area.

效果 The terotricus drains nutrients from nearby trees and undergrowth while simultaneously infesting them with fungal growth. All non-magical plant life (though not plant creatures) within a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] withers and sprouts foul mold and slimy mushrooms, removing any cover and concealment provided by trees and undergrowth. The terotricus is healed [[/r {200}[healing]]]{200生命值}.

fvSVZqV8GEHEzMVu.name: Spore Blight
fvSVZqV8GEHEzMVu.description:
Plants and fungi are immune.

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:40]

阶段1 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1天)

阶段2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled4}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1天)

阶段3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{Controlled} by the terotricus (as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{支配术 Dominate}; [[/br 5d8 #Dureation Controlled]]{5d8天})

阶段4 dead

1Vdy1h0xvUBMB9Mg.name: Sticky Spores
1Vdy1h0xvUBMB9Mg.description:
A creature hit by a terotricus's spores must succeed at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:40] save or take a -10-foot status penalty to all its Speeds for 1 minute. On a critical failure, the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} until it Escapes (DC 40).

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.g4CRjb2zS1pkVDbk]{效果: Sticky Spores}

Tidal Master.publicNotes:
Tidal masters use their power over waves and water to drown their enemies.

水元素可能具有非凡的破坏力，但这往往并非出于本心；就像水可以给主物质位面带来生命一样，它的波浪可以冲击海岸，雨水也能淹没城市。水元素同样如此难以捉摸。

xhqKU8Bdnig3dLJs.name: Water-Bound
xhqKU8Bdnig3dLJs.description: When not touching water, the tidal master is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

WD2TqHcVPCybwkQT.name: 旋涡 Vortex
WD2TqHcVPCybwkQT.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:40]{40尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Water in the area that is in the same body of water as the tidal master is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures that don't have the water trait.

Gfs6EH6FQLkgQKGz.name: Drench
Gfs6EH6FQLkgQKGz.description:
The elemental puts out all fires in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10].

It extinguishes all non-magical fires automatically and attempts to counteract magical fires ([[/r 1d20+20 #Drench]]{+20} counteract modifier).

Y9YG23TX2Se8zYaw.name: Push or Pull 10尺
Y9YG23TX2Se8zYaw.description:
The tidal master can also pull the creature.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Push]

Tiefling Adept.name: 魔裔专家 Tiefling Adept
Tiefling Adept.publicNotes:
Tieflings are planar scions with fiendish blood. One of the most common types is pitborn, who bear a demonic corruption infesting their mortal bloodline. Some strive to live above their forebear's fiendish reputation, but many, such as this tiefling adept, simply accept their label and delve fully into evil.

许多不朽存在居住在伟大彼岸（the Great Beyond）的其他位面。其中一些仁慈且善良，比如天使。其中一些残忍且热爱破坏，比如恶魔。其中一些履行着与道德无关的职责，比如招魂者。而凡人与这些不朽者之间产生情愫也并非闻所未闻的事情，此等结合所诞下的孩子携带着混有超自然元素的血脉，而且会世代留存下去。直系的第一代子嗣之后，此种超凡的影响通常会沉睡于血脉之中，但这种影响也有可能会在后代中强烈地显现出来。这些跨位面血脉的继承者通常会被统称为位面后裔。

FrDW4cm9w2zRRONj.name: 奥术准备法术 Arcane Prepared Spells

99NmF28aoamnNDi6.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

BVTIQtq5eCkc6Rrr.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
BVTIQtq5eCkc6Rrr.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

qjRGAO0ktmv3fxHQ.name: Drain Bonded Item
qjRGAO0ktmv3fxHQ.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 The adept hasn't acted yet on this turn.

效果 The adept expends the power stored in its staff. This gives the adept the ability to cast one prepared spell it had already previously cast today (choosing a different spell level each time), without spending a spell slot. The adept must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements.

Troll.name: 巨魔 Troll
Troll.hp: 再生20 (deactivated by acid or fire)
Troll.publicNotes:
Common trolls are dim-witted, gangly giants who stalk the fringes of civilization. They rely on their incredible strength to overpower foes with their vicious claws and toothy maws. A troll's endless hunger drives it to consume all variety of living creatures, and it is their ravenous eating habits that fuel trolls' legendary regenerative abilities. Trolls stand anywhere from 12 to 16 feet tall, though they prefer to hunch for comfort and to lull foes into a false sense of security.

Slavering, cruel, practically invincible brutes: this is the villager's stock description for the dread monsters known as trolls. But words hardly do justice to trolls' capacity for destruction. They are as bloodthirsty as orcs but lacking the discipline, as massive as giants but capable of regenerating wounded flesh in an instant, and as reprobate as ogres but with twice the strength. The only way to really understand the wanton violence of a troll is to experience it firsthand-a fate few would wish even upon their worst enemies.

The first thing that comes to mind when most think of trolls is the creatures' power of bodily regeneration. So potent is this regeneration that the only way to overcome it is to exploit the troll's vulnerability to acid and fire. It is not enough to slay the troll with caustic or flaming weapons, though-even the smallest scrap of a troll's flesh can regenerate into a full-size troll given enough time. The only sure way to eradicate a troll menace is to burn the monster's entire body until nothing remains.

Trolls are solitary hunters, for their wickedness is anathema even to other giants. They occasionally roam in small gangs of two to four, but only when prey is plentiful or a particularly strong counterforce has broached their hunting grounds. In rare instances, an old and powerful troll comes to lead small tribes of trolls. Such "troll kings" possess enough cunning to lead their hordes in devastating raids and massacres, and their presence permanently alters the surrounding ecosystem. A wide variety of trolls exist, from the terrible monster traditionally associated with the name to the water-dwelling scrag and hybrid flood troll. Regional variations exist as well-mountain trolls among stony peaks, for instance, or moss trolls in swampy bayous-but all share the same trademark regenerative powers and insatiable thirst for blood.

50Meu5uWTOPYtMu6.name: 再生20 (Deactivated by Acid or Fire)

6WolzdmuMWdkmSpl.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

Troll King.name: 巨魔之王 Troll King
Troll King.hp: 再生30 (deactivated by acid or fire)
Troll King.publicNotes:
Some trolls have learned the skills necessary to survive well beyond the typical life expectancy for their kind and rally others to follow their lead. These champions develop a number of talents that make them worthy leaders and potent hunters-namely their abilities to willingly boost the rate of their regeneration and to shake off the acid and fire that would hinder it, not to mention a bestial roar that can send would-be predators scurrying off. Troll kings possess a cunning far beyond their younger kin- they know to keep their allies close, and their enemies even closer. If a troll king so much as suspects that one of its followers is plotting to usurp it, retribution is swift and fatal.

Slavering, cruel, practically invincible brutes: this is the villager's stock description for the dread monsters known as trolls. But words hardly do justice to trolls' capacity for destruction. They are as bloodthirsty as orcs but lacking the discipline, as massive as giants but capable of regenerating wounded flesh in an instant, and as reprobate as ogres but with twice the strength. The only way to really understand the wanton violence of a troll is to experience it firsthand-a fate few would wish even upon their worst enemies.

The first thing that comes to mind when most think of trolls is the creatures' power of bodily regeneration. So potent is this regeneration that the only way to overcome it is to exploit the troll's vulnerability to acid and fire. It is not enough to slay the troll with caustic or flaming weapons, though-even the smallest scrap of a troll's flesh can regenerate into a full-size troll given enough time. The only sure way to eradicate a troll menace is to burn the monster's entire body until nothing remains.

Trolls are solitary hunters, for their wickedness is anathema even to other giants. They occasionally roam in small gangs of two to four, but only when prey is plentiful or a particularly strong counterforce has broached their hunting grounds. In rare instances, an old and powerful troll comes to lead small tribes of trolls. Such "troll kings" possess enough cunning to lead their hordes in devastating raids and massacres, and their presence permanently alters the surrounding ecosystem. A wide variety of trolls exist, from the terrible monster traditionally associated with the name to the water-dwelling scrag and hybrid flood troll. Regional variations exist as well-mountain trolls among stony peaks, for instance, or moss trolls in swampy bayous-but all share the same trademark regenerative powers and insatiable thirst for blood.

M4f06NOUIcSyQNr2.name: 再生30 (Deactivated by Acid or Fire)

g4bJ3hTpL9J2uQKp.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

zDDzvsB3OrJU9QXn.name: Vigorous Shake
zDDzvsB3OrJU9QXn.description:
触发 The troll king takes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续} acid or fire damage.

效果 The troll king shakes itself to remove persistent acid or fire effects. The troll king immediately attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check to end the persistent damage that triggered this reaction. If the troll king succeeds at this check, it can immediately use Primordial Roar as part of this reaction.

czVzxuwWmCRLgnuc.name: Forced Regeneration
czVzxuwWmCRLgnuc.description:
需求 The troll king's regeneration is not currently deactivated.

效果 The troll king regains [[/r {15}[healing]]]{15 HP}.

3wMfK5zZSqFhhTgs.name: Primordial Roar
3wMfK5zZSqFhhTgs.description:
The troll king unleashes a bestial roar. Each non-troll creature within @Template[type:emanation|distance:100]{100尺} must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:29] save. The creature is then temporarily immune for 10 minutes.

大成功 The creature is unaffected.

成功 The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}

失败 The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}

大失败 The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}

8xYRzzHeY6uZztPe.name: Unstoppable Charge
8xYRzzHeY6uZztPe.description: The troll king Strides twice in a straight line. It can make up to two claw Strikes during this movement and one jaws Strike at the end of its movement. It can't Strike the same creature more than once.

Tiger.name: 老虎 Tiger
Tiger.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Tiger.publicNotes:
Tigers are solitary and territorial hunters, using their striped hides to blend into the forests and jungles they call home and preferring to attack with surprise.

自然界中很少有掠食者能与猫的潜行能力相匹敌。

blGUawuZyyQVnVXf.name: Pounce
blGUawuZyyQVnVXf.description: The tiger Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the tiger began this action @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

G3Hz9uWIYCEyoBRq.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
G3Hz9uWIYCEyoBRq.description:
The tiger deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

g51BzhmOH3vHLWup.name: Wrestle
g51BzhmOH3vHLWup.description: The tiger makes a claw Strike against a creature it is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbing}. If the attack hits, that creature is knocked @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}.

Tyrannosaurus.name: 暴龙 Tyrannosaurus
Tyrannosaurus.senses: 昏暗视觉，嗅觉（模糊感官）30尺
Tyrannosaurus.publicNotes:
暴龙被认为是一般意义上的恐龙之王，它是巨大的掠食者，嘴巴宽大，牙齿锋利无比。暴龙被愤怒和饥饿驱使，是大胆无畏的食肉动物，它们会贪婪地大口咬下大型猎物的肉块，或者一口吞下较小的猎物，比如大多数人类。虽然暴龙可以吃腐肉生存，但它们更偏爱活物。

暴龙用两条粗壮有力的后腿站立，这使它们跑得很快，而它们粗壮的尾巴为它们提供了优良的平衡能力。虽然它们退化的前爪除了在用嘴撕扯猎物的时候起到固定作用以外很少被用到，但是前段也有锋利的尖爪。暴龙单独行动时就够可怕了，但是它们有时也会成群捕食，以杀死更大体型的猎物。只有最强大的生物才能成功驯服暴龙，即便如此，它们也需要为这头贪婪的猛兽提供大量肉食来喂养。

一些巨人部落，尤其是独眼巨人，或是位于原始大陆不为人所知的居民，甚至会训练暴龙称为坐骑或战兽。在其他地方，修格斯用囚犯喂养这些强大的恐龙，作为处决或祭祀仪式的一部分。一些修格斯教派甚至崇拜暴龙，将它们视为暴力的恶魔般的半神。在这些情况下，这些被饲养长大的暴龙已经习惯被人投喂，对喂养者和驯兽师的态度表现得较为友好。暴龙身长50尺，体重达到7吨以上。

暴龙的其他变种中，体型要稍微小些的有异龙（allosaurus），体型更大的有南巨龙（giganotosaurus）。即便是体型最小的暴龙，例如矮暴龙（nanotyrannus），其体型也不会小于大型。然而尽管他们体型要小一圈，但是它们的凶猛程度却不亚于暴龙，那些认为矮暴龙训练起来“更安全”的人应该三思！

这些巨大的爬行动物是世界原始时代的遗留物，现在仍然大量存在于偏僻的荒野中，或者在黑暗之地Darklands 的地下魔法洞穴中。蜥蜴族、半兽人、巨人和其他人形生物有时会把恐龙当作坐骑、守卫或猎兽。众所周知，人类和其他族裔也收集恐龙，把它们放在动物园里展出，或把它们当作异域宠物或守卫。这通常是富人或怪咖喜欢干的事情，但确实也有一些德鲁伊和其他自然的守护者能与恐龙亲密相处，甚至把它们作为动物伙伴。当恐龙在它们正常栖息地以外的地区安家时，通常可能是因为被圈养的恐龙逃进荒野造成的。

r0zMXxalwdgrXzf3.name: 嗅觉（模糊感官）30尺 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺

24g2FSPaGiTvJB6C.name: 抛掷 Fling
24g2FSPaGiTvJB6C.description:
需求 一个生物被暴龙擒抱在嘴里。

效果 暴龙把嘴里的生物扔到离它嘴10英尺高，20英尺远的空中。目标生物视为坠落25尺（假设暴龙尽可能高地将目标扔到高处），并承受相应的坠落伤害。如果该生物落在另一个生物身上，则被砸中的生物将受到相同数量的钝击伤害。被砸中的生物可以通过@Check[type:reflex|dc:23|basic:true]豁免来躲避。

9gYASQQf328TmVpW.name: 摁死 Pin Prey
9gYASQQf328TmVpW.description:
触发 暴龙用脚踩对大型或更小体型的敌人造成重击。

效果 暴龙脚踩打击命中的生物@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}，并且暴龙用它的脚踩牢牢把敌人摁在当前的方格里。只要暴龙一直不移动，被摁死的生物视同被@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}。暴龙对被摁死的目标的攻击检定有+2环境加值，但是此时暴龙无法对其使用活吞能力，除非暴龙用嘴咬的方式@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.Tkd8sH4pwFIPzqTr]{擒抱 Grab}目标。

Unicorn.name: 独角兽 Unicorn
Unicorn.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Unicorn.publicNotes:
Symbols of grace and purity, unicorns resemble proud and noble horses. They are typically pure white of coat, but they are best known for the single, delicate horn that extends from the center of their forehead. While unicorns often serve as protectors of unspoiled wilderness and sacred places, they are themselves highly sought after for their horns, which are said to possess potent magical properties. To many, the mere idea of hunting such a magnificent creature in the hopes of severing its horn is utterly reprehensible. Indeed, a de-horned unicorn is a sorry sight, and few such unicorns survive much longer in the wild.

Unicorns are found almost exclusively in remote, unsullied areas of wilderness. Sometimes associated with good-aligned deities, other times associated with nature and the fey, unicorns are always known for their righteousness and nobility. They are wary, at best, of most humanoid creatures, due in large part for poachers' tendency to hunt them for their horns, but unicorns are often rumored to have a weakness for those who are pure of both heart and spirit. Despite some tales, unicorns are equally likely to recognize purity in young men as in young women.

bQaD3ryddLU1MPFx.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

XHYldAxPYwosrcOh.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限善良) Detect Alignment (At Will) (Good Only)
XHYldAxPYwosrcOh.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

QL3594a7048GPCem.name: Wild Empathy
QL3594a7048GPCem.description: The unicorn has a connection to the creatures of the natural world that allows it to communicate with them. The unicorn can use Diplomacy to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.OX4fy22hQgUHDr0q]{建立印象 Make an Impression} on animals and to make very simple @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.DCb62iCBrJXy0Ik6]{提出请求 Requests} of them.

vNaUr8lkk7o1zXWJ.name: Ghost Touch
vNaUr8lkk7o1zXWJ.description: A unicorn's Strikes have the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.JQdwHECogcTzdd8R]{幽冥 Ghost Touch} property rune.

65E6IqqYN0IW2HsH.name: Powerful Charge
65E6IqqYN0IW2HsH.description: The unicorn Strides up to double its Speed in a straight line and then makes a horn Strike. If the unicorn moved at least 20 feet, it deals an additional [[/r {2d6}]]{2d6伤害} on a hit.

Vampire Bat Swarm.name: 吸血蝙蝠群 Vampire Bat Swarm
Vampire Bat Swarm.publicNotes:
Although the typical vampire bat has a wingspan of 7 inches and doesn't pose a significant threat to larger prey alone (and indeed, these blood-drinkers can feed without their sleeping victims ever noticing), some unusually aggressive species of these bats hunt in deadly swarms. A churning cloud of vampire bats is much more dangerous than the sum of its individual parts and is capable of inflicting an overwhelming number of bleeding wounds in a frighteningly short span of time.

A wide range of bats dwell throughout the world. Most of these nocturnal animals are harmless insectivores, but deadly breeds of vampire bats and oversized bats the size of horses pose much more significant threats to adventurers.

7P4VEdy4KccmQ5Gp.name: Echolocation (Precise) 20尺
7P4VEdy4KccmQ5Gp.description: A bat swarm can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range.

ydBVkEJ8CwcPFkPB.name: Blood Feast
ydBVkEJ8CwcPFkPB.description: Each enemy in the bat swarm's space takes [[/r {1d4}[piercing]]]{1d4穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:16|basic:true]豁免). Creatures that fail this save also take [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续 Bleed伤害}.

Vampire Mastermind.name: 吸血鬼阴谋家 Vampire Mastermind
Vampire Mastermind.hp: coffin restoration, fast healing 10, negative healing
Vampire Mastermind.publicNotes:
Vampire masterminds are evil wizards who control entire cabals of the undead and instill fear in the hearts of mortals far and wide.

吸血鬼是一种以活物鲜血为食的不死生物。

6pmMLkbrsF7wRVrQ.name: 奥术准备法术 Arcane Prepared Spells

94oa0RrcsKbas3ys.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

rjvFPfDJN8mX263J.name: 支配术() Dominate (At Will) (See Dominate)
rjvFPfDJN8mX263J.description:
你操控目标，强行令其服从你的命令。如果你赋予一项明显是自灭的命令，目标不会行动，直到你下达新的命令。该效果基于其意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1} 以抵抗你的命令。

失败 你控制了目标，其获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9qGBRpbX9NEwtAAr]{被控制 Controlled} 状态，但在每轮结束时可以尝试一次意志豁免。成功时，法术结束。

大失败 如同失败，但是仅当你施加违抗其天性的命令，例如杀害其盟友时，才会获得新的豁免。

升阶 (10环级) 该持续时间为无限。

8QxvgR5NK6o14S5W.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
8QxvgR5NK6o14S5W.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

iXb7tKWBWggVVxpq.name: Fleet Step
iXb7tKWBWggVVxpq.description:
You gain a +30-foot status bonus to your Speed.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.ThFug45WHkQQXcoF]{Spell Effect: Fleet Step}

I0GaQls3ghJMJ5Ib.name: Children of the Night
I0GaQls3ghJMJ5Ib.description:
The vampire's presence brings forth creatures of the night to do the master's bidding. These typically include @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.sPClc6y3dT3XZupv]{Rat Swarms}, @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.VAWmwDA08ZLQd8lW]{Bat Swarms}, 和@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.Oilfs8Atv2LjAsUS]{Wolves}, but can include other creatures.

The vampire can give telepathic orders to these creatures as long as they are within 100 feet, but they can't communicate back.

9iYmbVoVyCe6SNu9.name: Coffin Restoration
9iYmbVoVyCe6SNu9.description: Unlike other undead, a vampire isn't destroyed at 0 HP. Instead, it falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}. If its body rests in its coffin for 1 hour, the vampire gains 1 HP, after which its @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{快速愈合 Fast Healing} begins to function normally.

S7Khn0wjpXjjyPAp.name: Mist Escape
S7Khn0wjpXjjyPAp.description:
触发 The vampire is reduced to 0 HP.

效果 The vampire uses Turn to Mist. It can take move actions to move toward its coffin even though it's at 0 HP. While at 0 HP in this form, the vampire is unaffected by further damage.

It automatically returns to its corporeal form, unconscious, if it reaches its coffin or after 2 hours, whichever comes first.

GXr4u9s0uuvI5J6d.name: Vampire Weaknesses
GXr4u9s0uuvI5J6d.description:
All vampires possess the following weaknesses.

  • Compulsions Vampires are creatures of strange and unknowable compulsions. A typical vampire can't voluntarily cross running water unless it is transported while it hides within its coffin, nor can it enter a private dwelling unless invited in by someone with the authority to do so. At your discretion, vampires might have different compulsions-a pirate vampire might not be able to set foot on solid ground without being invited, for example. The vampire can still be forced to do these things and might be able to overcome its compulsion just as it does its revulsion.
  • Revulsion A vampire can't voluntarily come within 10 feet of brandished garlic or a brandished religious symbol of a non-evil deity. To brandish garlic or a religious symbol, a creature must Interact to do so for 1 round (similar to Raising a Shield). If the vampire involuntarily comes within 10 feet of an object of its revulsion, it gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing} condition, running from the object of its revulsion until it ends an action beyond 10 feet. After 1 round of being exposed to the subject of its revulsion, a vampire can attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25|name:Overcome Revulsion] save as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. On a success, it overcomes its revulsions for [[/br 1d6 #rounds]]{1d6轮} (or 1 hour on a critical success).
  • Stake A wooden stake driven through a vampire's heart drops the vampire to 0 HP and prevents it from healing above 0 HP, even in its coffin. Staking a vampire requires three actions and works only if the vampire is unconscious. If the stake is removed, the vampire can heal above 0 HP again, and if it's in its coffin the 1-hour rest period begins once the stake is removed. If the vampire's head is severed and anointed with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.z9T4c1hXwOotsMCp]{Holy Water} while the stake is in place, the vampire is destroyed.
  • Sunlight If exposed to direct sunlight, a vampire immediately becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}. The slowed value increases by 1 each time the vampire ends its turn in sunlight. If the vampire loses all its actions in this way, it is destroyed. Due to their supernatural aversion to light, vampires don't cast shadows or show a reflection in mirrors.

zEz9gGlpNBUnyF2Y.name: Change Shape
zEz9gGlpNBUnyF2Y.description:
The vampire transforms into its animal form or back into its normal form.

  • Bat The vampire changes into a @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.C9s5tBxVValC2HTE]{Giant Bat}
    • 体型 Large
    • Senses Echolocation 40尺
    • 速度 20 feet, fly 30尺
    • 近战 fangs [[/r 1d20+19 #Fangs]]{+19}/[[/r 1d20+14 #Fangs]]{+14}/[[/r 1d20+9 #Fangs]]{+9}, 伤害 [[/r {2d8+9}[piercing]]]{2d8+9穿刺伤害}

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

czqtIybNHs8mmEeg.name: Create Spawn
czqtIybNHs8mmEeg.description:
If a creature dies after being reduced to 0 HP by Drink Blood, the vampire can turn this victim into a vampire by donating some of its own blood to the victim and burying the victim in earth for 3 nights.

If the new vampire is lower level than its creator, it is under the creator's control. If a vampire controls too many spawn at once (as determined by the GM), strong-willed spawn can free themselves by succeeding at a @Check[type:will|name:Escape Thralldom] saving throw against the vampire's Will DC.

3ZSVEZBMKleuEd84.name: Dominate
3ZSVEZBMKleuEd84.description:
The vampire can cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{支配术 Dominate} at will as a divine innate spell. Casting it requires staring into the target's eyes, giving the spell the visual trait. The save DC uses the DC of the vampire's level, and a creature that succeeds is temporarily immune to that vampire's Dominate for 24 hours.

Fully destroying the vampire ends the domination, but merely reducing the vampire to 0 HP is insufficient to break the spell.

9ewh7tMyC0NRIpZx.name: Drain Bonded Item
9ewh7tMyC0NRIpZx.description:
频率 每天一次

需求 The vampire hasn't acted yet on this turn.

效果 The vampire expends the power stored in its signet ring. This gives the vampire the ability to cast one prepared spell it had already previously cast today, without spending a spell slot. The vampire must still Cast the Spell and meet the spell's other requirements.

HhkalK1aMfqDSiWQ.name: Drink Blood
HhkalK1aMfqDSiWQ.description:
需求 A @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}, or willing creature is within the vampire's reach.

效果 The vampire sinks its fangs into that creature to drink its blood. This requires an Athletics check against the victim's Fortitude DC if the victim is grabbed and is automatic for any of the other conditions.

The victim is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} and the vampire regains [[/r {10}[healing]]]{10生命值}, gaining any excess HP as temporary Hit Points. Drinking Blood from a creature that's already drained doesn't restore any HP to the vampire but increases the victim's drain value by 1. A vampire can also consume blood that's been emptied into a vessel for sustenance, but it gains no HP from doing so.

A victim's drained condition decreases by 1 per week. A blood transfusion, which requires a @Check[type:medicine|dc:20|name:Blood Transfusion] check and sufficient blood or a blood donor, reduces the drain by 1 after 10 minutes.

DD9mP7VmHRk4Lm97.name: Steady Spellcasting
DD9mP7VmHRk4Lm97.description: If another creature's reaction would disrupt the vampire mastermind's spellcasting action, the vampire attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check. If the vampire succeeds, its action isn't disrupted.

zl24K9E3qEAfVXrR.name: Turn to Mist
zl24K9E3qEAfVXrR.description:
The vampire turns into a cloud of vapor, as the @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.V8wXOsoejQhe6CyG]{气化形体 Gaseous Form} spell, or back to its normal form. The vampire loses @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{快速愈合 Fast Healing} while in gaseous form.

The vampire can remain in this form indefinitely.

Tor Linnorm.name: 岩山蛇龙 Tor Linnorm
Tor Linnorm.speed: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Tor Linnorm.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60 feet; 真视术
Tor Linnorm.publicNotes:
Tor linnorms dwell in the tallest volcanic mountains, either within natural formed caverns or within molten craters. A tor linnorm's temper can be as hot and destructive as the magma the creature resembles.

古老且巨大的蛇龙生活在世界的北部地区，他们憎恨那些自己认定的劣等生物，并试图尽可能对这些不幸的受害者造成更多的痛苦。尽管这些残暴的蛇形生物不如大多数人想象中的带翼真龙强大，但他们确实拥有难以置信且致命的力量，使其可以与真龙的残暴一较高下。

zQRbKmxdzecknTDu.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

g4YpY2bku4a31XWO.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
g4YpY2bku4a31XWO.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

YPkNYxysmFk49ni2.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
YPkNYxysmFk49ni2.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

fEbZopQgOxVNZDnI.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

zLUOcpj85OOnwvRh.name: Curse of Boiling Blood
zLUOcpj85OOnwvRh.description:
When a creature slays a tor linnorm, it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:48] save or permanently gain weakness to fire 20 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} from the agonizing pain it now endures at all times. As long as a character continues to suffer this curse, its slowed condition can never be reduced below slowed 1.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.CUgmb7g65vYNT2hn]{效果: Curse of Boiling Blood}

mgb2nO0WkJsnZogZ.name: Lava Affinity
mgb2nO0WkJsnZogZ.description: A tor linnorm can breathe and swim freely while submerged in lava and magma.

JvFUFSxHH2EThNAC.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
JvFUFSxHH2EThNAC.description:
The tor linnorm expels a @Template[type:cone|distance:60] of flame and ash dealing [[/r {20d6}[fire]]]{20d6火焰伤害} to creatures within the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:46|basic:true]豁免). At the start of the tor linnorm's next turn, the area affected by the breath weapon is covered in thick, scorching smoke that burns both the lungs and eyes, dealing an additional [[/r {10d6}[fire]]]{10d6火焰伤害} to all creatures in the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:46|basic:true]豁免). A creature that spends an entire round in the smoke with open eyes must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:44] save or is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded} for 1 minute. The smoke dissipates after 1 minute; in strong winds, the smoke dissipates in 5 rounds, and in more powerful winds, it may clear even more quickly.

The tor linnorm can't use Breath Weapon again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}.

CMfpQM5btdzVWxB5.name: Slashing Claws
CMfpQM5btdzVWxB5.description: A tor linnorm makes four Strikes with its claws, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the tor linnorm's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after the tor linnorm makes all its attacks.

oeOZCitfRoZXCLfy.name: Tor Linnorm Venom
oeOZCitfRoZXCLfy.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:44]

最大持续时间 10轮

阶段1 [[/r {8d6}[fire]]]{8d6火焰伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}

阶段2 [[/r {12d6}[fire]]]{12d6火焰伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}

War Horse.name: 战马 War Horse
War Horse.senses: 昏暗视觉，嗅觉（模糊感官）30尺
War Horse.publicNotes: 在许多社会中，马都是坐骑和驮兽。它们是忠诚的和典型的温和生物，对于那些想长途旅行的人来说，它们是无价之宝。较小的种族，像侏儒和半身人，经常使用矮种马作为坐骑，而马是人类和其他中型类人所喜欢的坐骑。大多数人类遇到的马都是驯养的，尽管这些强壮动物组成的大型群落可以在野外找到。

g2qQpMZqRaylNASw.name: 嗅觉（模糊感官）30尺 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺

xeAR997MOrxz4cyA.name: 奔驰 Gallop
xeAR997MOrxz4cyA.description: 战马行走两次，在这些行走中有一个10尺的环境加值。

War Pony.name: 矮种战马 War Pony
War Pony.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
War Pony.publicNotes: 在许多社会中，马都是坐骑和驮兽。它们是忠诚的和典型的温和生物，对于那些想长途旅行的人来说，它们是无价之宝。较小的种族，像侏儒和半身人，经常使用矮种马作为坐骑，而马是人类和其他中型类人所喜欢的坐骑。大多数人类遇到的马都是驯养的，尽管这些强壮动物组成的大型群落可以在野外找到。

b8kddR2Im2nSOnDM.name: Gallop
b8kddR2Im2nSOnDM.description: The war pony Strides twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

Warg.name: 座狼 Warg
Warg.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Warg.publicNotes:
Wargs hunt in packs and surround their prey like common wolves, but their cunning and penchant for taunting victims makes them easy to distinguish from their less-intelligent cousins. But despite their intelligence, wargs have simple desires for food and shelter, making them easy for evil humanoids such as orcs and hobgoblins to recruit to protect their camps or join them in battle. Most wargs are amenable to this arrangement, but if food should run out, wargs are more than willing to integrate goblinoid flesh into their diet.

The warg is an intelligent and malevolent wolf that dwells among goblins, hobgoblins, orcs, and other violent humanoids.

z4Mouf0sgt0pO2Vz.name: Avenging Bite
z4Mouf0sgt0pO2Vz.description:
触发 A creature within reach of the warg's jaws attacks one of the warg's allies.

效果 The warg makes a jaws Strike against the triggering creature.

VfGIlE5o88e6ZuW6.name: Pack Attack
VfGIlE5o88e6ZuW6.description: The warg's Strikes deals an extra [[/r {1d4}]]{1d4伤害} to any creature within reach of at least two of the warg's allies.

Warsworn.name: 战殁巨虫 Warsworn
Warsworn.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. positive
Warsworn.publicNotes: A warsworn is an animate mass of corpses composed of dozens, sometimes even hundreds, of victims of battle. They are formed by deities of undeath or war or, rarely, spontaneously manifest from the devastation of an especially horrendous battle.

QKtfubIn7OYITmUL.name: Animated Weapon
QKtfubIn7OYITmUL.description: Four of the weapon's damage dice +9 of the weapon's damage type.

vhMuwHfxhvT3a6e2.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Positive

vcD6GpR7alODPFzn.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

83qHKEXcHOEaa6iS.name: Absorb
83qHKEXcHOEaa6iS.description:
触发 The warsworn moves into a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yZRUzMqrMmfLu0V1]{Dying} creature's space.

效果 The warsworn absorbs the dying creature into itself, instantly killing the creature and healing the warsworn for a number of Hit Points equal to the creature's level. As long as the warsworn still exists, absorbed creatures can't be resurrected except by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.6dDtGIUerazSHIOu]{祈愿术 Wish} or a similarly powerful effect.

qaGJzO6SddpAXZKg.name: Animated Weapons
qaGJzO6SddpAXZKg.description: The warsworn assumes control of unattended weapons within 100 feet, forcing them to levitate around it. The warsworn can telekinetically wield these weapons to make melee Strikes with a reach of 100 feet.

yLFnxHxGno0eHAjr.name: Energy Drain
yLFnxHxGno0eHAjr.description: When a warsworn hits with a corpse wave Strike or damages a creature with Trample, the target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:35] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.3uh1r86TzbQvosxv]{毁灭 Doomed 1}. On a critical success, the target becomes temporarily immune to the warsworn's energy drain for 24 hours.

Dzxj1t6HVexa7Wyz.name: Plummet
Dzxj1t6HVexa7Wyz.description: A creature hit by a warsworn's scrap ball Strike must attempt a @Check[type:reflex|dc:37] save. On a failure, the target falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}; if the target was airborne, it falls up to 120 feet, taking damage from the fall and landing prone if the descent brings it to the ground. On a critical failure, the target is also held under a pile of scrap (DC 37 to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}).

Werewolf.name: 狼化人 Werewolf
Werewolf.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Werewolf.publicNotes:
The curse of the werewolf-known as lycanthropy to many-instills in its carriers the hungry bloodlust and predatory instincts of the wolf. Werewolves tend to dwell on the fringes of society or in small settlements where, in their humanoid forms, they work as laborers, hunters, farmers, or trappers. At night, however, these same villagers transform into violent killers and sadistic stalkers who prey on their neighbors. Werewolves are the quintessential werecreature, and the first that comes to mind when most people speak of such beings.

Although most werewolves hide their curse by adopting solitary lifestyles, some retain the pack mentality of true wolves. A small group of such werewolves typically forms a family-like pack, with the eldest or most powerful serving as the leader; new pack mates are hand-chosen and inculcated into the family as its influence grows.

Werecreatures are humanoids doomed to transform into animals and animal-humanoid hybrids under the light of the full moon. These shapechanging creatures are the result of an ancient primal curse that they can, in turn, transmit through their own bites. Their ability to lurk unseen in the wilds as well as among people, combined with the contagiousness of their condition, makes werecreatures a perennial cause of panicked suspicion.

62IVWtvdiJi9PSZ1.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

oXq7JKUPh72N7tPy.name: Change Shape
oXq7JKUPh72N7tPy.description:
• Human
    • 近战 fist [[/r 1d20+11 #Fist]]{+11}/[[/r 1d20+6 #Fist]]{+6}/[[/r 1d20+1 #Fist]]{+1} (agile, nonlethal), 伤害 [[/r {1d4+8}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4+8钝击伤害}
  • Wolf
    • 速度 40尺
    • 近战 jaws[[/r 1d20+11 #Jaws]]{+11}/[[/r 1d20+6 #Jaws]]{+6}/[[/r 1d20+1 #Jaws]]{+1}, 伤害 [[/r {1d8+8}[piercing]]]{1d8+8穿刺伤害} plus @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{击倒 Knockdown}

The werecreature changes into its humanoid, hybrid, or animal shape. Each shape has a specific, persistent appearance. A true werecreature's natural form is its hybrid shape.

In humanoid shape, the werecreature uses its original humanoid size, loses its jaws and claws Strikes, and gains a melee fist Strike that deals bludgeoning damage equal to the slashing damage dealt by its claw.

In animal shape, its Speed and size change to that of the animal, it gains any special Strike effects of the animal that it didn't already have (such as Grab), and it loses its weapon Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

Xmaw18x2qDwDq7tB.name: Curse of the Werewolf
Xmaw18x2qDwDq7tB.description:
This curse affects only humanoids.

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

On each full moon, the cursed creature must succeed at another Fortitude save or turn into a werewolf until dawn.

The creature is under the GM's control and goes on a rampage for half the night before falling unconscious until dawn.

y22Jw3B6gV1YXd2p.name: Moon Frenzy
y22Jw3B6gV1YXd2p.description:
When a full moon appears in the night sky, the werecreature must enter hybrid form, can't Change Shape thereafter, becomes one size larger, increases its reach by 5 feet, and increases the damage of its jaws Strike by 2.

When the moon sets or the sun rises, the werecreature returns to humanoid form and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.HL2l2VRSaQHu9lUw]{疲乏 Fatigued} for [[/br 2d4 #Fatigued duration]]{2d4 hours}.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.dRe8n1nBWMIXd8jh]{效果: Moon Frenzy}

I5zNTSZyjvhCKz3D.name: Pack Attack
I5zNTSZyjvhCKz3D.description: The werewolf's Strikes deal [[/r {1d6}]]{1d6额外伤害} to creatures within reach of at least two of the werewolf's allies.

Water Mephit.name: 水魔蝠 Water Mephit
Water Mephit.publicNotes:
Water mephits are consummate jokers who are always happy to trade a favor for a good laugh. Just as fire mephits are the ones who cleave closest to evil without fully crossing over into true villainy, water mephits are the friendliest of the mephits and therefore the closest to good. Still, one should take care in making assumptions about a water mephit's benevolence, for no one can reliably count on them to keep their inborn need for pranks and trickery at bay for long. Water mephits have blue-green skin that shimmers in light like fish scales. Though water mephits' wings look more like webbed fins than limbs capable of flight, they can flap their wings to fly through the air as easily as any other mephit. Water mephits prefer to swim, when possible, and they leave the water only when they must.

魔蝠——有时又被成为元素小怪——是一种有着蝙蝠翅膀的小型双足生物，它们服务于元素位面中更大的元素，或是将它们召唤到主物质位面的施法者学徒。所有魔蝠都拥有和它们种类相匹配的魔法能力和吐息。

UWcKX7DmlsSP933a.name: 奥术内在法术 Arcane Innate Spells

0naynsYzlUHn8xiZ.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
0naynsYzlUHn8xiZ.description:
The water mephit breathes acid in a @Template[type:cone|distance:15] that deals [[/r {2d6}[acid]]]{2d6酸液伤害} to each creature within the area (@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true]豁免).

The water meph它在经过[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}之前无法再次使用吐息。

2xaMJwr5gjV30x3x.name: Drench
2xaMJwr5gjV30x3x.description:
The water mephit puts out all fires in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5].

The mephit extinguishes all non-magical fires automatically and attempts to counteract magical fires ([[/r 1d20+7 #Drench]]{+7} counteract modifier).

Web Lurker.name: 伏网怪 Web Lurker
Web Lurker.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)30 feet (creatures touching its web)
Web Lurker.publicNotes: Web lurkers, known also as ettercaps, are ugly monsters that not only dwell within the lairs of spiders and swarms, but actively cultivate and shepherd such vermin.

47dklzJrGaCDSZ2N.name: 震颤感知（模糊感官）30 feet (Creatures Touching its Web)

Kj1uqisygxPxuaC9.name: Spider Speak
Kj1uqisygxPxuaC9.description: The web lurker can speak with spiders, with the same effects and limitations as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.BBvV7qoXGdw09q1C]{Speak with Animals}.

gMf2LQ1HIE4bCW8p.name: Spring upon Prey
gMf2LQ1HIE4bCW8p.description:
触发 A creature touches the web lurker's web while the web lurker is on it.

需求 Initiative has not yet been rolled.

效果 The web lurker automatically notices the creature and Strides or Climbs before rolling initiative.

P7JMDrm2HB1QPV3N.name: Web Lurker Venom
P7JMDrm2HB1QPV3N.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

最大持续时间 10轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}, flat-footed, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1轮)

Re5HgCWQJTyzGewL.name: Web Trap
Re5HgCWQJTyzGewL.description: A creature hit by the web lurker's web attack is immobilized and stuck to the nearest surface until it succeeds at @Check[type:acrobatics|dc:20|traits:action:escape] check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}.

Wemmuth.name: 温姆斯 Wemmuth
Wemmuth.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)60尺
Wemmuth.publicNotes:
Fertilized by large quantities of spilled blood, such as that found on bloodstained battlefields or in the war-torn regions surrounding besieged cities, wemmuths are vile swaths of vines that draw sustenance from mortal suffering, lapping up blood like water. Possessing a rudimentary intelligence and an unquenchable thirst for blood, wemmuths lie in wait for most of their lives, growing to incredible size in the bloody soil of their grisly homes. Though the vines that comprise a wemmuth's body are scarcely thicker than rope, a single adult wemmuth system consists of 6 tons of vines, enough to stretch for 6,000 feet if stretched from end to end in a single straight line. Wemmuths never orient themselves this way, however, instead preferring to wrap themselves into massive mounds approximately 15 feet across and equally thick. Although wemmuths are often spotted lazing about, the scent of blood is enough to whip one into a violent frenzy. The creature condenses its entire mass into a sphere of sharp thorns and lashing vines, resembling a hateful tumbleweed the size of an elephant. Wemmuths commonly dig up massive boulders or entire trees from the ground and incorporate them into their rolling mass, using these objects to bolster their defense against many forms of attack or hurling them at faraway foes with terrifying precision.

Some speculate that wemmuths are a form of diabolical corruption let loose upon Golarion by House Thrune of Cheliax, perhaps as a scorched earth tactic against their rivals. Influential nobles from Nirmathas and Molthune both point fingers at one another for the wemmuth's creation, Nirmathas citing Molthune's close ties to Infernal Cheliax and Molthune blaming the primal magic commonly employed by Nirmathas's many druids and rangers. Several Varisian tales describe creatures closely matching the wemmuth's description attempting to apprehend a famous folk trickster, while crusaders from Mendev adhere to the belief that the wemmuths were a blight unleashed upon Golarion by Deskari, former demon lord of locusts, before his defeat at the hands of mortal heroes.

96XPNyAYt1NHy3H5.name: Blood Leech
96XPNyAYt1NHy3H5.description:
触发 The wemmuth deals damage to a creature with Constrict.

效果 The wemmuth heals a number of Hit Points equal to half the total damage dealt by Constrict.

t4Gnn9gqqcKWerhM.name: Thorny Mass
