SzReeoNa9jYsialH.description: The azure worm recovers from the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed}, 和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned} conditions at the end of its turn. It's also immune to penalties to its Speeds and the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} condition, and it ignores difficult terrain and greater difficult terrain.

K09n3CnAeuaSeD9k.name: Shake It Off
K09n3CnAeuaSeD9k.description:
频率 每天一次

触发 The azure worm would be affected by a condition or adverse effect (such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dN8QBNuTiaBHCKUe]{Baleful Polymorph})

效果 The azure worm negates the triggering condition or effect. Effects from artifacts, deities, or a similarly powerful source can't be avoided in this way.

sqZIq7wiLeITXB6q.name: Azure Worm Venom
sqZIq7wiLeITXB6q.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {3d6}[poison]]]{3d6毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {4d6}[poison]]]{4d6毒素伤害} and clumsy 2 (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {6d6}[poison]]]{6d6毒素伤害} and clumsy 2 (1轮)

k8mtTYrWrnHjBMCO.name: Breach
k8mtTYrWrnHjBMCO.description: The azure worm Swims up to its swim Speed, then Leaps vertically out of the water up to 30 feet, making a Strike against a creature at the apex of the jump (this lets it attack a creature within 45 feet of the water's surface). After the Strike, the worm splashes back down. It can use @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.i18TlebMzwONyPhI]{Improved Grab} on this Strike and follow it up with Fast Swallow.

IYYi7B0j0PD17IXo.name: Fast Swallow
IYYi7B0j0PD17IXo.description:
触发 The worm @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabs} a creature.

效果 The worm uses Swallow Whole.

PF9LIocpqPbxqnvR.name: Thrash
PF9LIocpqPbxqnvR.description: The worm makes a Strike once against each creature in its reach. It can Strike up to once with its jaws, up to once with its stinger, and any number of times with its body. Each attack counts toward the worm's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after it makes all the attacks.

Balisse.name: 巴尔伊斯 Balisse
Balisse.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Balisse.senses: (+20 to detect lies and illusions); darkvision
Balisse.publicNotes:
Balisses, or confessor angels, seek to assist mortals ensnared by moral dilemmas or crises of faith. Balisses prefer to guide people to their own decisions rather than demand obedience to a higher cause, as intrinsic belief is even more powerful than blind obedience. While most balisses are fundamentally honest, they use their guardian angel ability to seem less intimidating and decrease the chance the mortal will simply acquiesce to the opinion of an obviously divine being. Balisses often form from souls of those who performed evil acts but were redeemed. Many serve the goddess Sarenrae, but they can serve other good deities and empyreal lords as well.

天使是天界的代表，他们身兼信使与战士的职责，根据自身的能力和权能划分为不同的合唱团（choirs）。大多数天使属于中立善良阵营，他们居住于涅槃境（Nirvana），美德与教化之地。然而部分天使，包括数个天使神祇也具有不同的阵营，甚至其中一部分会居住于其他位面。无论阵营为何，天使们都是具有能够辅助盟友的魔法灵光的仁慈使者。

c5Kaa1L8XCouqJy1.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

J8DYyAUH2MgtwPeM.name: Tongues (Constant)
J8DYyAUH2MgtwPeM.description:
The target can understand all words regardless of language and also speak the languages of other creatures. When in a mixed group of creatures, each time the target speaks, it can choose a creature and speak in a language that creature understands, even if the target doesn't know what language that is.

Heightened (7th) The duration is 8 hours.

AIivVBT37yLmpoiE.name: Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only)
AIivVBT37yLmpoiE.description:
Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{Invisible}. This makes it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected} to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened (4th) The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

mW91KOH1mqBVJgBw.name: Remove Fear (At Will)
mW91KOH1mqBVJgBw.description:
With a touch, you ease a creature's fears. You can attempt to counteract a single fear effect that the target suffers from. This frees only the target, not any other creatures under the fear effect.

Heightened (6th) The spell's range increases to 30 feet, and you can target up to 10 creatures.

p0Pe1njRhm7KfrxH.name: Detect Alignment (At Will) (Evil Only)
p0Pe1njRhm7KfrxH.description:
Your eyes glow as you sense aligned auras. Choose chaotic, evil, good, or lawful. You detect auras of that alignment. You receive no information beyond presence or absence. You can choose not to detect creatures or effects you're aware have that alignment.

Only creatures of 6th level or higher-unless divine spellcasters, undead, or beings from the Outer Sphere-have alignment auras.

Heightened (2nd) You learn each aura's location and strength.

E36GUJSTq2NvkRmA.name: Confessor's Aura
E36GUJSTq2NvkRmA.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Creatures in the balisse's aura are subject to @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aewxsale5xWEPKLk]{Zone of Truth} (DC 23). Additionally, if these creatures choose to honestly express their own conflicted feelings, the aura makes it easier for them to put words to those feelings.

Z4NC0zq5T9vj6Gu8.name: Brand of the Impenitent
Z4NC0zq5T9vj6Gu8.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The balisse marks an evil creature within its confessor's aura as irredeemable. It can only do so after a failed attempt to convince the creature to repent. The touched creature takes a -1 status penalty to AC and saves, reduces its resistances by 2 and gains weakness 2 to good damage. The duration depends on the targets @Check[type:will|dc:26] save.

大成功 The creature is unaffected

成功 The duration is 1 round

失败 The duration is 1 day

大失败 The duration is permanent

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.BmAw66zEkifSvOtg]{效果: Brand of the Impenitent}

NtYoVyYPS90gzKOB.name: Flaming Armament
NtYoVyYPS90gzKOB.description: Any weapon gains the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.XszNvxnymWYRaoTp]{炽焰 Flaming} property rune while a balisse wields it.

prLWsWvW54YcYyNa.name: Guiding Angel
prLWsWvW54YcYyNa.description: While invisible, a balisse can spiritually attach itself to a non-evil mortal. When it does so, it merges with the mortal's body and is unable to use any of its spells and abilities other than to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.pvQ5rY2zrtPI614F]{Interact} with the mortal. It must use Guiding Angel again to leave the mortal. While merged with the mortal, the balisse can see, such as a small angel on the mortal's shoulder. Alternatively, it can communicate with the mortal using a bodiless voice only the mortal can hear.

Banshee.name: 报丧女妖 Banshee

dr.exceptions: 除力场、幽冥或正能量；对抗非魔法时双倍抗力

Banshee.publicNotes:
报丧女妖是愤怒且痛苦的灵魂，她们是在生命的最后时刻由于被背叛而束缚在主物质位面的精灵。部分报丧女妖的诞生是因为精灵被最信任的同伴和朋友所杀害，或者是在临终时被所爱之人所背叛。而另一些由精灵衍生出的报丧女妖则是因为其死前的背信行为在灵魂上留下了污点。无论报丧女妖自身的起源是哪个种类，她们都会蔑视生灵。这种对生者的仇恨往往是其生前性格的可怖翻转。有人猜测越是善良热心的精灵（在遭遇越发痛苦的背叛后），由其诞生的报丧女妖越是残忍无情。

报丧女妖很少远离自身的殒命之地，她们通常会在阳光很少能照耀的地点作祟，比如茂密的森林或昏暗的沼泽。在精灵之国奇奥尼（Kyonin）可以找到许多报丧女妖，尤其是在扭曲棘林（Tanglebriar）——恶魔毁木者（Treerazer）的邪恶领地。同样地，幽暗地域（Darklands）的卓尔定居点周边也潜伏着大量的报丧女妖，因为卓尔文化中不乏大量残忍的背叛行为。

报丧女妖仅靠碰触就能带来痛苦与源自内心的原始恐惧，那些暴露在她们悲伤哀嚎中的人很难存活下来。

74wDKknM5LCOcK73.name: 60尺洞见心跳（模糊）
74wDKknM5LCOcK73.description: 报丧女妖能听到60尺范围内的心跳声（模糊感官）。

rQT7KUvA4yzEm4PO.name: 阳光削弱 Sunlight Powerlessness
rQT7KUvA4yzEm4PO.description: 在阳光的直射下，报丧女妖会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}，且无法使用具有攻击特征的动作。

NKs8hoGb4IyfFWCw.name: 复仇之怨 Vengeful Spite
NKs8hoGb4IyfFWCw.description:
触发 有敌人对报丧女妖造成重击或者报丧女妖在对抗敌人的伤害性效果时投掷出了大失败。

效果 报丧女妖向折磨她的人进行反击，对其造成[[/r {4d10+14}[mental]]]{4d10+14心灵伤害}（@Check[type:will|dc:38|basic:true]豁免），并根据相同的意志豁免结果将惊骇之触的效果应用至目标。

q8ASqdiBd9SflYVU.name: 幽体涟漪 Spectral Ripple
q8ASqdiBd9SflYVU.description: 当报丧女妖行走了至少10尺时，她们会获得@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}直至其下个回合开始为止。

ePRrl3MsWtcXXzD7.name: 惊骇之触 Terrifying Touch
ePRrl3MsWtcXXzD7.description: 被报丧女妖的触摸所伤害且还未陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened}的生物必须尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:38]豁免（若她的攻击造成重击则为@Check[type:will|dc:43]）。若目标生物豁免失败，则会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}；大失败时还会因恐惧而畏缩，陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 4}。若该生物由于法术或魔法物品的保护而可以对抗恐惧的话，报丧女妖的触摸首先会尝试反制该保护效果，该效果相当于9环的@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9HpwDN4MYQJnW0LG]{解除魔法 Dispel Magic}法术。

IFPnmQpUJLW9TJa9.name: 哀嚎 Wail
IFPnmQpUJLW9TJa9.description:
报丧女妖发出了让人心悸的@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.FEsuyf203wTNE2et]{女妖之嚎 Wail of the Banshee}（@Check[type:fortitude|dc:38]）。这声哀嚎会克服5环或更低环级的@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.gIdDLrbswTV3OBJy]{沉默术 Silence}或类似效果。报丧女妖可以使用三动作的行动来替代哀嚎的行动，这使得她能够克服至多8环的上述效果。

报丧女妖的哀嚎会在1轮内持续共鸣，在此期间进入此区域的任何生物都必须尝试一次豁免对抗该效果。同一名生物不会被同一个哀嚎影响多次。

报丧女妖在[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Wail]]{1d4轮}内无法再次进行哀嚎。

Baomal.name: 巴莫 Baomal
Baomal.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 80尺
Baomal.publicNotes: Few sea monsters are as dreaded and feared as the two-headed baomal. These massive predatory beasts typically dwell in the deepest waters and compete with krakens and other monsters for food. They feed on whales and other large sea creatures, sometimes following them to the water's surface. Near the surface, baomals that encounter ships quickly learn that they contain a variety of tasty morsels. The creatures use their devastating spikes to rip open the ships' hulls, then leisurely feed on the helpless sailors.

XxKXmsn4wSfWyyXp.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

LZ3htI7JRHvcwAhU.name: Double Opportunity
LZ3htI7JRHvcwAhU.description: A baomal gains an extra reaction each round that it can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity. It must use a different head for each one it attempts, and it can't make more than one Attack of Opportunity for the same triggering action.

LkBIOwt4NW6BfYFE.name: Psychic Static Aura
LkBIOwt4NW6BfYFE.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:120]{120尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

All creatures, except aberrations, that begin their turn in the area take [[/r {5d6}[mental]]]{5d6心灵伤害}.

74Xu2C6KzxtSFcNe.name: Two Heads
74Xu2C6KzxtSFcNe.description: Any ability that would sever a baomal's head (such as a critical hit with a @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.6xaxxKfvXED6LfIY]{斩首 Vorpal} weapon) severs one head at random. Losing one head doesn't kill a baomal, but it does prevent the baomal from making Strikes with the lost head and from using Double Opportunity or Two-Headed Strike.

ZuxcOScsfkdklfi8.name: Breath of the Sea
ZuxcOScsfkdklfi8.description: A baomal can inhale tremendous amounts of water, drawing everything in the sea nearby closer. All creatures and objects in the water within @Template[type:emanation|distance:60]{60尺} of the baomal (including ships) are pulled toward it. Creatures must succeed at a @Check[type:athletics|dc:42] check or be pulled up to 20 feet toward the baomal (40 feet on a critical failure). For ships, use the captain's Sailing Lore in place of Athletics. Unattended objects are automatically pulled.

y6bETzshaXTYx4Wq.name: Shell Rake
y6bETzshaXTYx4Wq.description: The baomal Swims or Strides alongside a creature or the hull of a vessel, dealing damage with the strong spikes on its shell. Each creature or ship the baomal is adjacent to at any point during its movement takes [[/r {6d6+10}[slashing,piercing]]]{6d6+10 slashing and穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true]豁免). Against vessels, Shell Rake ignores the first 5 Hardness and creates an explosion of splinters that deals [[/r {3d6+5}]]{3d6+5伤害} to every creature within @Template[type:burst|distance:10]{10尺} of the deck's edge (@Check[type:reflex|dc:42|basic:true]豁免).

Barbazu.name: 胡须魔 Barbazu
Barbazu.allSaves: 对所有魔法效果的豁免有+1状态加值
Barbazu.publicNotes:
巴霸魔，通常也被称为胡须魔或步兵魔，是一种嗜杀成性的魔鬼，它们充当炼狱军队的步兵来满足自己的毁灭欲望，通常会带领成群的下级魔鬼例如小魔鬼或劣魔加入战斗。胡须魔会挥舞着带锯刃的大砍刀，造成锯齿状的伤口能抵抗治疗法术，造成大量失血。当地人靠的太近时，胡须魔会用它们蠕动的尖刺胡须发起攻击，造成一种叫做“地狱热疫”的可怕疾病，它们也会津津有味地看着猎物的力量从内部被慢慢地吞噬。

胡须魔总是野蛮地沉迷于来自地狱各层的地狱领主们的邪恶念头，热衷于为它们散播谋杀、悲惨和痛苦。

作为散播腐败和征服的大师，魔鬼们试图诱惑凡人生命加入它们对亵渎事物的追求中来，并将暴政传播到各个世界。它们向人类提出各种条件，从签署一份地狱契约而获取的强大力量，到向邪神低语换来的扭曲恩惠，甚至还有许多更微妙的交易。那些屈服于这些诱惑的人，会发现自己死后会在地狱的深坑中遭受无尽的折磨，在那里唯一逃脱的希望就是晋升为地狱中的魔鬼。从士兵、学者到检察官、律师、法官和刽子手，每一种恶魔在维持冷酷无情的地狱官僚机器上扮演着特定的角色，这就是地狱。低级的劣魔和小魔鬼服从于更强大和专业的恶魔，比如契约魔和狂怒魔，做着卑下的工作，而最强大的深狱炼魔指挥着整个地狱军团。

GZ55vWFhwaHyhnfM.name: 地狱热疫 Avernal Fever
GZ55vWFhwaHyhnfM.description:
豁免 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:23]

阶段 1 携带疾病但是不受影响（1 日）

阶段 2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1 天)

阶段 3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1 天)

SNJ0RSCREyP9YYKY.name: 地狱创伤 Infernal Wound
SNJ0RSCREyP9YYKY.description:
胡须魔的大砍刀打击也会造成@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success]，并且能抵抗对流血伤害的治疗尝试。

终止流血伤害的纯骰检定@Check[type:flat|dc:20]。只有当流血生物得到盟友成功进行协助之后该DC才会减少到@Check[type:flat|dc:15]。对有地狱创伤生物@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{进行急救 Administer First Aid}的DC增加5。

施法者或物品试图对受到地狱创伤的生物使用治疗魔法时，必须通过DC 21的反制检定，否则法术无法生效。

zQUhdB7kvudfGv5Z.name: 移位 Reposition
zQUhdB7kvudfGv5Z.description:
触发 魔鬼的大砍刀打击命中目标

效果 魔鬼将目标朝任意方向移动5尺。目的地方格必须在魔鬼大砍刀的触及范围内。

此移动不会触发反应动作。

6zbiPHhWaAV5pJd6.name: 蠕动胡须 Wriggling Beard
6zbiPHhWaAV5pJd6.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 胡须魔进行一次胡须打击。此打击不受多重攻击减值，并且也不计入多重攻击减值。

6F6RBqJmz0JUvLc3.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

j5nOoy2JdxGbg96d.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
j5nOoy2JdxGbg96d.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

fOXEVyfWiHQRSyiC.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

T108hwN1OhACYQdQ.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

Basilisk.name: 石化蜥蜴 Basilisk
Basilisk.publicNotes:
The basilisk is an eight-legged reptile with a nasty disposition and the ability to turn creatures to stone with its gaze. Folklore holds that, much like for the cockatrice, the first basilisks hatched from leathery eggs laid by snakes and incubated by roosters, but little in the basilisk's physiology lends any credence to this claim.

A basilisk prefers to eat petrified flesh. Once a victim has been turned to stone, the basilisk crunches the fossilized corpse with its powerful jaws and lets its potent stomach acids do the rest. This digestive process is extremely slow and inefficient, causing the basilisk to move so lethargically that it appears as if in mid-petrification itself. This has even led to the saying "as slow as a well-fed basilisk." Certainly basilisks are well-known for their slow gait and slothful nature, but a predator that can turn its prey to stone with a glance hardly has much need for speed.

An adult basilisk is 13 feet long from head to tail and weighs roughly 300 pounds. These reptiles make hissing sounds when moving about that turns to a guttural gurgle when they're agitated. Though they are normally solitary creatures that come together only to mate and lay eggs, there are periodic reports of regions being infested with unusual numbers of basilisks. What causes these unusual congregations of basilisk activity is unknown.

For unknown reasons, weasels and ferrets are immune to the basilisk's stare, and they sometimes sneak into basilisk lairs while a parent is hunting in order to consume eggs or freshly hatched young. Some legends suggest that a basilisk's blood can transmute common stones into other material, but this is likely a case of witnesses misinterpreting the magical restoration of previously petrified creatures or body parts.

Nl15bkRTLq869IPi.name: Petrifying Glance
Nl15bkRTLq869IPi.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

触发 A creature within 30 feet that the basilisk can see starts its turn.

效果 The target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:20] save. If it fails, it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 minute as its body slowly stiffens.

tOCS9mkYR5K1LuOZ.name: Petrifying Gaze
tOCS9mkYR5K1LuOZ.description:
The basilisk stares at a creature it can see within 30 feet. That creature must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22] save. If it fails and has not already been slowed by Petrifying Glance or this ability, it becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}. If the creature was already slowed by this ability or Petrifying Glance, a failed save causes the creature to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified} permanently.

A creature petrified in this manner that is coated (not just splashed) with fresh basilisk blood (taken from a basilisk that has been dead no longer than 1 hour) is instantly restored to flesh.

A single basilisk contains enough blood to coat [[/br 1d3 #Medium Creatures]]{1d3 Medium creatures} in this manner.

Bloodseeker.name: 觅血者 Bloodseeker
Bloodseeker.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60尺
Bloodseeker.publicNotes:
Scourges of swamps and damp, abandoned places, bloodseekers are ravenous blood drinkers. Farmers curse the creatures for sucking their livestock dry. It is from such beleaguered people that the bloodseeker's regional name "stirge," possibly a corruption of the word "scourge," comes. Folk wisdom holds that the appearance of bloodseekers in a region signals a healthy herd of livestock, but more often it means bogs or old buildings that haven't been properly tended to. Certainly, no amount of folksy parable can assuage a farmer driven to destitution by a bloodseeker infestation. But despite their role as parasites, bloodseekers aren't hated by all villages. In some cases, the inhabitants of remote backwoods thorps even keep the things as pets or use them as doubtful medicinal "tools" to drain away unwanted humors or test for evil spirits possessing the blood. Worshippers of gods of pestilence and parasites often view bloodseekers as sacred to their faith and allow the creatures to feed freely from their bodies. In such societies, those who accidentally give too much are considered to have been "blessed" by the village's hungry god.

Bloodseekers seem to be constantly hungry, but they are not inherently malevolent. They can be scared away fairly easily and prefer to swiftly retreat rather than risk death. Some adventurers report that these creatures can be scared away by waving torches at the flying pests. However, bloodseekers are much bolder when encountered in larger numbers, as bringing down one victim lets an entire colony feed. Bloodseeker colonies are called clots, for obvious and disgusting reasons. If a lone bloodseeker finds a likely victim while its clot is nearby, it emits a high-pitched, keening noise to summon reinforcements.

Most humanoids avoid bloodseekers, but boggards sometimes cultivate bloodseeker nests around the perimeter of their territory. These colonies serve as a deterrent to intruders, and the boggards sometimes check for bloodseeker prey, collecting the hides or bodies of animals killed by the pests. Meals prepared from slain bloodseekers that have gorged on the blood of specific creatures are a staple among certain boggard communities. The boggards not only eat the actual bloodseekers, but they also make a gelled slurry from the drained blood.

A typical bloodseeker is about a foot long, with mottled, reddish-brown skin and a yellow underbelly. Its four wings resemble bat wings. When gorged with blood, the creature becomes bloated and pink, and it tends to wobble unsteadily in the air as it flies off to digest its meal.

QEvRlTqwOEac04ov.name: Attach
QEvRlTqwOEac04ov.description:
When a bloodseeker hits a target larger than itself, its barbed legs attach it to that creature. This is similar to grabbing the creature, but the bloodseeker moves with that creature rather than holding it in place.

The bloodseeker is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} while attached. If the bloodseeker is killed or pushed away while attached to a creature it has drained blood from, that creature takes [[/r {1}[persistent,bleed]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续 Bleed伤害}.

Escaping the attach or removing the bloodseeker in other ways doesn't cause bleed damage.

YwidZ8QmOJ85iLcw.name: Blood Drain
YwidZ8QmOJ85iLcw.description:
需求 The bloodseeker is attached to a creature.

效果 The bloodseeker uses its proboscis to drain blood from the creature it's attached to. This deals [[/r {1d4}]]{1d4伤害}, and the bloodseeker gains temporary Hit Points equal to the damage dealt.

A creature that has its blood drained by a bloodseeker is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} until it receives healing (of any kind or amount).

Boar.name: 野猪 Boar
Boar.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Boar.publicNotes:
Boars are omnivorous mammals, hunted heavily because their meat is considered a delicacy. Boars are most likely to attack humanoids either in self-defense or during their mating season in the winter months, when the males grow an extra inch of tissue to protect their organs as they fight off rivals. Of course, in some cultures boars are trained to become much more aggressive so they can fill the roles of warbeast and guardian. When such boars escape back into the wild, they can become true terrors of the region.

虽然家猪是农村生活不可或缺的一部分，但是野猪比家猪要危险多了。野猪是贪婪的掠食者，能毁坏农田。野猪随意繁殖，一对野猪可以迅速变成一大群。对农民来说野猪是尤其令人讨厌的，因为它会直接闯入食品店找食物，或者把花园里的根都刨出来充饥。

jmPDVPebOQ3XVOwA.name: Boar Charge
jmPDVPebOQ3XVOwA.description: The boar Strides twice and then makes a tusk Strike. As long as it moved at least 20 feet, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to its attack roll.

Boggard Warrior.name: 沼蜍勇士 Boggard Warrior
Boggard Warrior.publicNotes:
沼蜍勇士强化了单人作战的能力，而且他们更倾向于单打独斗，因为这样就没人和他争抢杀戮的机会了。他们以在追捕逃兵所具备的近乎达到超自然程度的专注力而闻名。

沼蜍人是好斗的两栖类人生物，他们生活在沼泽、湿地甚至部分雨林中。沼蜍人的成长过程首先从卵孵化为蝌蚪，他们会激烈地争夺食物甚至会在这场斗争中吃掉自己的兄弟姐妹。在接下来的3年里，幸存下来的沼蜍人在学习狩猎、制造和战争的基础知识——一切在力量至上的社会中幸存所需要的理解的知识——的同时，长出双手、双腿和肺部。大多数沼蜍人社会的顶端阶级是身胖体肥的沼泽先知（swampseer），他们懂得如何使用邪恶的神术。

momzHh7zAZRC7Hob.name: 沼泽奔行 Swamp Stride
momzHh7zAZRC7Hob.description: 沼蜍勇士能忽略由于沼泽地形特征产生的困难地形。

up8Xcig2FrwgbFfb.name: 恐惧鸣叫 Terrifying Croak
up8Xcig2FrwgbFfb.description:
沼蜍勇士发出可怕的鸣叫声。@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺范围}内的任何非沼蜍人都会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}，除非他们能够成功通过@Check[type:will|dc:18]豁免。

豁免中掷出大成功的生物会在1分钟内临时免疫该能力。

MEAPfylvHHHbTqOf.name: 蛙舌攫抓 Tongue Grab
MEAPfylvHHHbTqOf.description:
若沼蜍勇士用蛙舌命中1个生物，那么该生物会被他@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}。与一般的攫抓不同，该生物不会陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}，但是他也无法移动至沼蜍斥候的蛙舌触及范围之外。生物可以通过命中AC 15并造成至少3点挥砍伤害来切开蛙舌。

尽管这么做不会对沼蜍勇士造成伤害，但它可以使沼蜍勇士无法再次使用蛙舌打击，直至沼蜍勇士通过1星期的休息才能够重新使用蛙舌。

Brain Collector.name: 集脑怪 Brain Collector
Brain Collector.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Brain Collector.publicNotes:
The grotesque brain collectors originate from worlds far beyond the known solar system, and are part of a conglomeration of hostile aliens known collectively as the Dominion of the Black. Whether driven by their own schemes or directives from sinister overlords, brain collectors arrive in living starships to harvest the brains of intelligent creatures. These aberrations draw no nutrition from brains, instead storing them for analysis and as vessels for occult magical energies.

A brain collector's form evokes that of a tailless scorpion, but the pulsing brain-filled blisters that glisten along its back make them impossible to mistake for merely oversized arachnids. Baleful eyes glare from the joints on their legs, and the unsettling, intrusive whisper-thoughts they telepathically broadcast into the minds of those they seek to feed on can be interpreted as threats or promises alike.

Brain collectors have very little empathy for the denizens of any world they visit, despite the fact that certain cults venerate them, or the Dominion they hail from, as if they were gods. To brain collectors, terrestrial creatures are simply resources for their magical needs and occult powers. They have little interest in worshipping gods or being worshipped themselves, yet they do practice strange forms of religion of their own, in which they consider the primordial forces of deep space as worthy of faith and fear.

Xe4Ca7mHwdqwZ7wZ.name: 异能自发法术 Occult Spontaneous Spells

DKzOMGTsKsNpdgWc.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
DKzOMGTsKsNpdgWc.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

yXIHZuDl8K6TsgRu.name: 隐形仆役 Unseen Servant
yXIHZuDl8K6TsgRu.description:
你召唤一个隐形仆役（见边栏），你可以通过维持该法术的一部分来命令它。它会为你服务直到其生命值被减少到0，此时法术结束，或者直到你停止维持该法术。隐形仆役获得被召唤特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.j7NNPfZwD19BwSEZ]{隐形仆役} (无阵营)

9SCUupqh4itf7aTx.name: Brain Blisters
9SCUupqh4itf7aTx.description: A brain collector has seven brain blisters on its back that it uses to house stolen brains. A brain collector without all seven blisters full is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied} with a value equal to the number of empty blisters.

SE3QsBzRX2bmkrnR.name: Brain Loss
SE3QsBzRX2bmkrnR.description: If a brain collector takes 30 damage from a critical hit or takes 25 mental damage, it must succeed at a DC 26 save (@Check[type:fortitude|dc:26] for critical damage or @Check[type:will|dc:26] for mental damage) or one of its brain blisters is destroyed.

a8yy3kqZmWzMBKci.name: Brain Collector Venom
a8yy3kqZmWzMBKci.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素}, enfeebled 1, and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2}, and slowed 1 (1轮)

mvKy4fox7C9GJNq4.name: Collect Brain
mvKy4fox7C9GJNq4.description: The brain collector collects a brain of a creature that has been dead for no more than 1 minute. It can then use an Interact action to secure the brain in one of its empty brain blisters.

Brine Shark.name: 盐鲨 Brine Shark
Brine Shark.publicNotes:
Brine sharks are deadly elementals that roam the endless oceans of the Plane of Water.

水元素可能具有非凡的破坏力，但这往往并非出于本心；就像水可以给主物质位面带来生命一样，它的波浪可以冲击海岸，雨水也能淹没城市。水元素同样如此难以捉摸。

Fc10tuSKXi4OAWw6.name: Deep Plunge
Fc10tuSKXi4OAWw6.description: The brine shark dives straight down into the water, moving up to twice its swim Speed in a straight vertical line. It can use this ability while grabbing a creature.

Brontosaurus.name: 雷龙 Brontosaurus
Brontosaurus.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Brontosaurus.publicNotes:
Brontosauruses are truly gigantic behemoths, plodding herbivores large enough to be unafraid of all but the most massive predators. Brontosauruses have stout bodies and long, sinuous necks ending in small heads, allowing them to graze from the highest treetops. Their powerful tails are equally as long as their necks and provide counterbalances. Brontosauruses bear their bulk upon four stout legs. Although their feet are capable of crushing entire buildings, these herbivores are generally peaceful and considerate of where they step.

Most brontosauruses are dangerous only when defending themselves or their young, or when panicked enough to stampede. When roused in this way, however, the creatures are truly terrifying: their muscular tails sweep in great arcs and their massive feet crash down heedlessly onto the ground. A brontosaurus is 70 feet long and weighs more than 30 tons.

Brontosauruses belong to a group of dinosaurs known as sauropods, all of which are immense in size. The brachiosaurus is among the tallest of these dinosaurs, and the diplodocus among the longest, but it's likely that even larger behemoths exist.

这些巨大的爬行动物是世界原始时代的遗留物，现在仍然大量存在于偏僻的荒野中，或者在黑暗之地Darklands 的地下魔法洞穴中。蜥蜴族、半兽人、巨人和其他人形生物有时会把恐龙当作坐骑、守卫或猎兽。众所周知，人类和其他族裔也收集恐龙，把它们放在动物园里展出，或把它们当作异域宠物或守卫。这通常是富人或怪咖喜欢干的事情，但确实也有一些德鲁伊和其他自然的守护者能与恐龙亲密相处，甚至把它们作为动物伙伴。当恐龙在它们正常栖息地以外的地区安家时，通常可能是因为被圈养的恐龙逃进荒野造成的。

cHbcVpImsTWKA9DW.name: Tail Sweep
cHbcVpImsTWKA9DW.description:
The brontosaurus makes a tail Strike and compares the attack roll to the AC of up to three foes, each of whom must be within its tail's melee reach and adjacent to at least one other target. It rolls damage only once and applies it to each creature hit.

A Tail Sweep counts as two attacks for its multiple attack penalty.

Giant Anaconda.name: 巨蟒 Giant Anaconda
Giant Anaconda.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60尺
Giant Anaconda.publicNotes:
The monstrous giant anaconda is capable of swallowing whole creatures as big as horses-to say nothing of their riders. Although novice bushwhackers watch out for snakes that might drop on them from the jungle canopy above, giant anacondas are most commonly encountered in ponds and rivers, where they feed on prey including manatees and capybaras.

蛇的种类多样，从盘踞密林缠卷猎物的蟒蛇，到有着致命啮咬的剧毒蝰蛇。不管怎样，所有的蛇都是通过张开其双颚整个吞咽猎物，再利用充满力量的肌肉将食物从喉腔转移至胃部消化。

UVwLwFSrhe9YIUEC.name: Tighten Coils
UVwLwFSrhe9YIUEC.description:
触发 A creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained} by the giant anaconda attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape}.

效果 The DC of the Escape check is increased by 2.

VhwoW1Wd9SqC4MVO.name: Slither
VhwoW1Wd9SqC4MVO.description: The giant anaconda Strides, Climbs, or Swims up to half its Speed, pulling any creatures it has @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} with it.

765hQtSimhXMwS7m.name: Wrap in Coils
765hQtSimhXMwS7m.description:
需求 A Large or smaller creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained} in the giant anaconda's jaws.

效果 The giant anaconda moves the creature into its coils, freeing its jaws to make attacks, then uses Greater Constrict against the creature. The giant anaconda's coils can hold as many creatures as will fit in its space.

Giant Animated Statue.name: 巨型活化雕像 Giant Animated Statue
Giant Animated Statue.publicNotes:
As with any humanoid animated statues of Medium size, giant animated statues are used to guard locations of importance, but their increased size and power make them most useful in large vaults, spacious chambers, or outdoor locations. Animated objects of this strength and size are ideal for tasks and responsibilities usually performed by golems, and more powerful animated objects are thus all but unheard of.

通过某些仪式或是其他怪异的魔法，一些物品被赋予了生命的表征。活化物体形式多样，并且用途各异。下面罗列了一些典型的活化物体作为范例。这类生物中有很大一部分都被作为守卫，对那些毫无戒心的冒险者发起突然袭击。剩下的则是作为土豪们的玩物，被用于处理一些零活，诸如此类。

FHYZijWKqxyPWq4b.name: Construct Armor (Hardness 10)
FHYZijWKqxyPWq4b.description: Like normal objects, a giant animated statue has Hardness. This Hardness reduces any damage it takes by an amount equal to the Hardness. Once a giant animated statue is reduced to less than half its Hit Points, or immediately upon being damaged by a critical hit, its construct armor breaks and its Armor Class is reduced to 22.

v0n7ntTptPAp7TPz.name: Brazier
v0n7ntTptPAp7TPz.description:
The statue carries a wide brazier full of hot coals. To make flaming coal Strikes or use Burn Alive, the statue must have the brazier held in one hand or otherwise have it within reach.

Instead of targeting the statue with an attack, a creature can target the brazier directly. The brazier has the same AC and saves as the statue.

Dealing 15 cold damage to the brazier or dousing it with at least 2 gallons of water extinguishes the coals. This prevents the statue from using Burn Alive and causes its ranged attacks to no longer deal [[/r {2d8}[fire]]]{2d8火焰伤害}.

M203mlcBNFvAqyIJ.name: Burn Alive
M203mlcBNFvAqyIJ.description: The statue grinds a creature it has @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} into the red-hot coals of its brazier. The target takes [[/r {3d8}[fire]]]{3d8火焰伤害} and [[/r {1d8}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}.

Giant Bat.name: 巨蝙蝠 Giant Bat
Giant Bat.publicNotes:
While big bats are certainly not uncommon in dark caves and abandoned ruins and may instill fear in squeamish spelunkers, the so-called giant bat is a true monster, weighing well over 100 pounds and having a wingspan of nearly 15 feet. It primarily eats fruit and bugs, but can be incited to violence through fear or hunger. Giant bat attacks can quickly give rise to rumors of more dangerous monsters-many mistake these massive animals for some sort of demon or vampiric monster. But like other bats, giant bats are simply social and intelligent mammals. They are sometimes used as mounts by smaller humanoids, commonly those who hail from or dwell in mountainous or underground regions.

A wide range of bats dwell throughout the world. Most of these nocturnal animals are harmless insectivores, but deadly breeds of vampire bats and oversized bats the size of horses pose much more significant threats to adventurers.

8cb0jB7NP8JMjdkx.name: Echolocation (Precise) 40尺
8cb0jB7NP8JMjdkx.description: A bat can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range.

UufKTkmVCcXkrBVb.name: Wing Thrash
UufKTkmVCcXkrBVb.description:
触发 An adjacent enemy damages the giant bat.

效果 The bat makes one or two wing Strikes-one against the triggering creature and one against another adjacent creature.

Giant Centipede.name: 巨蜈蚣 Giant Centipede
Giant Centipede.publicNotes:
Most giant centipedes nest in small groups but hunt alone when they seek out food. Attempts to domesticate giant centipedes for use as guardians or pets generally end poorly, but some tribes of goblins, kobolds, and mitflits have developed effective methods of utilizing these vermin as guardians. Other tribes and some humanoid societies roast and eat centipedes, often with pungent peppers as a savory delicacy, although care must be taken in preparing the meal to avoid tainting the flesh with the creature's venom.

Hunters and scavengers that live amid dung and detritus, centipedes are a relatively common and often reviled threat faced by adventurers. Scurrying about with surprising speed on the scores of legs attached to their long, segmented bodies, centipedes strike with poisoned mandibles to slow and torment their prey with a vicious toxin before they settle down to feed in slow and disgusting leisure.

PIjZTZsbQlriq5X3.name: 巨蜈蚣毒 Giant Centipede Venom
PIjZTZsbQlriq5X3.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:14]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {1d12}[poison]]]{1d12毒素伤害}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}, and flat-footed (1轮)

Giant Wasp.name: 巨黄蜂 Giant Wasp
Giant Wasp.publicNotes:
Giant wasps are much more dangerous but less common than their smaller kin, and-to the relief of those who encounter them-they tend to be solitary.

While the common wasp poses little threat to a hardy adventurer aside from an uncomfortable sting, a large and aggressive swarm of these territorial insects-to say nothing of their oversized kin-can lay low an entire party of heroes. The wasps represented here are of the common variety also known as yellowjackets, but many other sorts of dangerous wasps exist, such as a Garundi variant that swarms in such great numbers that it can decimate entire villages, and the dreaded extraplanar hellwasps, which build their nests within the corpses of their victims.

K56mdzOHeveTvQ5D.name: Giant Wasp Venom
K56mdzOHeveTvQ5D.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:19]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 no effect (1轮)

阶段2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 2} (1轮)

阶段3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} (1轮)

0SVph284K2Css2S6.name: Implant Eggs
0SVph284K2Css2S6.description: The giant wasp lays eggs in an adjacent creature that is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}, exposing it to the wasp larva disease.

Crv6pRa77FWxBY6M.name: Wasp Larva
Crv6pRa77FWxBY6M.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:21]

阶段1 携带病原但没有不良效果([[/br 1d6 #days]]{1d6天})

阶段2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} ([[/br 1d3 #days]]{1d3天})

阶段3 [[/r {5d6}]]{5d6伤害}, larva emerges (disease ends)

Glabrezu.name: 迷诱魔 Glabrezu
Glabrezu.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Glabrezu.publicNotes:
Glabrezus are looming behemoths who revel in the act of twisting mortal desires into their ultimate ruin, betraying and manipulating as easily as they breathe. Desires granted by a glabrezu always come to fruition in the most destructive way possible, turning a wish or hope into a potent and devastating act of betrayal-although the long-term repercussions are not always immediately apparent. For example, a struggling weapon smith might wish for fame and skill at their craft, only to find that their best patron is a cruel and sadistic murderer who uses the weapons in bloody sprees. Or a lonely widower might have his desire granted in the form of a lost love returned to "life" as a vampire. Glabrezus are nothing if not creative in addressing a mortal's needs.

These massive demons have enormous pincers and a pair of smaller humanoid arms sprouting from their chests, but their size belies their skill at magic, and they possess formidable innate spells. Treachery demons arise from the souls of mortals engaged in treason and deception.

当一个有罪之人的灵魂受到审判并被送至无底深渊时，它会成为致命的魔族——恶魔。恶魔是罪恶的化身，从一般的罪恶例如愤怒、暴食，到更“特别”的堕落，例如对酷刑的痴迷或对祖国的背叛。恶魔一经诞生，它们便被双重目的驱动：其一是不断积累力量变得更强，其二是腐化凡人的灵魂让其被罪恶玷污。通过这种方式恶魔保证了有源源不断的新恶魔来支持它们在深渊中不断扩张的军队。

7aI3LWA9cnoKonHZ.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

QjDbAH40mGfKBBKn.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
QjDbAH40mGfKBBKn.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

xCKQqdctWOr8NXdK.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
xCKQqdctWOr8NXdK.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

NX1A0WbKKkzk7WUo.name: 困惑术(随意施法) Confusion (At Will)
NX1A0WbKKkzk7WUo.description:
你使用奇怪的能量波动扰乱了目标的思维，令其随机行动。法术效果由目标的意志豁免决定。你可以解消该法术。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标胡言乱语，并且获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 1}。

失败 目标获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.yblD8fOR1J8rDwEQ]{困惑 Confused} 1分钟。在其每个回合结束，它能尝试一次新豁免来结束困惑术。

大失败 目标困惑1分钟，并且没有提前结束的豁免。

升阶 (8环级) 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

V5tm2O5zVlteOfH8.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
V5tm2O5zVlteOfH8.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

J6HpVacgDjE0FPaz.name: 解除魔法(随意施法) Dispel Magic (At Will)
J6HpVacgDjE0FPaz.description: 你干扰法术或者效果中的魔法力量。尝试一次反制检定，对抗目标。如果你成功对抗一个法术效果，你将其反制。如果你成功对抗一个魔法物品，该物品成为该类型的普通物品，持续10分钟。这不会改变物体的非魔法性质。如果目标是一件神器或者类似的物品，你自动失败。

y8Hw2ikjEBXBnei9.name: 镜影术(随意施法) Mirror Image (At Will)
y8Hw2ikjEBXBnei9.description:
三个你的幻象在你的位置旋转，令想要攻击攻击你的人可能会命中一个幻象，而不是你本人。任何要命中你的攻击会有随机概率命中你的一个幻象，而不是你本身。如果三个幻象均存在，有四分之一的几率命中你（1d4骰出1）。如果两个幻象存在，有三分之一的概率命中你（1d6骰出1-2）。仅有一个幻象时，概率为二分之一（1d6骰出1-3）。

当一个幻象被命中时，它会被摧毁。如果一个攻击骰没有命中你的AC，但是也没有大失败，它会摧毁一个幻象，但是没有额外的效果（即使该攻击在失败时通常会有效果）。如果一次攻击骰大成功，并且将命中一个幻象，一个幻象被摧毁，并且攻击骰变为对你的一次成功攻击。当所有幻象被摧毁时，该法术结束。

jkqXGxKyDHGb9lqV.name: 幻象伪装(随意施法) Illusory Disguise (At Will)
jkqXGxKyDHGb9lqV.description:
你创造了一个令你看起来是另一个有相同体型的生物的幻觉。该生物和你相比，身高（6英寸内）和体重（50磅内）相近。该伪装通常足以掩盖你的身份，但不足以让你假扮另一个特定个人。该法术不会改变你的声音，气味，或者仪态。你可以改变你的衣服和佩带物的外观，例如让你的护甲看起来像是连衣裙。持握的物品不受影响，并且穿戴的物品离开你时会回复其本来外观。

施放幻象伪装视为欺骗（Deception）技能的 @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{假扮 Impersonate}用法的设立伪装；这忽视任何你可能会从扮作不熟悉生物中获得的减值，并且会赋予你在避免他人看破你的伪装的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训你也加上你的等级。你可以解消该法术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

升阶 (3环级) 你可以伪装成任何与你有相同体型的生物，甚至是特定个人。你必须见过该个人才能使用其外观。该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{法术效果：幻象伪装}

r7vHhfdRSulBJtov.name: Truth Vulnerability
r7vHhfdRSulBJtov.description: A glabrezu's lies sustain them, and the truth can destroy them. Whenever a revelation effect counteracts or reveals the glabrezu's illusions or the glabrezu fails a save against an effect that would prevent them from lying (such as @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.aewxsale5xWEPKLk]{Zone of Truth}), the demon takes [[/r {3d6}[mental]]]{3d6心灵伤害}. They take this damage only once per effect, even if the effect reveals multiple illusions or prevents multiple lies.

pl4CFdDU1X88olbS.name: Captive Rake
pl4CFdDU1X88olbS.description:
需求 A creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} in the glabrezu's pincer.

效果 The glabrezu pulls the grabbed creature up to 5 feet closer, then makes two claw Strikes against it. Those Strikes count as one attack when determining a treachery demon's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both Strikes.

fRDoPX53siUmNijE.name: Steady Spellcasting
fRDoPX53siUmNijE.description: When a reaction would disrupt a glabrezu's spell, the demon can attempt a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check, avoiding the disruption on a success.

8JslG7YLjptMOVC0.name: Sudden Betrayal
8JslG7YLjptMOVC0.description: A glabrezu can always use Deception when rolling initiative as long as they're aware of at least one opponent before initiative is rolled. When using Deception for initiative, the demon gains a +2 circumstance bonus to Deception.

bmbqZlQmEmeXm2DS.name: Treacherous Veil
bmbqZlQmEmeXm2DS.description: A glabrezu's @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.i35dpZFI7jZcRoBo]{Illusory Disguise} can allow it to appear as a creature of any size.

nA5lgWKn3AryAuFs.name: Twisted Desires
nA5lgWKn3AryAuFs.description: Once per month, a glabrezu can grant a mortal humanoid the effects of a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YfJTXyVGzLhM6V8U]{Miracle} spell granted by an Abyssal patron, though the glabrezu always perverts the miracle according to their own treacherous nature.

Hobgoblin General.name: 大地精将军 Hobgoblin General
Hobgoblin General.publicNotes:
Hobgoblin generals serve as leaders of entire armies and rulers of hobgoblin settlements. A general does not permit the luxuries of rule to soften them. They lead their forces on the field of battle and view this opportunity to excel in a fight at the head of an army as the true reward for a life spent honing one's skills in battle.

在外人看来，大地精应该是地精一族中最为开化的一支，但他们绝非友善平等的文明——正相反的是，大地精沉醉于所有和军国主义、暴政、残忍和破坏性搭上边的事物。大地精尤其热衷于战争，他们的整个文化便是建立在哺育和维持冲突的基础上，与此同时他们还证明了自身在战斗中的优越性。大地精高度组织化，他们善于组成团体来进行高效的工作，无论这个团体是一支小型突击队、一支徘徊的战帮、还是一支成建制的大军。大地精统治者往往不宣而战，而此类战争通常是为了获得领土或奴隶。大地精的站立身高与人类相仿，通常具有灰白色的皮肤。

大地精社会是按照军事路线进行组织的，每名大地精都是军队中的一员。每个社群中的大地精都具有自己的军阶，每名个体天生都雄心勃勃、渴望晋升。大地精总是想要证明自己无畏、无情、狡猾且强大。证明具备此类资质对于大地精个体来说是晋升的最大希望，但失败只意味着会遭到自身上级更为严酷的剥削。尽管冷酷无情，但大地精社会确实是真正由精英管理的社会，所有大地精无关年龄、性别或出身，都能通过自身的战争技艺而赢得同辈的尊重并行使权力。即便是那些在大地精社会中履行非战斗职能的个体——铁匠、建筑工、厨师、信使、军需官、等等——也都明白自己的事业是支持大地精大军的重要工作，不过这些大地精的军阶很难超过军人。每个人都为更大的整体出力，以确保大地精社会是最强大且尽可能高效地运作，任何掉队的人都会被军队所剔除，并被大地精社会视为累赘。大地精通常不会与其他种族进行贸易，甚至不会和其他大地精部族贸易，因为他们更倾向于用武力夺取自己想要的一切。

fWTtIUDtbSfOzgqv.name: General's Cry
fWTtIUDtbSfOzgqv.description: When a hobgoblin general rolls initiative, as long as they can perceive at least one foe, they can yell a mighty battle cry. The hobgoblin general attempts an Intimidate check to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.2u915NdUyQan6uKF]{挫败士气 Demoralize} a single foe within 60 feet as a free action. If successful, any ally with the goblin trait can, as its first action on its first turn of the combat, Stride up to double its speed as a single action.

1gKtaE366xqxGDdV.name: 列阵 Formation
1gKtaE366xqxGDdV.description: When it's adjacent to at least two other allies, the hobgoblin general gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 to Reflex saves against area effects.

M8RNAgw0OgnUOpKP.name: Polearm Critical Specialization
M8RNAgw0OgnUOpKP.description: On a critical hit, the target of the critical hit is moved 5 feet in a direction of the hobgoblin general's choice.

Hobgoblin Soldier.name: 大地精士兵 Hobgoblin Soldier
Hobgoblin Soldier.publicNotes:
Soldiers make up the bulk of hobgoblin society, whether that society is a village or a military unit.

在外人看来，大地精应该是地精一族中最为开化的一支，但他们绝非友善平等的文明——正相反的是，大地精沉醉于所有和军国主义、暴政、残忍和破坏性搭上边的事物。大地精尤其热衷于战争，他们的整个文化便是建立在哺育和维持冲突的基础上，与此同时他们还证明了自身在战斗中的优越性。大地精高度组织化，他们善于组成团体来进行高效的工作，无论这个团体是一支小型突击队、一支徘徊的战帮、还是一支成建制的大军。大地精统治者往往不宣而战，而此类战争通常是为了获得领土或奴隶。大地精的站立身高与人类相仿，通常具有灰白色的皮肤。

大地精社会是按照军事路线进行组织的，每名大地精都是军队中的一员。每个社群中的大地精都具有自己的军阶，每名个体天生都雄心勃勃、渴望晋升。大地精总是想要证明自己无畏、无情、狡猾且强大。证明具备此类资质对于大地精个体来说是晋升的最大希望，但失败只意味着会遭到自身上级更为严酷的剥削。尽管冷酷无情，但大地精社会确实是真正由精英管理的社会，所有大地精无关年龄、性别或出身，都能通过自身的战争技艺而赢得同辈的尊重并行使权力。即便是那些在大地精社会中履行非战斗职能的个体——铁匠、建筑工、厨师、信使、军需官、等等——也都明白自己的事业是支持大地精大军的重要工作，不过这些大地精的军阶很难超过军人。每个人都为更大的整体出力，以确保大地精社会是最强大且尽可能高效地运作，任何掉队的人都会被军队所剔除，并被大地精社会视为累赘。大地精通常不会与其他种族进行贸易，甚至不会和其他大地精部族贸易，因为他们更倾向于用武力夺取自己想要的一切。

R9CYDurnZPOlDiFg.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

OgkLVLhW0uOMdbGj.name: 列阵 Formation
OgkLVLhW0uOMdbGj.description: When it's adjacent to at least two other allies, the hobgoblin soldier gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saving throws. This bonus increases to +2 to Reflex saves against area effects.

Homunculus.name: 人造人 Homunculus
Homunculus.publicNotes:
A homunculus is a tiny servitor construct created by a crafter to serve as a spy, scout, messenger, or assistant. When a crafter first begins to study the art of creating constructs, she often crafts a homunculus first, since the creation process is simple and inexpensive due to a magical shortcut: the use of the creator's own blood. This forges a link between the homunculus and its master, causing the homunculus to gain a spark of the creator's intellect, as well as the same moral values and some of the creator's basic personality traits. Homunculi left to their own devices never stray far from their masters.

In most cases, a homunculus doesn't survive the death of its master for long. Deprived of its creator, a homunculus loses focus and grows increasingly self-destructive, and some even end up battering themselves to destruction. Rarely, a homunculus with a slain master survives the trauma with its mind intact, often seeing itself as its deceased creator's child or successor and attempting to further its creator's legacy as best it can. In such cases, and if the homunculus was in close proximity to its master upon that creature's death, a portion of the dead master's soul "infects" the surviving homunculus as it passes on to the afterlife. This doesn't result in a truly soulbound homunculus (see sidebar), since only a fragment of the soul is left behind, but this is still enough to grant the homunculus a greater personality, free will of its own, and perhaps most importantly, the ability to speak. Over time, a few of these "awakened" homunculi even go so far as to become convinced that they are the reincarnation of their prior masters, although their actual personalities never quite reach the depth and complexity of a truly living creature. They are, at best, caricatures of the master, and at worst they become awful, bitter-minded parodies of life itself. Still, a free-willed homunculus might pursue studies in its creator's class, becoming a unique creature with the abilities of that class if time and fortune permit.

Homunculi are created from a mixture of clay, ash, mandrake root, spring water, and a pint of the creator's own blood. It is possible for a separate donor to provide the blood, but the process is more difficult.

WLKYWXEiwmc9uCr5.name: Master Link
WLKYWXEiwmc9uCr5.description: A homunculus can't speak, but it is telepathically linked to its creator. It can share information back and forth, including its master's knowledge and everything the homunculus hears. The range of this link is 1,500 feet. The homunculus adopts the same alignment as its creator and is utterly faithful. If the homunculus is destroyed, the master takes [[/r {2d10}[mental]]]{2d10心灵伤害}. If the master is slain, the homunculus becomes mindless, claims its current location as its lair, and instinctively attacks anyone who comes near.

WhTbPOtlxlYvCpJ6.name: Homunculus Poison
WhTbPOtlxlYvCpJ6.description:
A homunculus has one dose of poison in a reservoir in its head. It can refill this poison from its reserves with an Interact action.

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:15]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}

Krooth.name: 食鳄兽 Krooth
Krooth.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉（模糊感官）60尺
Krooth.publicNotes:
食鳄兽，有时也被称为“食鳄怪”，是出没于沼泽和湿地的迅速而致命的捕食者。虽然它们以捕食鳄鱼、短吻鳄和其他几乎所有长肉的生物而闻名，但是它们更喜爱的猎物是蜥蜴人（lizardfolk）、蟾蜍人（boggards）和恐龙们。

食鳄兽可能单独出现，也可能成群出现。雄性的食鳄兽是独行并且领地意识强烈的生物——凶狠、胆大、嗜血。而另一方面，雌性食鳄兽可能会躲避潜在的天敌，但是当幼崽受到威胁的时候，它们会立即变得暴力。它们的幼崽是如此的脆弱，以至于一群雌性食鳄兽会聚在一起共同抚养后代，它们会派出较小的群体去寻找食物，而其他成员则留下来照看幼崽。食鳄兽每四五年交配一次，交配场面令人毛骨悚然。一整群雌性食鳄兽会成群结队的寻找一只落单的雄性食鳄兽，在一场持续一整天的狂欢中争夺它们的战利品。交配结束之后，雌性们会杀死它们的配偶，并吃掉它营养丰富的肉身，尤其是它的器官。这些器官含有一种特殊的能有利于妊娠的化合物。许多自然学家愿意出高价购买雄性食鳄兽的新鲜遗骸，这样他们就可以研究这种生物血液和器官的奇异特性。此外，食鳄兽拥有带毒的、中空的牙齿，当食鳄兽噬咬猎物的时候，一颗牙齿会脱落并留在猎物身上，中空的牙齿会像导流管一样让猎物的血液源源不断地流出来。

无论雄性还是雌性的食鳄兽似乎都很讨厌地精及其亚种的肉，尤其是熊地精的。这并不意味着食鳄兽会放过地精，尤其是那些威胁到它们后代的地精。但它们通常只用爪子和尾巴来杀死地精，并且之后会非常仔细地清理自己。
Krooth.allSaves: 对抗恐惧时所有豁免有+4状态加值

ouaeCAenWwGPbpdb.name: 灵敏嗅觉（模糊感官）60尺 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60尺

LBCwTLpo7BDaFfpf.name: 对抗恐惧时所有豁免有+4状态加值

qY4Gqits5ZaytjDY.name: 痛苦狂怒 Pain Frenzy
qY4Gqits5ZaytjDY.description:
当食鳄兽遭受重击时，它的攻击和伤害检定有+2状态加值，持续直到它的下一轮结束。在狂怒持续期间它无法使用反应动作。

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.tJx9B2e3AET6PbJD]{效果：痛苦狂怒}

QRArjmTp1QFxOrMG.name: 毒牙 Poison Tooth
QRArjmTp1QFxOrMG.description:
需求 食鳄兽在本轮最新的动作中进行一次牙咬打击

效果 食鳄兽在被命中的目标身上留下一枚牙齿。目标受到@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed1d6.success]和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。只要牙齿不移除，两者都无法被治愈。安全地移除牙齿需要通过DC26的急救检定。此@Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.MHLuKy4nQO2Z4Am1]{急救 Administer First Aid}动作只能消除流失状态，并不能自动止血或稳定伤势。

dmZlzmRsiydMPknc.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

Lamia Matriarch.name: 拉米亚女族长 Lamia Matriarch
Lamia Matriarch.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Lamia Matriarch.publicNotes:
The brilliant and powerful lamia matriarchs possess boundless ambition, always seeking to bring more people and territory into the clutches of their kind. Consequently, the become rulers of other lamia. For all their cruelty toward other creatures, they're fierce protectors of other lamia, and consequently they quickly come to rule cults or warbands. Regardless of the lamia's gender, these ascended lamias are always known as matriarchs. Rather than leonine limbs, a lamia matriarch's lower body is formed in the winding coils of a giant snake. They're also set apart by the occult power they pursue, and some have even have grand designs to break the animalistic curse that transformed them. However, every attempt so far has led to the matriarch's fall.

Lamias are bloodthirsty victims of an ancient curse for which they blame the gods. Most lamias are humanoid from the waist up but have the lower bodies of beasts and monsters. Sinister magic comes naturally to a lamia, and they prefer the use of illusions and enchantments to deceive prey for later consumption, or simply to torture.

S32QCqZ8XlolYIfE.name: 异能自发法术 Occult Spontaneous Spells

LfvR6qODwUM0OxAB.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

QkfbFW865cnFI3HV.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
QkfbFW865cnFI3HV.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

6GxNeMKadhnSQa6b.name: 幻象伪装(随意施法) Illusory Disguise (At Will)
6GxNeMKadhnSQa6b.description:
你创造了一个令你看起来是另一个有相同体型的生物的幻觉。该生物和你相比，身高（6英寸内）和体重（50磅内）相近。该伪装通常足以掩盖你的身份，但不足以让你假扮另一个特定个人。该法术不会改变你的声音，气味，或者仪态。你可以改变你的衣服和佩带物的外观，例如让你的护甲看起来像是连衣裙。持握的物品不受影响，并且穿戴的物品离开你时会回复其本来外观。

施放幻象伪装视为欺骗（Deception）技能的 @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.k5nW4jGyXD0Oq9LR]{假扮 Impersonate}用法的设立伪装；这忽视任何你可能会从扮作不熟悉生物中获得的减值，并且会赋予你在避免他人看破你的伪装的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训你也加上你的等级。你可以解消该法术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

升阶 (3环级) 你可以伪装成任何与你有相同体型的生物，甚至是特定个人。你必须见过该个人才能使用其外观。该法术也会伪装你的声音和气味，并且该法术获得听觉特征。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.3Ktyd5F9lOPo4myk]{法术效果：幻象伪装}

z4wuFZXT6O7ZpC4m.name: 幻象造物(随意施法) Illusory Object (At Will)
z4wuFZXT6O7ZpC4m.description:
你创造一个固定物体的视觉幻象。该幻象必须能完全处于法术区域中。该物体会自然活动，但是不会发出声音或者产生气味。举例而言，幻象瀑布中会出现水并流下，但是它会是安静的。

当生物触摸幻像，或者使用搜索（Seek）动作来检查它时，该生物可以尝试不相信你的幻术。

升阶 (2环级) 你的幻象也会发出合适的声音，产生正常气味，并且摸起来也很正常。该法术获得听觉特征。该持续时间增加到1小时。

升阶 (5环级) 如2环级，但是持续时间为无限。

CMeCQrhGto6e8KFb.name: 腹语术(随意施法) Ventriloquism (At Will)
CMeCQrhGto6e8KFb.description:
当你说话，或者通过喉嗓发出其他的声音，你可以令你的声音如同从60尺内的其他位置发出，并且你可以随着你说话，自由改变该发声位置。任何听见该声音的生物可以尝试不相信的你的幻术。

升阶 (2环级) 该法术时间增加到1小时，并且你也可以改变其语调，音质等声音属性。在生物尝试不相信你的幻术前，它必须主动尝试一次察觉检定，或者使用动作与声音交互。

RHsGeVOoFFoGYyZ1.name: Change Shape
RHsGeVOoFFoGYyZ1.description:
The lamia matriarch can take on the appearance of a Medium humanoid. This doesn't change their Speed or their attack and damage modifiers with their Strikes, but it does prevent them from using their cursed touch. Each lamia matriarch has a fixed humanoid form-they cannot adopt a different appearance each time they use this ability, and the appearance resembles that of their upper torso when in their true form.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

TyonmqwWHejYuBAN.name: Dervish Strike
TyonmqwWHejYuBAN.description: The lamia matriarch makes a scimitar attack against each enemy within reach. Each attack counts toward their multiple attack penalty, but the penalty does not increase until after all the attacks. The first enemy she damages is subject to matriarch's caress.

PycbJPVh46UXYc9R.name: Matriarch's Caress
PycbJPVh46UXYc9R.description: The lamia touches a creature, who must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} (or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} on a critical failure). If the target fails additional saves against this ability, the condition value increases by 1 if failed or 2 if critically failed (to a maximum of stupefied 4). This condition value decreases by 1 every 24 hours.

Lantern Archon.name: 明灯圣使 Lantern Archon
Lantern Archon.publicNotes:
Friendly, curious, and eternally optimistic, lantern archons embody the virtue of hope. They are formed of living light given corporeal shape, and they serve as beacons, guiding mortals out of their darkest moments and toward the path of righteousness. Their luminous bodies can flicker with the subtlety of a candle flame or flare up like a torch. Lantern archons can control all aspects of their light as easily as other creatures control their facial expressions, leading them to change color, twinkle, and otherwise dim and brighten in time with their actions and words. While effervescent and chipper in conversation, lantern archons are impressively stoic mobile support troops and guardians in times of conflict, and are capable of uniting to form powerful warriors of light called gestalts.

圣使是天堂的守护者、世间混乱与邪恶的敌人。他们公开反击魔族的蔓延，但也悄悄在凡人心中培育美德的种子，教导物质界的居民如何以荣誉和正直行事，制定公正的法律，并抛弃罪恶与诱惑。

圣使们住在广袤无垠的七层天堂山（mountain of Heaven）。他们自那些在山巅花园中应允于一个神秘之声的凡人灵魂中显现。在那里，他们宣誓永远为正义服务并转变为全新的圣使形态。在他们井然有序的蜕变中，新的圣使最初是明灯圣使（lantern archons）或是其他次级形态，随着他们的美德和成就的增长，（他们能）转变为更高阶的圣使。每一位圣使都代表着一种特殊的美德，如希望、仁慈、正义或勇气，他们在展现此类美德的凡人面前现身以获得力量。由于执政官极其守序的天性，他们有时会发现自己与灵使争执不下。

xlUnQcjrxeMXu5Cd.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

t66rwfJhvjrEDP2J.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (At Will) (Evil Only)
t66rwfJhvjrEDP2J.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

3aQmojgOn0OyqrYB.name: 报复打击 Retributive Strike
3aQmojgOn0OyqrYB.description:
Damage Reduction 3

A lantern archon can also make a Retributive Strike with its light ray.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.RetributiveStrike]

4ESvAYPL0OBd4s6Q.name: Gestalt
4ESvAYPL0OBd4s6Q.description:
Nine lantern archons can use this activity, all within 1 round of the first, to merge together to form a composite being for 7 rounds that appears as a glowing warrior of light.

The @Compendium[pf2e.pathfinder-bestiary.gztjujplfVCBVXv0]{Gestalt} has the base statistics of a legion archon (AC, saving throws, attacks, skills, Speeds, and so on) but the spells and special abilities of a lantern archon. Additionally, it has a ranged light ray Strike ([[/r 1d20+18 #Light Ray]]{Light Ray +18}, Damage [[/r {3d4}[fire] + {3d4}[good] # Light Ray]]{3d4 fire and 3d4 good}), and the bonus from its Lantern of Hope increases to +3.

When the gestalt separates, its remaining Hit Points are divided evenly among the lantern archons, and if the gestalt had fewer than 9 HP, some of the lantern archons die.

Gs9kfR3NhiKWAumE.name: Lantern of Hope
Gs9kfR3NhiKWAumE.description:
The lantern archon shines as a beacon of hope.

Good allies within @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} gain a +1 status bonus to damage rolls and to saving throws against @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair}.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.37wbBpPBi5eBtNqM]{效果: Lantern of Hope}

Lantern Archon (Gestalt).name: 明灯圣使(格式塔) Lantern Archon (Gestalt)
Lantern Archon (Gestalt).allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Lantern Archon (Gestalt).publicNotes:
Friendly, curious, and eternally optimistic, lantern archons embody the virtue of hope. They are formed of living light given corporeal shape, and they serve as beacons, guiding mortals out of their darkest moments and toward the path of righteousness. Their luminous bodies can flicker with the subtlety of a candle flame or flare up like a torch. Lantern archons can control all aspects of their light as easily as other creatures control their facial expressions, leading them to change color, twinkle, and otherwise dim and brighten in time with their actions and words. While effervescent and chipper in conversation, lantern archons are impressively stoic mobile support troops and guardians in times of conflict, and are capable of uniting to form powerful warriors of light called gestalts.

圣使是天堂的守护者、世间混乱与邪恶的敌人。他们公开反击魔族的蔓延，但也悄悄在凡人心中培育美德的种子，教导物质界的居民如何以荣誉和正直行事，制定公正的法律，并抛弃罪恶与诱惑。

圣使们住在广袤无垠的七层天堂山（mountain of Heaven）。他们自那些在山巅花园中应允于一个神秘之声的凡人灵魂中显现。在那里，他们宣誓永远为正义服务并转变为全新的圣使形态。在他们井然有序的蜕变中，新的圣使最初是明灯圣使（lantern archons）或是其他次级形态，随着他们的美德和成就的增长，（他们能）转变为更高阶的圣使。每一位圣使都代表着一种特殊的美德，如希望、仁慈、正义或勇气，他们在展现此类美德的凡人面前现身以获得力量。由于执政官极其守序的天性，他们有时会发现自己与灵使争执不下。

xlUnQcjrxeMXu5Cd.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

t66rwfJhvjrEDP2J.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (At Will) (Evil Only)
t66rwfJhvjrEDP2J.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

3aQmojgOn0OyqrYB.name: 报复打击 Retributive Strike
3aQmojgOn0OyqrYB.description:
Damage Reduction 9

A lantern archon can also make a Retributive Strike with its light ray.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.RetributiveStrike]

aivVKzlEOwieqgj1.name: Flame of Justice
aivVKzlEOwieqgj1.description:
A gestalt's spirit of righteousness manifests in its hands as a mighty two-handed sword called the flame of justice.

A gestalt can throw its flame of justice as a ranged weapon. If disarmed or thrown, the flame of justice vanishes after landing or dealing damage and reappears in the gestalt's hands again instantly.

On a critical hit, the fire damage from the flame of justice deals maximum damage ([[/r {6}[fire]]]{6} on the d6) before being doubled for the critical hit, and the target takes [[/r {1d10}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}.

Gs9kfR3NhiKWAumE.name: Lantern of Hope
Gs9kfR3NhiKWAumE.description:
The lantern archon shines as a beacon of hope.

Good allies within @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} gain a +3 status bonus to damage rolls and to saving throws against @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.GaRQlC9Yw1BGKHfN]{Crushing Despair}.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.hdsl0XexqEL2emE3]{效果: Lantern of Hope (Gestalt)}

Leaf Leshy.name: 叶莱西 Leaf Leshy
Leaf Leshy.publicNotes:
Leaf leshys are diminutive protectors of forests clad in pine cone armor and hats of fruit, flowers, or leaves. They enjoy mock battles but act cautiously in real ones.

莱西是具有智慧的植物，是原始荒野和大地力量的守护者。它们起初是由强大的精类生物创造的，当一个纯熟的原能施法者——通常是德鲁伊——将自然精魂和一个精心培育的当地的植物结合起来的时候，莱西就诞生了。创造莱西所需求的仪式和材料因莱西的类型而异。一般莱西会在具有重要自然意义的地方获得生命，例如树精林地、德鲁伊石环、仙女之环或巨大的自然奇观中。

VRZR3SXqGz9bOL7Z.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

J8d6vqQrqGXi53bU.name: 翠绿爆发 Verdant Burst
J8d6vqQrqGXi53bU.description: When a leaf leshy dies, a burst of primal energy explodes from its body, restoring [[/r {1d4}[healing]]]{1d4生命值} to each plant creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:30]. This area is filled with tree saplings, becoming difficult terrain. If the terrain is not a viable environment for these trees, they wither after 24 hours.

LqM7JU0cOL7itoch.name: Change Shape
LqM7JU0cOL7itoch.description:
The leaf leshy transforms into a Small tree. This ability otherwise uses the effects of @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.dileJ0Yxqg76LMvu]{树化术 Tree Shape}.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

WPtFVQLHQ2T2WxY7.name: Deafening Blow
WPtFVQLHQ2T2WxY7.description:
When a leaf leshy hits with its seedpod Strike, the target must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:16] save.

大成功 The target is unaffected and temporarily immune for 24 hours.

成功 The target is unaffected.

失败 The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} for 1 round.

大失败 The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened} for 1 minute.

4vfOgL2x3vJgpsBu.name: Glide
4vfOgL2x3vJgpsBu.description: The leshy glides gently through the air, moving 5 feet toward the ground and up to 25 feet forward. As long as the leshy spends at least 1 action gliding each round, it remains in the air at the end of each turn. For the purpose of determining damage from falls, a leaf leshy always treats falls as if they were 20 feet shorter.

Legion Archon.name: 军团圣使 Legion Archon
Legion Archon.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Legion Archon.publicNotes:
Despite their flaming blades and heavy armor, legion archons are the diplomats of peace among the archons, preferring justice via compromise and mutual benefit rather than justice by the sword. Nonetheless, when forced to fight against fiendish powers-especially fiends that embody the sin of wrath-legion archons don't hesitate in battle, mounting offensives under divine commanders like Iomedae.

圣使是天堂的守护者、世间混乱与邪恶的敌人。他们公开反击魔族的蔓延，但也悄悄在凡人心中培育美德的种子，教导物质界的居民如何以荣誉和正直行事，制定公正的法律，并抛弃罪恶与诱惑。

圣使们住在广袤无垠的七层天堂山（mountain of Heaven）。他们自那些在山巅花园中应允于一个神秘之声的凡人灵魂中显现。在那里，他们宣誓永远为正义服务并转变为全新的圣使形态。在他们井然有序的蜕变中，新的圣使最初是明灯圣使（lantern archons）或是其他次级形态，随着他们的美德和成就的增长，（他们能）转变为更高阶的圣使。每一位圣使都代表着一种特殊的美德，如希望、仁慈、正义或勇气，他们在展现此类美德的凡人面前现身以获得力量。由于执政官极其守序的天性，他们有时会发现自己与灵使争执不下。

oWvZ2SZzMcdxkRRj.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

m7io5ugLsLLhISWa.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
m7io5ugLsLLhISWa.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

lGrwi0lRYYYUqgHg.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
lGrwi0lRYYYUqgHg.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

3xoqcUVujuOLU773.name: Menacing Guardian
3xoqcUVujuOLU773.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Enemies that start their turn in the area or enter it must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:23] save.

On a failure, they take a -1 status penalty to attack rolls, spell rolls, and damage rolls against any other target while in the aura for 24 hours or until they damage the archon, whichever comes first. On a critical failure, they can't use hostile actions against any other target while in the area for 24 hours or until they damage the archon, whichever comes first.

Regardless of the result, a creature is then temporarily immune to further menacing guardian auras for 24 hours.

82KaMhK0BRaEZMbn.name: 报复打击 Retributive Strike
82KaMhK0BRaEZMbn.description:
Damage Reduction 9

A legion archon can also make a Retributive Strike by throwing its flame of justice.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.RetributiveStrike]

tFRnP7KsOLmYb44P.name: Archon's Door
tFRnP7KsOLmYb44P.description:
Once per day, if an archon sees another creature cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.VlNcjmYyu95vOUe8]{次元门 Dimension Door}, it can cast an innate dimension door (heightened to 5th level) within 1 round to attempt to follow that creature to the maximum distance of the archon's dimension door.

If the archon's dimension door has enough distance, the archon appears the same distance and direction from the creature as before either used dimension door.

nVzYnoOpZcD3KXg9.name: Flame of Justice
nVzYnoOpZcD3KXg9.description:
A legion archon's spirit of righteousness manifests in its hands as a mighty two-handed sword called the flame of justice.

A legion archon can throw its flame of justice as a ranged weapon. If disarmed or thrown, the flame of justice vanishes after landing or dealing damage and reappears in the legion archon's hands again instantly.

On a critical hit, the fire damage from the flame of justice deals maximum damage ([[/r {6}[fire]]]{6} on the d6) before being doubled for the critical hit, and the target takes [[/r {1d10}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害}.

Lemure.name: 劣魔 Lemure
Lemure.publicNotes:
These shapeless masses of quivering flesh are the least of devilkind. Pathetic creatures from Hell's first layer, lemures roam alongside damned and suffering souls. Pit fiends can combine the essence of a mob of lemures to concentrate their collective wickedness with a single form, granting it an infernal sentience and transforming it into a more powerful devil (see the pit fiend's Devil Shaping ability).

作为散播腐败和征服的大师，魔鬼们试图诱惑凡人生命加入它们对亵渎事物的追求中来，并将暴政传播到各个世界。它们向人类提出各种条件，从签署一份地狱契约而获取的强大力量，到向邪神低语换来的扭曲恩惠，甚至还有许多更微妙的交易。那些屈服于这些诱惑的人，会发现自己死后会在地狱的深坑中遭受无尽的折磨，在那里唯一逃脱的希望就是晋升为地狱中的魔鬼。从士兵、学者到检察官、律师、法官和刽子手，每一种恶魔在维持冷酷无情的地狱官僚机器上扮演着特定的角色，这就是地狱。低级的劣魔和小魔鬼服从于更强大和专业的恶魔，比如契约魔和狂怒魔，做着卑下的工作，而最强大的深狱炼魔指挥着整个地狱军团。

XAY63LFVYjJCN65F.name: 高等黑暗视觉 Greater Darkvision

Wsl0Qe07OtlNGmr0.name: Subservience
Wsl0Qe07OtlNGmr0.description:
Lemures have little drive of their own, but other devils can take command of them. A non-lemure devil can issue a command to all lemures within 60 feet of it with a single action, which has the auditory and concentrate traits. The devil picks one of the following orders lemures can understand, and the lemures follow that order. The command and its effects end once the commander is out of the lemure's sight, a new command is issued by the same or another devil, or the lemure dies.

  • Kill The lemure attacks one target the commander singles out and gains a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls against the target.
  • Defend The lemure circles the commander and attacks any creature that comes near. It gains a +1 circumstance bonus to AC and saves.
  • Fetch The lemure gains a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed and attempts to get an object or person the commander singles out. It attacks anyone and anything that gets in the way.
  • Work The lemure performs drudge work dictated by the commander.

Lesser Death.name: 次级死神 Lesser Death
Lesser Death.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Lesser Death.senses: 黑暗视觉, status sight; see invisibility, 真视术
Lesser Death.publicNotes:
No one is quite sure what lesser deaths are, though some claim that they are avatars of the grim reaper. Unlike that strange hunter, however, lesser deaths hunt in packs on rare occasions. More often than not, they manifest from cursed magic items. Other times, they are just the enactors of death, hunting in the same way the grim reaper does- silently, with neither remorse nor quarter. Rarely, multiple lesser deaths work together to cull a large population, their scythes cutting through crowds and leaving entire cities devoid of life, inspiring false rumors of multiple grim reapers.

收割者死神坚定不移的死亡化身。它沉寂如坟墓，如同时间本身一样无可避免，这个传说中的存在追捕并杀死那些逃避死亡太久的生物。有时候收割者死神会毫无预兆地降临，完成那些其他生物无法完成的任务。收割者死神不侍奉神祇、魔族（fiend）、或御衡者（aeon）。招魂者（psychopomps）和天族（celestials）们既鄙视又畏惧它，但很少有人敢于阻挡它的道路。它就像某种永恒的瘟疫，杀死那些试图将多元宇宙从它的影响下治愈的存在。收割者死神绝世独立，秉持自己下达的判决，一旦接近它的猎物，无论凡人或不朽者的恳求和辩解它都充耳不闻。它的动机从未为人所知，但无论出于何种目的，其结果都是不可动摇、无法改变的。

虽然传说认为收割者死神会在每个人死的时候出现在他们面前，但真相其实有些出入。执行这种守夜其实是招魂者的职责范围，它们是不朽的存在，负责保护和引导死后凡人的灵魂前往来世。死神对保护或引导灵魂其实没什么兴趣。相反，它由诞生自黑暗国度末日荒原（Abaddon）的邪恶进程所驱使，那里是天启四驭者（Horsemen of the Apocalypse）们所统治的国度。的确，收割者死神和死亡驭者卡戎（Charon, the Horseman of Death）之间有许多相似之处，但没有任何证据表明这两个强大的存在彼此合作。相反，冷酷的死神本身就是末日荒原的具现，这方面被一些人认为是神秘的第一驭者（First Horseman）的化身。当收割者死神降临到某个世界时，它并非作为仁慈的天使，而是作为一个无情的生命收割机而存在。那些落入收割者死神手中的生物不一定是注定该死的，他们也一视同仁地被选择、被追猎、被谋杀。

也许那些关于死神的传说中，最让人不寒而栗的是它作为一个唯一实体的本质。因为有些人不相信只有唯一的死神存在于世。这些切切私语描述了一个阴谋集团，其中至少有九个死神这样的生物，作为不可言说的“熵”的仆人从现实世界中剔除活人的存在。根据一些死亡邪教的教义，收割者死神的最终目标是结束整个生死循环，成为空虚宇宙静默的主宰。

eUtG7jyrUZUQhm6G.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

R3C7okiNrevQjh4K.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
R3C7okiNrevQjh4K.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

E9rT9B8EjzqD6Ox9.name: 加速术(恒定法术) Haste (Constant)
E9rT9B8EjzqD6Ox9.description:
魔法强化了目标，令其行动迅速。它获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened}状态，并且每轮可以使用该额外动作以打击（Strike）或者移动（Stride）。

升阶 (7环级) 你能以至多6个生物为目标。

BcNlhGDkMuQwNYSZ.name: 识破隐形(恒定法术) See Invisibility (Constant)
BcNlhGDkMuQwNYSZ.description:
你能看见 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 的生物和物体。对你而言它们看起来如同半透明一般，并且对你视为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术的持续时间为8小时。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{法术效果：识破隐形}

uCvZSYozUXxyyf1b.name: Death's Grace
uCvZSYozUXxyyf1b.description: The lesser death can choose whether or not it counts as undead for effects that affect undead differently. Even if it does not count as undead, the grim reaper still never counts as a living creature.

hwUA4Pu9qRQurhWj.name: Status Sight
hwUA4Pu9qRQurhWj.description: The lesser death automatically knows the Hit Points, conditions, afflictions, and emotions of all creatures it can see.

ZeFESJTxEPFbLeiy.name: 负能量治疗 Negative Healing
ZeFESJTxEPFbLeiy.description:
A lesser death can choose whether or not it takes positive damage.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.NegativeHealing]

Ohby2hZPzWDoCkLo.name: Aura of Misfortune
Ohby2hZPzWDoCkLo.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:20]{20尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Living creatures in the aura must roll twice on all d20 rolls and use the lower result.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.QoneHsjZKtGHWlam]{效果: Aura of Misfortune}

L107mBB0Pcsz3T2q.name: Lurking Death
L107mBB0Pcsz3T2q.description:
触发 A creature within 60 feet makes a ranged attack or uses an action that has the concentrate, manipulate, or move trait.

效果 The lesser death teleports to a square adjacent to the triggering creature and makes a melee Strike against it. If the Strike hits, the lesser death disrupts the triggering action.

UJUSN0sChxOuRWw8.name: Infuse Weapon
UJUSN0sChxOuRWw8.description: Any scythe gains the agile trait, can't be disarmed, and becomes a +2 Greater Striking Keen scythe while the lesser death wields it.

Leukodaemon.name: 疫病邪魔 Leukodaemon
Leukodaemon.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Leukodaemon.publicNotes:
These skull-headed, vulture-winged daemons are harbingers of pestilence and servants of their patron Horseman, Apollyon. Manifestations of evil souls who perished from disease in life, leukodaemons work tirelessly to spread disease across all the worlds of the multiverse. More than any other daemon, leukodaemons cooperate with each other and those who conjure them to mortal worlds to spread sickness and plague, eschewing personal glory for end results.

作为荒凉恐怖的末日荒原的居民，邪魔被塑造成致力于于毁灭一切形式的生命。它们会尝试用最痛苦和最恐怖的方式杀死每个凡人，所有这些都是为了服侍被称为天启的四驭者（Four Horsemen）。每一种邪魔代表一种不同的死亡方式，它们的力量几乎总是为了传播这种特定的死亡方式而存在。通过这种力量，它们试图把所有生灵都拖入绝望的深渊，并让所有灵魂泯灭。

虽然那些把邪魔召唤到主物质位面的人通常会利用这些生物的破坏力和腐化能力来达到自己的目的，但是邪魔们自身也在不断寻找传播恐惧、怀疑和绝望的方法。通常邪魔会隐藏自己的阴谋并替其他魔族（fiends）办事，这造成的混乱会加剧凡人们的恐惧。

虽然所有邪魔族都会试图引诱凡人们堕入邪道，用这种方法增加自身的数量和自己家乡位面的力量，但是邪魔对凡人灵魂的渴望则更进一步，并会使用各种方法——尤其是狂躁邪魔的灵魂宝石——来引诱他们。在末日荒原以及其他很多多重宇宙中令人生畏的国度里，灵魂是美味的飨宴、是交易的货币同时也是魔法力量的源泉。而邪魔则是所有这些地方的居民中最强大的食客、商人和灵魂“资源”的使用者。

1dUCb8dBnYQ0kq4t.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

3VlLp5tyHAozkdRS.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
3VlLp5tyHAozkdRS.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

zDBzZ3PMzyUuWTwx.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限善良) Detect Alignment (At Will) (Good Only)
zDBzZ3PMzyUuWTwx.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

uGne7svJszeghy3d.name: Plaguesense 60尺
uGne7svJszeghy3d.description: A leukodaemon senses any creature with a disease, and it knows the type and current stage of all diseases carried by any creature within range.

GoEK3KTZm6r0vhaU.name: Infectious Aura
GoEK3KTZm6r0vhaU.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Leukodaemons radiate infection. All creatures within 30 feet of a leukodaemon take a -2 status penalty to saves against disease effects. If a creature within range contracts or progresses a disease, all adjacent creatures are exposed to the same disease, at the same DC.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.T2tfacwoOozQfsIz]{效果: Infectious Aura}

cPq1a6i8dlZo6SPu.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
cPq1a6i8dlZo6SPu.description:
The leukodaemon exhales a cloud of corpse-bloated, biting black flies in a @Template[type:cone|distance:20]. Creatures within the cone take [[/r {4d8}[piercing]]]{4d8穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免).

大成功 uneffected

成功 half damage

失败 full damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}

大失败 double damage and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}

DjE8LDaTqE6Y8m1b.name: Daemonic Pestilence
DjE8LDaTqE6Y8m1b.description:
The leukodaemon can telepathically communicate with the afflicted creature at any distance on the same plane.

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28]

阶段1 carrier (1天)

阶段2 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1天)

阶段3 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} (1天)

阶段4 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} (1天)

阶段5 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 3} (1 week)

阶段6 dead

3ViZWXlxM2CUiPGG.name: Quicken Pestilence
3ViZWXlxM2CUiPGG.description: The leukodaemon coaxes a disease into full bloom. It chooses a target in its aura of pestilence that's currently affected by a disease. That creature must attempt a Fortitude save against the disease as if the interval for the disease's current stage had passed.

Lich.name: 巫妖 Lich
Lich.allSaves: +1 status to all saves vs. positive
Lich.publicNotes:
A wizard whose insatiable desire for arcane power eclipsed their mortal life, the lich is a truly devious and versatile spellcaster.

To gain more time to complete their goals, some desperate spellcasters pursue immortality by embracing undeath. After long years of research and the creation of a special container called a phylactery, a spellcaster takes the final step by imbibing a deadly concoction or casting dreadful incantations that transform them into a lich. While most undertake this drastic plan to continue their work or fulfill some long-term plan, others become liches because they fear death or to fulfill some malevolent purpose, such as long-sworn revenge. Regardless, the result is permanent and carries with it the potential to alter history-both that of those who transform themselves and of the countless mortals that will inevitably suffer as a result of a lich's new power.

在经历转变之后，巫妖通常会找个安静的地方居住，他们的居所一般由各种守卫以及陷阱守护，这主要有两个原因。首先，巫妖为了制定精密的计划需要独处，其次，很少有凡人（若有的话）乐于和这些传奇堕落死灵法师互动。前者催生了后者，对自身强加的隔离措施会驱使巫妖变得更加疯狂，从而进一步将自身隔绝于文明之外。巫妖活得越久，就会成为越发谨慎的规划大师，将自身藏匿于充满致命谜题、误导和怪物的迷宫中。巫妖的仆人和护卫对主人绝对忠诚，这可能是出于他们的本性（比如构装体或不死生物），也可能是由于强大魔法带来的控制效果。随着时间的推移，许多巫妖会变得疯狂，巫妖巢穴的性质对于这名不死生物的精神状态有着很好的提示作用。

巫妖会为了守护自己的命匣而在周边设下层层保护，因为他知道摧毁这个魔法容器对巫妖来说意味着毁灭。巫妖这种生物出了名的难以讨价还价，不过威胁摧毁命匣是在此类谈判中占据优势的好方法。

6Upo1ddHWd1c49bj.name: 奥术准备法术 Arcane Prepared Spells

OrEIFKDcdgvL1qN8.name: 飞行术 Fly
OrEIFKDcdgvL1qN8.description:
目标能够在空气中穿梭，获得等于其速度或者20尺的飞行速度，取较高者。

升阶 (7环) 该持续时间增加到1小时。

YrzxGdPK8cQzH6oG.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
YrzxGdPK8cQzH6oG.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

mxcJoEf3oDyFBZYp.name: Scroll of Teleport (Level 6)
mxcJoEf3oDyFBZYp.description:
@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.69L70wKfGDY66Mk9]

从卷轴中施法要求你用一只手持握卷轴，并进行一次施法行动，花费法术正常情况下所需要的动作来启动它。

想要从一张卷轴中施法，该法术必须出现在你的法术表中。因为是你在施法，使用你的法术攻击骰和法术DC。该法术也获得与你的魔法根源相关联的特征（奥术，神术，异能，原能）

所有物质上的材料成分和花费都在卷轴被创造时提供了，因此你在使用卷轴施法时不需要再次提供。你必须将法术的任何材料成分替换为一个姿势成分。如果该法术需要一个器材，你必须拥有这个器材才能从卷轴施展这个法术。

备注：如果想要创建一个特定法术的卷轴或魔杖，把该法术从合集包里拖到一个PC，NPC，Loot表的背包里即可。

gakDYFEsPKyFUdIg.name: +1 Status to All Saves vs. Positive

gSG1OZxFHX2zLrNP.name: Counterspell
gSG1OZxFHX2zLrNP.description:
触发 A creature casts a spell the lich has prepared.

效果 The lich expends a prepared spell to counter the triggering creature's casting of that same spell. The lich loses its spell slot as if it had cast the triggering spell. The lich then attempts to counteract the triggering spell.

CjdoOLjRkqyfp25v.name: 复苏 Rejuvenation
CjdoOLjRkqyfp25v.description: When a lich is destroyed, its soul immediately transfers to its @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NEbr7nKuiluJgBHT]{Soul Cage}. A lich can be permanently destroyed only if its soul cage is found and destroyed.

m6CbK52GoU471gez.name: Drain Soul Cage
m6CbK52GoU471gez.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The lich taps into its @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.NEbr7nKuiluJgBHT]{Soul Cage's} power to cast any arcane spell up to 6th level, even if the spell being cast is not one of the lich's prepared spells. The lich's soul cage doesn't need to be present for the lich to use this ability.

CUwhBzgJAPCU9WcT.name: Paralyzing Touch
CUwhBzgJAPCU9WcT.description:
A creature damaged by the lich's hand Strike must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:32] save against the lich's spell DC-4.

The creature becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed} for 1 round on a failure. On a critical failure, the creature is paralyzed permanently, falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone}, and seems dead. A @Check[type:medicine|dc:25|name:Diagnose Paralysis|traits:arcane,curse,necromancy|overrideTraits:true] check reveals the victim is alive.

5TLoRDxeWBDh6a6e.name: Steady Spellcasting
