5TLoRDxeWBDh6a6e.description: If a reaction would disrupt the lich's spellcasting action, the lich attempts a @Check[type:flat|dc:15] check. On a success, the action isn't disrupted.

Living Whirlwind.name: 活体旋风 Living Whirlwind
Living Whirlwind.publicNotes:
A living whirlwind resembles a roughly humanoid-shaped dust devil.

这些生物形态大小各不一样的生物来自气元素位面。

LDLJlCLplbi1fPsU.name: Disperse
LDLJlCLplbi1fPsU.description:
触发 The living whirlwind takes damage from a hostile action.

效果 The living whirlwind disperses.

Until the end of the current turn, it can't be attacked or targeted, doesn't take up space, and any auras or emanations it has are suppressed. At the end of the turn, the living whirlwind reforms in any space in which it can fit within 25 feet of where it dispersed and any auras or emanations it has are restored as long as their duration didn't run out while it was dispersed.

2UpzHQ985k9cDkOT.name: Swiftness
2UpzHQ985k9cDkOT.description: The living whirlwind's movement doesn't trigger reactions.

Living Wildfire.name: 活体野火 Living Wildfire
Living Wildfire.publicNotes:
Living wildfires appear as humanoids made of living fire.

火元素是灼热的火元素位面的破坏性的具现。

nGzfYxHKFp5jqc76.name: 烟雾视觉 Smoke Vision
nGzfYxHKFp5jqc76.description: The living wildfire ignores the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} condition from smoke.

mbDpJL0NCrFdM2bb.name: Explosion
mbDpJL0NCrFdM2bb.description: When the living wildfire dies, it explodes, dealing [[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6火焰伤害} to each creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:10|traits:fire,damaging-effect] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:19|basic:true]豁免).

Lizardfolk Defender.name: 蜥蜴人防御者 Lizardfolk Defender
Lizardfolk Defender.publicNotes:
The lizardfolk defender serves as a protector of the young, guardian of the settlement, and when no other options are available, soldier in time of war. They eagerly rise to the defense of their kin but do not revel in battle. An iruxi defender would rather turn back intruders and allow them to flee with the knowledge they were beaten, in hopes that such word prevents further invasions, but they are not naive. The iruxi understand the need for revenge, and when they allow a foe to escape, they do not forget.

When human scholars speak of ancient civilizations, they usually turn their focus to themselves, researching and lecturing on the first human empires. When they drift to others, they invariably look to cultures that had conflicts or alliances with ancient humanity. That the culture of the people called lizardfolk often gets ignored or forgotten even by well-meaning researchers is thus no surprise, but to the lizardfolk themselves it is no matter. They know their history and value its integrity and privacy-if younger ancestries like humanity aren't interested in learning from lizardfolk empires dating back to before the first human knocked two rocks together to make their first campfire, that's fine with them.

The word 'lizardfolk' is an excellent example of humanity's narrow-sighted view of this culture. The name of their people is 'iruxi', but these reptilian humanoids have patiently and good-naturedly accepted the name 'lizardfolk' as a variant, and they generally resist urges to call humans and other mammalians similarly derivative names in return. Iruxis dwell and thrive in all tropical and temperate biomes, but they are most at home in swamplands, coastal regions, and riverlands, for they are talented swimmers, and fish and aquatic plants make up a large part of their preferred diets.

hdxkFShEWbTlfmhb.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

nlnYY25ImmMf9WxI.name: Deep Breath
nlnYY25ImmMf9WxI.description: A lizardfolk defender can hold their breath for 175 rounds (17-1/2 minutes).

8wxpM0AIu2KtOOy1.name: Terrain Advantage
8wxpM0AIu2KtOOy1.description: Non-lizardfolk creatures in difficult terrain and non-lizardfolk creatures that are in water and lack a swim Speed are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the lizardfolk defender.

Lillend.name: 翼蛇人 Lillend
Lillend.languages: Speak With Animals, Speak With Plants, Tongues
Lillend.publicNotes:
Lillends are tale-tellers, chroniclers, and champions of freedom of expression. They are generally peaceful, but are quick to act if a masterful piece of art is threatened or free speech is suppressed. They pride themselves on inspiring mortals to greater heights of expression and creativity, and more than one bard looks to a lillend as their personal inspiration. Lillends sometimes secretly follow the adventures of mortal heroes to record their stories as epic poems and songs, which they then perform in the packed mead halls of Elysium. When pursuing such goals, lillends take pains to use their innate spells to remain in hiding, as they would rather observe and record events without "polluting" them with their own intervention. Nevertheless, a lillend who sees their charge faced with certain death often cannot resist the urge to intervene and save the day. Inevitably, this brings a close to the lillend's chronicles, as their relationship with their subject invariably shifts from one of detached observation to friendship or more. Yet lillends remain hesitant to involve themselves for overlong in a mortal's life, in part because they fear what sort of fiendish attention their presence might attract, but mostly out of respect for the mortal's own destiny. A lillend would, all things being equal, prefer to let mortals choose their own fate rather than run the risk of sending someone down a path to which their heart is not set.

灵使们是自由的代表——（他们是）友好的天族，喜欢出于好奇的探索、自发地狂欢和异想天开的追求。生于极乐境（Elysium）的无羁原野（untamable wilds），灵使们充满热忱而活泼善变，但对他们所珍视的人则忠心耿耿。（虽然）在面对魔族和异界的威胁时，灵使们的行动迅捷而又直接，但他们倾向于远离凡俗事务，让人们有选择自己命运的终极自由。虽然所有的灵使都珍视自由，但每种类型（的灵使）都代表了是一类高于其他的特殊自由。他们中的许多人都拥有奇怪的骑士和宫廷头衔，这些头衔不受凡人的分类约束，且会随着时间和场合的变化而变化，而非遵循严格的等级制度。这令亚空（Archon）和其他没见过灵使的更守序的生物感到困惑。事实上，灵使们把头衔看做是一种个人的炫耀和值得夸高之物，而非向他人发号施令的借口。

e7Rk8yVGVqEP62yA.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

xlpQWhQgbWlDApYs.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
xlpQWhQgbWlDApYs.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

tWac24doWcIrGncL.name: 激发英勇 Inspire Heroics
tWac24doWcIrGncL.description:
你呼唤你的缪斯，极大的提升你和盟友受到的 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.IAjvwqgiDr3qGYxY]{激发勇气 Inspire Courage} 或 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bH0kPuf7UKxRvi2P]{激发防御 Inspire Defense} 的效果。如果你的下一个动作是施展激发勇气或者激发防御，则尝试一次表演检定。该检定的DC通常等同于你组曲最高等级目标的非常困难DC，但是DM可以根据环境设置不同的DC。你激发勇气或者激发防御的效果取决于你检定的结果。

大成功 你激发勇气或者激发防御的状态加值提高到+3.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.VFereWC1agrwgzPL]{激发勇气(大成功)}, @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.BKam63zT98iWMJH7]{激发防御(大成功)}

成功 你激发勇气或者激发防御的状态加值提高到+2.

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.kZ39XWJA3RBDTnqG]{激发勇气(成功)}, @Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.Chol7ExtoN2T36mP]{激发防御(成功)}

失败 你的激发勇气或者激发防御只提供正常的+1加值，但你不需要花费施展这个法术的聚能值。

jiTqy8zD4pcvkN63.name: 植物交谈(恒定法术) Speak with Plants (Constant)
jiTqy8zD4pcvkN63.description: 你可以对植物提出问题，从植物获得回答，但该法术不会令植物比正常更为友好或者比正常更有智慧。大多数通常植物对周围的世界仅有直觉的认识，所以它们无法认出生物的细节，或者了解任何其周围环境以外的世界。聪明的植物怪物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

QFDEJZjNW689owzG.name: 动物交谈(恒定法术) Speak with Animals (Constant)
QFDEJZjNW689owzG.description: 你可以对动物提出问题，从动物获得回答，以对动物及使用交涉（Diplomacy）技能。该法术不会令动物比正常更为友好。聪明的动物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

31EkfwMC2bbiN1gy.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
31EkfwMC2bbiN1gy.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

717W600etNWQubwl.name: 激发表现 Inspire Competence
717W600etNWQubwl.description:
你的鼓舞激励盟友完成任务。这视为进行了完善的准备援助盟友进行你所选定的一个技能检定，无视环境因素。当你之后使用援助动作时，你可以投掷表演检定而非通常的技能检定，如果你投出失败，你会反而获得成功。如果你在表演中为传奇等级，你自动获得大成功。

GM可以规定若你的表演会干涉队友的技能检定，则无法使用这一能力援助队友（比如在安静情况下使用隐匿或者维持易容）。

2n2EvBlcKOTTOQao.name: Virtuoso Harp
2n2EvBlcKOTTOQao.description: Handheld instruments include bagpipes, a small set of chimes, small drums, fiddles and viols, flutes and recorders, small harps, lutes, trumpets, and similarly sized instruments. The GM might rule that an especially large handheld instrument (like a tuba) has greater Bulk. Heavy instruments such as large drums, a full set of chimes, and keyboard instruments are less portable and generally need to be stationary while played. A virtuoso instrument gives a +1 item bonus to Performance checks using that instrument.

IXjaAxkgZsz5958E.name: Free Expression
IXjaAxkgZsz5958E.description: A lillend's auditory and sonic effects attempt to counteract any effect that would directly control, manipulate, or prevent them from expressing themself freely, such as silence. She can also spend an action, which has concentrate trait, to speak forcefully and counteract such effects.

Lizardfolk Scout.name: 蜥蜴人斥候 Lizardfolk Scout
Lizardfolk Scout.publicNotes:
Iruxi scouts are the lizardfolk most often encountered by adventurers, for these explorers and hunters spend most of their lives on the move, constantly patrolling the territories held by their enclave. If intruders are driven off, it is the responsibility of the iruxi scouts to track them, observe them, and learn their ways and weaknesses so as to report back to the community and aid in the defense against potential reprisals.

When human scholars speak of ancient civilizations, they usually turn their focus to themselves, researching and lecturing on the first human empires. When they drift to others, they invariably look to cultures that had conflicts or alliances with ancient humanity. That the culture of the people called lizardfolk often gets ignored or forgotten even by well-meaning researchers is thus no surprise, but to the lizardfolk themselves it is no matter. They know their history and value its integrity and privacy-if younger ancestries like humanity aren't interested in learning from lizardfolk empires dating back to before the first human knocked two rocks together to make their first campfire, that's fine with them.

The word 'lizardfolk' is an excellent example of humanity's narrow-sighted view of this culture. The name of their people is 'iruxi', but these reptilian humanoids have patiently and good-naturedly accepted the name 'lizardfolk' as a variant, and they generally resist urges to call humans and other mammalians similarly derivative names in return. Iruxis dwell and thrive in all tropical and temperate biomes, but they are most at home in swamplands, coastal regions, and riverlands, for they are talented swimmers, and fish and aquatic plants make up a large part of their preferred diets.

hrpJ4LH6ospAmcRG.name: Blowgun Darts (1 coated in giant centipede venom)
hrpJ4LH6ospAmcRG.description: 这条又长又窄的管子用来射击吹箭镖，仅仅需要强力呼气的力量。

rk9Qa3TRqh7vnR4r.name: Deep Breath
rk9Qa3TRqh7vnR4r.description: A lizardfolk scout can hold their breath for 150 rounds (15 minutes).

A6gmij9OXIW0o9vj.name: Giant Centipede Venom
A6gmij9OXIW0o9vj.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d8}[poison]]]{1d8毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {1d12}[poison]]]{1d12毒素伤害}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.i3OJZU2nk64Df3xm]{笨拙 Clumsy 1}, and flat-footed (1轮)

hH9lWhV3jA9NQJuG.name: Hidden Movement
hH9lWhV3jA9NQJuG.description: If the lizardfolk scout starts its turn @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪 Undetected} by a creature or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden} from it, that creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} against the scout's attacks until the end of the scout's turn.

LpOv4VRyaN38UswN.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
LpOv4VRyaN38UswN.description:
The lizardfolk scout deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

55Hvc61MUgVoahwb.name: Terrain Advantage
55Hvc61MUgVoahwb.description: Non-lizardfolk creatures in difficult terrain and non-lizardfolk creatures that are in water and lack a swim Speed are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the lizardfolk scout.

Lion.name: 狮子 Lion
Lion.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Lion.publicNotes:
Lions are cooperative hunters, ambushing dangerous prey in groups of lionesses that work in tandem to trap and kill their prey. Male lions are typically larger, with long manes, and when they hunt, they tend to do so on their own.

自然界中很少有掠食者能与猫的潜行能力相匹敌。

hYcrjabm50sPyqBV.name: Pack Attack
hYcrjabm50sPyqBV.description: The lion deals [[/r {1d4}]]{1d4额外伤害} to any creature that's within reach of at least two of the lion's allies.

LxnGNDFd9yCEkOAt.name: Pounce
LxnGNDFd9yCEkOAt.description: The lion Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the lion began this action @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, it remains hidden until after this ability's Strike.

387c1CSiNx4uWeqZ.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
387c1CSiNx4uWeqZ.description:
The lion deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Living Landslide.name: 活体山崩 Living Landslide
Living Landslide.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)60尺
Living Landslide.publicNotes:
Living landslides resemble humanoids made of earth and gravel.

土元素是洞穴探险者们的优秀保镖，也是重要的地下场所的理想守卫，例如地下室和国库。

80b2NmnlvaPumpDV.name: Earthbound
80b2NmnlvaPumpDV.description: When not touching solid ground, the living landslide is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

LLFFYMBrnhFoDMRh.name: Crumble
LLFFYMBrnhFoDMRh.description:
触发 The living landslide takes damage from a hostile source while atop rock or earth.

效果 The living landslide crumbles into the ground, Burrowing down 10 feet. This Burrowing does not trigger reactions.

The living landslide can't Crumble again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Crumble]]{1d4轮}.

pkJjWhKaHykBdCEO.name: Earth Glide
pkJjWhKaHykBdCEO.description: The living landslide can Burrow through any earthen matter, including rock. When it does so, the living landslide moves at its full burrow Speed, leaving no tunnels or signs of its passing.

Living Waterfall.name: 活体瀑布 Living Waterfall
Living Waterfall.publicNotes:
Living waterfalls are humanoid-shaped columns of churning water.

水元素可能具有非凡的破坏力，但这往往并非出于本心；就像水可以给主物质位面带来生命一样，它的波浪可以冲击海岸，雨水也能淹没城市。水元素同样如此难以捉摸。

krINP0tRSuTbpzys.name: Water-Bound
krINP0tRSuTbpzys.description: When not touching water, the living waterfall is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} and can't use reactions.

3jppXkfB2qjbeRic.name: 旋涡 Vortex
3jppXkfB2qjbeRic.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Water in the area that is in the same body of water as the living waterfall is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures that don't have the water trait.

Ita7hOSbzKOHxexv.name: Drench
Ita7hOSbzKOHxexv.description:
The elemental puts out all fires in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:5].

It extinguishes all non-magical fires automatically and attempts to counteract magical fires ([[/r 1d20+14 #Drench]]{+14} counteract modifier).

kZqLmEhJGdtImTFg.name: Push or Pull 5尺
kZqLmEhJGdtImTFg.description:
The living waterfall can also pull the creature

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.Push]

Lizardfolk Stargazer.name: 蜥蜴人占星师 Lizardfolk Stargazer
Lizardfolk Stargazer.publicNotes:
The tradition of astrology and looking to the stars for both navigation and prognostication is well-established in iruxi society, and their wise and observant stargazers are among the people's most respected members. Even the lowliest stargazer, as presented here, has a number of useful primal spells to aid their kin; in larger iruxi settlements, stargazers wield even greater powers.

When human scholars speak of ancient civilizations, they usually turn their focus to themselves, researching and lecturing on the first human empires. When they drift to others, they invariably look to cultures that had conflicts or alliances with ancient humanity. That the culture of the people called lizardfolk often gets ignored or forgotten even by well-meaning researchers is thus no surprise, but to the lizardfolk themselves it is no matter. They know their history and value its integrity and privacy-if younger ancestries like humanity aren't interested in learning from lizardfolk empires dating back to before the first human knocked two rocks together to make their first campfire, that's fine with them.

The word 'lizardfolk' is an excellent example of humanity's narrow-sighted view of this culture. The name of their people is 'iruxi', but these reptilian humanoids have patiently and good-naturedly accepted the name 'lizardfolk' as a variant, and they generally resist urges to call humans and other mammalians similarly derivative names in return. Iruxis dwell and thrive in all tropical and temperate biomes, but they are most at home in swamplands, coastal regions, and riverlands, for they are talented swimmers, and fish and aquatic plants make up a large part of their preferred diets.

rlBRYOIKCiyQfcQ8.name: 原能准备法术 Primal Prepared Spells

1N1JI8DtK2Tm842J.name: Deep Breath
1N1JI8DtK2Tm842J.description: A lizardfolk stargazer can hold their breath for 200 rounds (20 minutes).

Lyrakien.name: 莉拉精 Lyrakien
Lyrakien.publicNotes:
Lyrakiens are musical messengers and embodiments of free travel. They serve Desna and other deities and empyreal lords of Elysium, but are quite fond of the concept of free time and are always on the hunt for opportunities to pause in their duties to enjoy music or appreciate a moment of beauty. They love contests, stories, and songs, and they often challenge mortals to musical contests or pester them to share grand tales of their exploits. Lyrakiens rely on their agility to avoid conflicts, but they do their best to defend places of great natural beauty, especially against lawful or evil foes they can damage with their starlight. Lyrakiens have an innate wanderlust and rarely stay in the same place for very long. Some travel alongside adventurers, ofter writing songs about their quests and feats of derring-do.

Though light-hearted creatures, lyrakiens don't let their whimsical personalities get in the way of protecting breathtaking natural locations. Often called "glistenwings" by gnomes and halflings, they are frequently mistaken for sprites or similar fey, a bit of confusion that many lyrakiens dind amusing and fertile ground for shenanigans involving those they deem deserving of a bit of unexpected fun and discord in their lives.

灵使们是自由的代表——（他们是）友好的天族，喜欢出于好奇的探索、自发地狂欢和异想天开的追求。生于极乐境（Elysium）的无羁原野（untamable wilds），灵使们充满热忱而活泼善变，但对他们所珍视的人则忠心耿耿。（虽然）在面对魔族和异界的威胁时，灵使们的行动迅捷而又直接，但他们倾向于远离凡俗事务，让人们有选择自己命运的终极自由。虽然所有的灵使都珍视自由，但每种类型（的灵使）都代表了是一类高于其他的特殊自由。他们中的许多人都拥有奇怪的骑士和宫廷头衔，这些头衔不受凡人的分类约束，且会随着时间和场合的变化而变化，而非遵循严格的等级制度。这令亚空（Archon）和其他没见过灵使的更守序的生物感到困惑。事实上，灵使们把头衔看做是一种个人的炫耀和值得夸高之物，而非向他人发号施令的借口。

wmnFY6ylzPcsOlEb.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

w6XaAi7XP5jkc5DB.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
w6XaAi7XP5jkc5DB.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

q02Jrj8JB2UQ75MG.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (At Will) (Evil Only)
q02Jrj8JB2UQ75MG.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

xBIQnuKqF6SxOmMn.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
xBIQnuKqF6SxOmMn.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

mB9tYATe35GSN6Tm.name: Starlight Blast
mB9tYATe35GSN6Tm.description:
The lyrakien unleashes a blast of holy starlight in a @Template[type:burst|distance:5] centered on itself. Creatures in the area take [[/r {1d6}[chaotic]+{1d6}[good]]]{1d6 chaotic damage and 1d6 good伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:17|basic:true]豁免).

The lyrakien can't use Starlight Blast or its starlight ray ranged attack for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Starlight Attacks]]{1d4轮}.

Lustspawn.name: 色欲罪生怪 Lustspawn
Lustspawn.allSaves: 对抗魔法时所有豁免获得+1状态加值, 对抗心灵时获得+4状态加值
Lustspawn.senses: 黑暗视觉, 嗅探色欲原罪(模糊感官) 30尺
Lustspawn.publicNotes:
罪生怪是由被共称为符文领主（runelords）的七名古代巫师中的一位所创造的——他们每人接纳并呈现出七原罪中的一罪。第一名罪生怪由愤怒符文领主所创造，这源于他对影响并扭曲肉体的技术实践。这种技术在用于创造罪生怪不久之后便落入了其他符文领主手中，之后他们每人都尝试根据自己的设计创造变种，时至今日愤怒罪生怪仍旧是同类中数量最多也最知名的存在。罪生怪与肉体被重塑的类人原型之间只有极为模糊的相似之处，他们通常看起来骨瘦嶙峋，长着不自然地修长手臂和反关节的腿部，每根肢体末端都长着短粗的爪状指头。凸起的血管遍及罪生怪全身，血红色的凸起仿佛构成了扭曲的符文，其皮肤苍白无毛。他们的头部被拉长，五官只剩下鼻子、红色的双眼、以及从下巴处裂开成两瓣的下颚，其中露出长长的下垂舌头，舌头尖端分成了三根宛若手指的触须。罪生怪站起来有6.5尺，体重与同体型的人类相仿。罪生怪的行为模式与和其相关联的原罪有关，他们的体貌特征也会对此有所暗示。举例说明，贪婪罪生怪的血管里流淌的是金色的液体，而嫉妒罪生怪比其他类型的罪生怪更加瘦弱。

他们具有迷人的身躯和丑陋的面庞。

hk7qH9BpvzM7rFGe.name: 嗅探原罪(模糊感官) 30尺
hk7qH9BpvzM7rFGe.description: 罪生怪能通过嗅觉闻到生物所反映出的原罪，此能力在其他方面同灵敏嗅觉（scent）。由GM判断哪些生物与哪些原罪相符。

rcFKhekRBFACg0ED.name: 对抗心灵时获得+4状态加值

7JJXsi69PzGUt6UR.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

MpNlJrdPvv9bECNE.name: 原罪之噬 Sinful Bite
MpNlJrdPvv9bECNE.description:
被罪生怪的啃咬命中的生物必须尝试一次@Check[type:will|dc:18]豁免，因为他们的心智被充满罪孽的思维所侵袭。

大成功 不受影响

成功 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}

失败 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 2}

大失败 恶心2和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2}，持续一分钟

Mammoth.name: 猛犸象 Mammoth
Mammoth.allSaves: +2 status to all saves vs. cold
Mammoth.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Mammoth.publicNotes:
Found mostly in colder climates, mammoths are accustomed to dealing with desperate and dangerous predators, trampling and crushing their enemies while using their larger tusks to greater effect. Humanoids dwelling in harsh, frost-bound lands rely on the mammoth's strength to help them survive.

通过大象长长的、灵活的象鼻和令人印象深刻的长牙，人们立刻就能认出它们。在不同的地方的大象有不同的特征。大象在许多地区被当做驮畜，但其实它们非常聪明，必须非常小心地对待。

PtwaILORaUXLPA4E.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Cold

n4Cc3VF0F86FO0sG.name: Cold Adaptation
n4Cc3VF0F86FO0sG.description: The mammoth reduces the effects it suffers from cold environments by one step.

EdlfzUPi8lEnewu1.name: Dual Tusks
EdlfzUPi8lEnewu1.description: The mammoth makes two tusk Strikes, each against a different creature. This counts as one attack for the mammoth's multiple attack penalty, and the penalty doesn't increase until after both attacks.

xBi3GMrwnT7AE4mq.name: Grabbing Trunk
xBi3GMrwnT7AE4mq.description: A Medium or smaller creature hit by the mammoth's trunk is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}. If the mammoth moves, it can bring the Grabbed creature along with it.

Marid.name: 水巨灵 Marid
Marid.senses: 黑暗视觉, wavesense (imprecise) 60 feet; detect alignment, detect magic
Marid.publicNotes:
Marids are capricious but powerful genies from the Plane of Water; among geniekind, they are rivaled in power only by the fiery efreet. Marids embody the strength of the ocean's waves and currents, but they also have a gentler side, loving performance and art such as dancing, music, and storytelling.

Marids regard efreet with hostility but rarely encounter them in their native environment. They get along with djinn, jann, and shaitans, although the latter consider marids flighty and annoying, associating only long enough to close trade deals. Marid society has strict rules of hospitality, and many marid cities have a magically sealed foreign quarter where marid shahzadas conduct business with air-breathers.

每个元素位面对对应一种独特的巨灵，巨灵的身体是由与它们的原生位面（native plane）相对应的元素物质组成的：风巨灵由风、云和风暴组成；火巨灵的身体则由火组成；水巨灵由水构成；而土巨灵则由金属、宝石和石头组成。最后，小巨灵是由全部四种元素组成的，并且也是巨灵中最弱的。

EyTNAb0HgeYGoaPL.name: 奥术内在法术 Arcane Innate Spells

QN8xHmKgrI6lQLO3.name: 异界传送() Plane Shift (At Will) (to Astral Plane, Elemental Planes, or Material Plane Only)
QN8xHmKgrI6lQLO3.description: 你和你的盟友穿过位面之间的屏障。目标移动到另一个位面，例如火焰位面（Plane of Fire），阴影位面（Shadow Plane），或者深渊（Abyss）。你必须对目的地位面有所了解，并且使用该位面的材料制作的魔法共鸣音叉作为该法术的器材。多数主要位面的共鸣音叉，如同异界传送法术本身一样，罕贵度为罕见。鲜为人知的位面和半位面的共鸣音叉通常罕贵度为稀有。该法术非常不精确，你会在某个目标（由你选择）上次到达该位面时所在的位置相距1d20×25英里的位置出现。如果对所有目标而言均是第一次旅行到特定位面，你会在位面上的一个随机位置出现。异界传送 不会提供返程的方法，但是通过再次施放异界传送令你能回到你之前所在的位面，除非有什么另外情况。

mqUmbBpM7QVWWGIg.name: 操控水位(随意施法) Control Water (At Will)
mqUmbBpM7QVWWGIg.description:
通过将你的意志赋予水体，你可以抬升或者降低选择区域内的水位10尺。区域内具有水特征的生物承受 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.WsUwpfmhKrKwoIe3]{缓慢术 Slow}的效果。

区域 50尺长50尺宽

EDb4l4r9VNgvmSCI.name: 朦胧术(随意施法) Blur (At Will)
EDb4l4r9VNgvmSCI.description: 目标的形态变得模糊不清。它获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。由于该效果的原理，目标的位置仍然是显然的，目标不能使用该隐蔽来隐匿（Hide）或者潜行（Sneak）。

V6bHuF179ATM9acB.name: 侦测阵营(恒定法术,仅限邪恶或善良) Detect Alignment (Constant) (Evil or Good Only)
V6bHuF179ATM9acB.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

EfDe5JdUcCswZdko.name: 侦测魔法(恒定法术) Detect Magic (Constant)
EfDe5JdUcCswZdko.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

OdVgOWE6KnzPm27D.name: 水流冲击(随意施法) Hydraulic Push (At Will)
OdVgOWE6KnzPm27D.description:
你唤来一团强力的高压水流，撞击目标并令其后退。尝试一次远程法术攻击骰。

大成功 目标承受6d6钝击伤害，并且被击退10尺。

成功 目标承受3d6钝击伤害，并且被击退5尺。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d6。

00dvi5eqFTozS4ym.name: 旋涡 Vortex
00dvi5eqFTozS4ym.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:40]{40尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Water in the aura that is also in the same body of water as the marid is difficult terrain for Swimming creatures. Creatures with the water trait are immune.

m9xKqsUED5sH6vqA.name: Change Shape
m9xKqsUED5sH6vqA.description:
The marid can take on the appearance of any water elemental or humanoid. This ability doesn't change the marid's Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

AflyUplOQICTA75a.name: Rush of Water
AflyUplOQICTA75a.description:
The marid releases a jet of water in a @Template[type:line|distance:60], dealing [[/r {9d6}[bludgeoning]]]{9d6钝击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免). A creature that fails its save is also pushed 10 feet (20 feet on a critical failure).

The marid can't use Rush of Water again for [[/br 1d4 #Recharge Rush of Water]]{1d4轮}.

ZXotvZV2fYBkhfUy.name: Skewer
ZXotvZV2fYBkhfUy.description: The marid makes a trident Strike, dealing an extra @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success] on a hit (@Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed4d6.success] on a critical hit).

Marilith.name: 六臂蛇魔 Marilith
Marilith.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Marilith.publicNotes:
Mariliths are the generals of the Abyss, formed from the souls of proud evil mortals, often warlords and despots. They appear as tall and powerfully built humans from the waist up with snake tails and six arms. Because of Lamashtu's prominence over other demonic deities, most pride demons encountered by mortals take female form, but they can be of any gender.

Mariliths are among the greatest tacticians in the Abyss, and they have an almost supernatural knack for understanding the ripples of chaos and the unpredictable nature of demonic life. Their ability to command armies rises as much from their commanding presence as it does their ability to read into the potential results of any possible act and a sufficient understanding of the flow of entropy to allow them to predict likely outcomes.

当一个有罪之人的灵魂受到审判并被送至无底深渊时，它会成为致命的魔族——恶魔。恶魔是罪恶的化身，从一般的罪恶例如愤怒、暴食，到更“特别”的堕落，例如对酷刑的痴迷或对祖国的背叛。恶魔一经诞生，它们便被双重目的驱动：其一是不断积累力量变得更强，其二是腐化凡人的灵魂让其被罪恶玷污。通过这种方式恶魔保证了有源源不断的新恶魔来支持它们在深渊中不断扩张的军队。

yM2uUCjL6GUDVlF0.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

1NXWQAJohaHClByj.name: 真视术(恒定法术) True Seeing (Constant)
1NXWQAJohaHClByj.description: 你可以看见60尺内的事物的本来面貌。GM秘密骰反制检定，对抗区域中的所有幻术或者变形效果，但这只会决定你是否能看破它（例如，如果该检定成功对抗了一个变形法术，你可以看见该生物的本来形态，但你不会结束该变形法术）。

ydxJEhxUHDUufocn.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
ydxJEhxUHDUufocn.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

PekoTdQc6oDRhqlf.name: 飞行术(恒定法术) Fly (Constant)
PekoTdQc6oDRhqlf.description:
目标能够在空气中穿梭，获得等于其速度或者20尺的飞行速度，取较高者。

升阶 (7环) 该持续时间增加到1小时。

iEPnPUyNUxfYs63B.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity
iEPnPUyNUxfYs63B.description:
A marilith gains 5 extra reactions per round that they can use only to make Attacks of Opportunity. The demon can't use more than one on the same triggering action, even if a creature leaves several squares in the marilith's reach, and the marilith must use a different weapon for each Attack of Opportunity.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

Fz4qoI14He66tmpf.name: Commander's Aura
Fz4qoI14He66tmpf.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:100]{100尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

Commanded or allied evil creatures in the aura of lower level than the marilith gain a +1 circumstance bonus to attack rolls, damage rolls, AC, saves, and skill checks.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.5NSWRxAsJuvwyl0E]{效果: Commander's Aura}

xD2fbKZSefTlgsmQ.name: Failure Vulnerability
xD2fbKZSefTlgsmQ.description: A marilith's pride feeds their strength, so the sting of failure wounds them. If the marilith uses a damaging spell or makes a Strike on their turn but doesn't deal any damage that turn, they take [[/r {3d6+10}[mental]]]{3d6+10心灵伤害} at the end of their turn and their commander's aura deactivates until the end of their next turn.

QReEjgBjoIXn5NnC.name: Bladestorm
QReEjgBjoIXn5NnC.description: The marilith makes up to six longsword Strikes, each against a different target. These attacks count toward the marilith's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks.

YeXnVtwRynKtKDVy.name: Defensive Assault
YeXnVtwRynKtKDVy.description:
The marilith makes two Strikes, each with a different weapon, and they use the remaining weapons for protection. The demon gains a circumstance bonus to AC for 1 round equal to the number of weapons not used for attacks. If the marilith later uses any of those weapons to attack (including for an Attack of Opportunity), the bonus to AC decreases by 1 for each weapon used.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.pMPe01GWvfwcYwUR]{效果: Defensive Assault}

NSJZXBcVLdrnmMBh.name: 集中攻击 Focused Assault
NSJZXBcVLdrnmMBh.description:
The marilith attacks a single target with all the weapons they wield in their arms, overwhelming the target with multiple attacks and leaving almost nowhere to dodge. The demon makes a longsword Strike. On a successful attack, the marilith deals longsword damage to the target, plus an additional [[/r {1d8}[slashing]]]{1d8挥砍伤害} for every longsword they wield beyond the first (typically [[/r {5d8}[slashing]]]{5d8 extra挥砍伤害}). Even on a failed attack, the marilith deals the damage from one longsword to the target, though they still miss completely on a critical failure. This counts toward the marilith's multiple attack penalty as a number of attacks equal to the number of longswords the pride demon wields.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.7wDH2q0UcFdu2w58]{效果: Focused Assault}

53xmmigXl7qYER3Y.name: Infuse Weapons
53xmmigXl7qYER3Y.description: Any weapon becomes a +2 @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.KCQRFvUgbyclvOGi]{Striking} weapon made of cold iron and silver while a marilith wields it. The marilith can change its evil damage to chaotic whenever it attacks.

Medusa.name: 美杜莎 Medusa
Medusa.publicNotes:
Monstrous humanoids that resemble humans with snakes instead of hair, medusas are best known for their petrifying gazes that-if lingered upon-can permanently transform mortals to stone. Medusas are shrewd and manipulative adversaries who collect and covet secrets, and who use threats and guile to exploit the fears of weaker creatures. A medusa may seek out powerful magic items, use divination magic to discover secret knowledge and unlock forbidden power, or infiltrate a society to beguile influential politicians. Their ability to worm their way into powerful organizations makes them natural leaders of criminal outfits and thieves' guilds, and their interest in magical phenomena leads some to pursue careers as oracles who offer to help adventurers find what they seek-for a price. Of course, if wit and deception proves insufficient, a medusa can always simply turn rivals into ornate stone decorations with little more than a glare.

Exceptionally agile and surprisingly hardy, a medusa rarely backs down from a conflict even when cornered. Many adventurers who thought themselves readied to resist the effects of a medusa's gaze have nevertheless fallen to a medusa, as these creatures are also often deadly archers able to riddle their foes with venom-coated arrows from a distance. Still, a medusa may barter for their life if no alternatives remain, and the secrets carried by these powerful villains often make it more than worth sparing the monster's life.

zGXZKhk95VPsSdKN.name: Biting Snakes
zGXZKhk95VPsSdKN.description:
触发 A creature ends its turn adjacent to the medusa.

效果 The medusa makes a snake fangs Strike against the creature.

hSGaU1UT8mzmPFWl.name: Petrifying Gaze
hSGaU1UT8mzmPFWl.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save. If the creature fails, it becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for 1 minute. The medusa can deactivate or activate this aura by using a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

2lGYb3ZO8pwxgMhD.name: Focus Gaze
2lGYb3ZO8pwxgMhD.description:
The medusa fixes their glare at a creature they can see within 30 feet. The target must immediately attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25] save against the medusa's petrifying gaze. If the creature was already @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed} by petrifying gaze before attempting its save, a failed save causes it to be @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dTwPJuKgBQCMxixg]{石化 Petrified} permanently.

After attempting its save, the creature is then temporarily immune until the start of the medusa's next turn.

FuDdgAP7wwq6LCFO.name: Serpent Venom
FuDdgAP7wwq6LCFO.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:25]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {2d6}[poison]]]{2d6毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮)

Megalodon.name: 巨齿鲨 Megalodon
Megalodon.senses: blood scent, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 100尺
Megalodon.publicNotes:
Prehistoric sharks of incredible size, strength, and ferocity, megalodons scour waters deep and shallow to sate their considerable hunger. The presence of a megalodon undeniably affects the local aquatic ecosystem.

从远古时代开始，各种形状和体积的鲨鱼就一直在海洋中出没，到目前为止基本没什么变化。它们是高效、无情的掠食者，拥有多排锋利的牙齿，能在瞬间撕碎猎物。鲨鱼在水中能闻到血液的神奇能力让它们出现在任何水中屠杀的现场。

5yDMt3Vna9iVApvJ.name: Blood Scent
5yDMt3Vna9iVApvJ.description: The megaladon can smell blood in the water from up to 1 mile away.

91Bz1Au1eeA0F5Kc.name: Breach
91Bz1Au1eeA0F5Kc.description: The megalodon Swims up to its swim Speed, then @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.d5I6018Mci2SWokk]{跳跃 Leaps} vertically out of the water up to 25 feet high, making a Strike against a creature at any point during the jump (this lets it attack a creature within 35 feet of the water's surface or 40 feet with its tail). After the Strike, the megalodon splashes back down into the water.

a4bag8JDNGO7xCiD.name: Savage
a4bag8JDNGO7xCiD.description:
需求 The megalodon hit with a jaws Strike on its most recent action this turn.

效果 The creature the megalodon hit takes [[/r {2d12}[slashing]]]{2d12挥砍伤害}.

Megaprimatus.name: 大金刚 Megaprimatus
Megaprimatus.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Megaprimatus.publicNotes:
The megaprimatus is among the mightiest of apes, quick to confront any perceived intrusions into its domain. With a height of 40 feet, it towers over even most giants, and is used to being the top-tier predator in the region.

虽然许多猿类平时表现出温和或的行为，但是大猩猩可能表现出强烈的领地意识，而大金刚尤其具有攻击性和危险性。

ZxIVdGLdVzJ1RVHi.name: Mangling Rend
ZxIVdGLdVzJ1RVHi.description:
A megaprimatus makes two fist Strikes against the same target. If both hit, the attack deals an additional [[/r {2d6}[bludgeoning]]]{2d6钝击伤害}, the target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed}, and the target takes a -20-foot status penalty to all Speeds until the end of its next turn.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.5roCV7EbPx1G5xOd]{效果: Mangling Rend}

AuM50DWRYYFugkl6.name: Terrifying Display
AuM50DWRYYFugkl6.description:
The megaprimatus beats its chest in a terrifying display. Creatures within @Template[type:emanation|distance:50]{50尺} must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:27|name:Frightening Display] save.

While a creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened} by this ability, it is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{措手不及 Flat-Footed} to the megaprimatus and to gorillas.

大成功 No effect and temporarily immune for 1 minute.

成功 The creature is unaffected.

失败 The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}.

大失败 The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing} until the end of its next turn.

Naunet.name: 纳乌奈特 Naunet
Naunet.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Naunet.senses: 熵力感知(模糊)30 feet, darkvision
Naunet.publicNotes:
Pugnacious and powerfully muscled, naunets serve as scouts and rank-and-file troops of protean armies. Resembling a thick salamander with a wide head, a powerful tail, and tentacles tipped with snapping jaws in place of rear legs, naunets are the most bestial of the proteans and occupy one of their lowest castes. Naunets are 12 feet long and weigh 900 pounds.

All proteans are prone to unpredictable fits and unexpected action, but compared to most others, naunets are much more bestial. Always ready for a fight, naunets pride themselves in acting swiftly and striking before unpleasant distractions like diplomacy can blunt a combat's beginning.

幻蛇是混乱的捍卫者，被称为大漩涡（the Maelstrom）的混沌原初位面的原住民，他们将散播混乱与加速熵的终结视为自己的使命。最强大的幻蛇是被集体称之为幻蛇领主（protean lords）的半神，然而这些变幻莫测的存在在主物质位面中的信仰往往暧昧不明且藏于暗处。

幻蛇按照一种松散的种姓制度划分自身族群，并掌握着令人眼花缭乱的多样能力。大多数幻蛇拥有蛇形的躯体和原初猛兽的头颅。学者们一直着迷于这个事实——即这些无序分裂的后代为何会有如此多具备共性的特征——因此他们指出，即便在最纯粹的混沌中，也存在着某些秩序的表象。而其他人则注意到蛇形是最为原始的形态之一，这也许是在暗示一个事实，即在时间的起点，此类形态可能是唯一的存在。幻蛇自身对此并没有任何好说的，而讽刺的是，这种态度反而使得人们对其种群的说法缺乏共识并加深了人们的困惑。毕竟，连混沌本身都不能信赖混沌，难道这不才是熵的最纯粹形式么？

pm2fdTcLLvGAYrvI.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

H8p1fVftX2xCpcdM.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
H8p1fVftX2xCpcdM.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

NSZBHCyCvmYgDUpL.name: 隐雾术(随意施法) Obscuring Mist (At Will)
NSZBHCyCvmYgDUpL.description: 你唤来一团迷雾。在雾中的所有生物获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}，并且在雾外的所有生物对其内的生物获得隐蔽。你可以解消这团云雾。

Kp4bo7vO06rxYNfy.name: 粉碎音波(随意施法) Shatter (At Will)
Kp4bo7vO06rxYNfy.description:
高频音波攻击击碎附近的一件物体。你对该物体造成2d10音波伤害，如果物体的硬度为4或者更低，忽视该硬度。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加1d10，法术所能忽视的硬度增加2。

Oy7DyDa1Fc1uUyJg.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限守序) Detect Alignment (At Will) (Lawful Only)
Oy7DyDa1Fc1uUyJg.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

PWV65LaMZJtQOg9d.name: 熵力感知(模糊)30尺
PWV65LaMZJtQOg9d.description: A naunet能通过对混乱的概率与机运的超自然洞察力来预测到生物的存在。这会赋予它在所列范围内感知生物的能力。身处@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{回避侦测 Nondetection}效果影响，或者其他屏蔽预言和预测的手段可以让生物免于被熵力感知注意到。

UVREJWrU0MjhSxLs.name: 幻蛇体质 Protean Anatomy
UVREJWrU0MjhSxLs.description:
幻蛇的要害器官会不断地变形和改变位置。当幻蛇承受酸、电击、或音波伤害后，它会立即获得抗力数据中所列数值的对应伤害抗力。这会持续1小时或直至幻蛇承受上述伤害类型中的其他种类为止（在这种情况下，幻蛇的抗力会再度变换并与该类型相匹配），以较先发生者为准。除非幻蛇自身是自愿的目标，否则它对变形效果免疫。若陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}或@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}，幻蛇会在它的下个回合结束时自动恢复，因为新的感受器官已经形成并取代了受损的器官。

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.c6SiBB3mzV8lZUQr]{效果: 幻蛇体质}

zoTuvqovtFZqbEp6.name: Adaptive Strike
zoTuvqovtFZqbEp6.description:
The naunet chooses adamantine, cold iron, or silver; its melee Strikes count as that type for 1 minute or until it uses Adaptive Strike again.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.361dIAAhiZE0wg8v]{效果: Adaptive Strike}

sNxY0Neqlt313iVL.name: Change Shape
sNxY0Neqlt313iVL.description:
The naunet can take the appearance of any Small, Medium, or Large animal, beast, or humanoid. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes but might change the damage type its Strikes deal.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

YaAoatEoLAq9KaoR.name: Confounding Slam
YaAoatEoLAq9KaoR.description: A creature hit by the naunet's tentacle Strike is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} for [[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮} (@Check[type:will|dc:24] negates). If the creature was already stupefied in this way, the duration extends by 1 round instead. A chaotic creature is only @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} instead.

Ofalth.name: 残渣怪 Ofalth
Ofalth.publicNotes:
Found in castle dung heaps, city dumps, and sewers, ofalths are thought to be cousins of shamblers. But whereas shamblers are living heaps of soggy vegetation, ofalths are living heaps of matter from an altogether more unpleasant source: these monsters look like 9-foot-tall amalgamations of wet detritus, sewage, and rubbish with long tentacular arms and stout legs. It can be difficult to tell where an ofalth's body ends and the foul contents of the cesspit they wallow within begins. They move through refuse heaps in search of organic material in their endless quest to sate their hunger.

Though ofalths have a limited intellect, they still exhibit a vile curiosity. They are no strangers to dissecting their prey after it has succumbed to their wasting disease-a terrible and aptly named affliction that causes the victim's blood to seep from its pores. When an ofalth manages to secure a victim alive, it may even torture its food by consuming it bit by bit while it shrieks for mercy.

Ofalths' domains typically overlap with those of otyughs, who fear ofalths, though otyughs have also been known to band together in order to take down an ofalth for its rubbery flesh, which the otyughs consider an intoxicating delicacy. On the other hand, ofalths seem to particularly enjoy taking otyughs apart one piece at a time. They have been known to keep a captured otyugh alive for days or even weeks, forcing the otyugh to endure the cloying scent of its own body decaying before the ofalth feeds.

3A8TmAuVP2C3XDsX.name: Refuse Pile
3A8TmAuVP2C3XDsX.description: When it's not in danger, an ofalth can spend 1 minute settling into a 10-foot pile that looks like a heap of garbage. While doing so, the ofalth gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC but can't use attack, manipulate, or move actions. A creature that enters the area of the garbage heap or interacts with it must attempt a save against the ofalth's putrid stench and wretched weeps disease. An ofalth can leave this form using a single action.

CDkktCbVeomEuX4D.name: Filth Wallow
CDkktCbVeomEuX4D.description: A ofalth gains @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{快速愈合 Fast Healing 2} when in an area with a high concentration of debris, junk, or excrement, such as a refuse heap or sewer.

h3RAiOfN4DCwKqV0.name: Putrid Stench
h3RAiOfN4DCwKqV0.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A creature entering the aura must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1} until the end of its turn (plus @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} for as long as it is sickened on a critical failure). While within the aura, an affected creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to saves against disease and to recover from the sickened condition. A creature that succeeds at its save is temporarily immune for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.wX9L6fbqVMLP05hn]{效果: Stench}

qcaLKbJ4n5L9k9Vc.name: Wretched Weeps
qcaLKbJ4n5L9k9Vc.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:26]

阶段1 携带病原但没有不良效果(1天)

阶段2 @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d8.success] every hour and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1天)

阶段3 @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d8.success] every hour and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1天)

Ogre Boss.name: 食人魔老大 Ogre Boss
Ogre Boss.publicNotes:
In ogre society, might makes more than right-it makes the rules. The strongest or most violent ogre in a family is invariably that family's boss. Quick to hook fallen foes on their weapons, even other ogres fear the repercussions of displeasing an ogre boss. When an ogre boss barks out commands, the other members of the family move quickly to obey.

Ogres embody brutish, amoral violence and cruelty. Standing 10 feet tall and densely muscled, ogres are as strong as they are cruel. Ogres are sadists that enjoy remorseless murder, torture, degradation, and mutilation in all of its forms. Although they prefer to vent their violent urges on smaller humanoids-the smaller and more beautiful, the better-ogres promise a horrifying fate for anyone unlucky enough to fall within their meaty grasp. But for all their creativity in developing methods of violence, ogres often remain too dim-witted to realize that their playthings lack an ogre's robust fortitude and high pain tolerance, so most captives die far sooner than the ogres might prefer. Such a fate is perhaps preferable however, as those who survive too long as ogres' playthings suffer lasting mental scars from the horrifying abuse. A captive able to keep their wits can sometimes trick the brutes by promising treasure, meatier captives, or other crude amusements, taking advantage of an ogre's limited intellect to engineer opportunities to escape.

Ogres are social creatures only in the most debased sense. They gather together in groups called families, though members are not always related by blood. Ogres practice incest regularly, believing that it makes for stronger familial bonds, and most ogres are misshapen or mutated from generations of inbreeding. The most powerful ogre in any family is the "boss"-usually the family's patriarch or matriarch-while other ogres in the family learn to obey or risk being brutalized by the boss's loyal kin. Ogres lair in caves, crumbling ruins, or dilapidated shacks close enough to humanoid settlements or animal trails to make raiding easy. These lairs are filthy and frequently contain all-too-recognizable evidence of their depravity.

yfLFfSeyPeThnDPE.name: Ogre Hook
yfLFfSeyPeThnDPE.description: Ogres are known for using immense, curved picks called ogre hooks.

K8rZwgv45XvIe8vL.name: Ogre Hook
K8rZwgv45XvIe8vL.description: Ogres are known for using immense, curved picks called ogre hooks.

RKyutDZZD9yAhzjX.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

KxNiF9bYl6kA6FRd.name: Bellowing Command
KxNiF9bYl6kA6FRd.description: The ogre boss issues a command to hasten their fellows. Each ogre ally who hears and understands this command becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.nlCjDvLMf2EkV2dl]{迅捷 Quickened} until the end of that ally's next turn, but can use the extra action only to Step or Stride.

cg8c4dIdBFiff9le.name: Sweeping Hook
cg8c4dIdBFiff9le.description:
触发 The ogre boss successfully @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.ge56Lu1xXVFYUnLP]{Trips} a creature using an ogre hook.

效果 The ogre boss makes an ogre hook Strike against the creature they tripped.

Ogre Glutton.name: 贪食食人魔 Ogre Glutton
Ogre Glutton.publicNotes:
Ogre gluttons take the act of feeding to a horrific extreme, capable of extending their already cavernous mouths wide enough to gulp down a halfling. Stories of ogre gluttons being tricked into eating razor-edged shields or barrels filled with poisoned meat are common, but such tales are of little consolation to those who have been gobbled down whole by these ravenous giants. In addition to their sadistic table manners, ogre gluttons have a disturbing knack for coming up with violent "games" that are little more than drawn-out torments, yet those who somehow manage to beat a glutton at the rules of its own game can often enrage and frustrate the ogre enough that the resulting tantrum is more than enough distraction to afford a last-ditch escape from doom.

Ogres embody brutish, amoral violence and cruelty. Standing 10 feet tall and densely muscled, ogres are as strong as they are cruel. Ogres are sadists that enjoy remorseless murder, torture, degradation, and mutilation in all of its forms. Although they prefer to vent their violent urges on smaller humanoids-the smaller and more beautiful, the better-ogres promise a horrifying fate for anyone unlucky enough to fall within their meaty grasp. But for all their creativity in developing methods of violence, ogres often remain too dim-witted to realize that their playthings lack an ogre's robust fortitude and high pain tolerance, so most captives die far sooner than the ogres might prefer. Such a fate is perhaps preferable however, as those who survive too long as ogres' playthings suffer lasting mental scars from the horrifying abuse. A captive able to keep their wits can sometimes trick the brutes by promising treasure, meatier captives, or other crude amusements, taking advantage of an ogre's limited intellect to engineer opportunities to escape.

Ogres are social creatures only in the most debased sense. They gather together in groups called families, though members are not always related by blood. Ogres practice incest regularly, believing that it makes for stronger familial bonds, and most ogres are misshapen or mutated from generations of inbreeding. The most powerful ogre in any family is the "boss"-usually the family's patriarch or matriarch-while other ogres in the family learn to obey or risk being brutalized by the boss's loyal kin. Ogres lair in caves, crumbling ruins, or dilapidated shacks close enough to humanoid settlements or animal trails to make raiding easy. These lairs are filthy and frequently contain all-too-recognizable evidence of their depravity.

SzfxfFohnnwRyEeK.name: Glutton's Feast
SzfxfFohnnwRyEeK.description: If the ogre glutton damages a living creature with their jaws Strike, they gain [[/r 1d4 #Temporary Hit Points]]{1d4 temporary生命值} for 1 minute.

DvjFG8xZGQmhN7AK.name: Glutton's Rush
DvjFG8xZGQmhN7AK.description: The ogre glutton Strides twice and makes a jaws Strike. If they damage a living creature with this Strike, the temporary Hit Points they receive from Glutton's Feast is increased to [[/r {2d4}[temporary hit points]]]{2d4}.

Ogre Warrior.name: 食人魔战士 Ogre Warrior
Ogre Warrior.publicNotes:
The simplest of ogres are slabs of muscle with hatefully beady eyes, misshapen visages, and malformed bodies. Always eager for mayhem and murder, ogre warriors are quick to turn on their kin when there's a shortage of smaller folk to torment, so those who lead ogres do their best to keep them constantly distracted with new opportunities for raids and ruin.

Ogres embody brutish, amoral violence and cruelty. Standing 10 feet tall and densely muscled, ogres are as strong as they are cruel. Ogres are sadists that enjoy remorseless murder, torture, degradation, and mutilation in all of its forms. Although they prefer to vent their violent urges on smaller humanoids-the smaller and more beautiful, the better-ogres promise a horrifying fate for anyone unlucky enough to fall within their meaty grasp. But for all their creativity in developing methods of violence, ogres often remain too dim-witted to realize that their playthings lack an ogre's robust fortitude and high pain tolerance, so most captives die far sooner than the ogres might prefer. Such a fate is perhaps preferable however, as those who survive too long as ogres' playthings suffer lasting mental scars from the horrifying abuse. A captive able to keep their wits can sometimes trick the brutes by promising treasure, meatier captives, or other crude amusements, taking advantage of an ogre's limited intellect to engineer opportunities to escape.

Ogres are social creatures only in the most debased sense. They gather together in groups called families, though members are not always related by blood. Ogres practice incest regularly, believing that it makes for stronger familial bonds, and most ogres are misshapen or mutated from generations of inbreeding. The most powerful ogre in any family is the "boss"-usually the family's patriarch or matriarch-while other ogres in the family learn to obey or risk being brutalized by the boss's loyal kin. Ogres lair in caves, crumbling ruins, or dilapidated shacks close enough to humanoid settlements or animal trails to make raiding easy. These lairs are filthy and frequently contain all-too-recognizable evidence of their depravity.

uK2zvEwcP8cWJG6x.name: Ogre Hook
uK2zvEwcP8cWJG6x.description: Ogres are known for using immense, curved picks called ogre hooks.

qjYI8SCJrXWZopn6.name: Ogre Hook
qjYI8SCJrXWZopn6.description: Ogres are known for using immense, curved picks called ogre hooks.

Orc Brute.name: 兽人蛮兵 Orc Brute
Orc Brute.publicNotes:
If orc armies are rarely well organized, this shortcoming can likely be traced to the furious and undisciplined rank-and-file brutes who make up the bulk of an orc warband.

兽人是暴力、可怖的类人生物，他们以力量至上为生活准则。兽人集结成为大大小小的野蛮战帮，屠杀并洗劫那些在前路上遭遇的倒霉蛋。无数的小型定居点、哨站和堡垒落入了兽人劫掠者的手中，兽人的繁殖能力以及纯粹的破坏能力在他们所征服的土地上留下了不可磨灭的印记。在兽人入侵中幸存下来的人不是被当做饲料喂给了他们的战兽，就是被当做奴隶掠走。无法言说的暴行等待着被兽人带回营地的外来者，因此对大多数人来说，与其被兽人复活，死亡可能是更好的结果。

论体格，兽人比大多数类人生物高大，身上野蛮的肉体、坚硬的骨骼和强健的肌肉让他们的肉体看起来就是为了暴力而定制出来的。然而相较于兽人彪悍的外表，他们却并非战无不胜的存在。首先，缺乏军纪的兽人无法开展大规模的作战，此外他们通常会在激烈的战斗中失去理智。兽人的皮肤也很容易留下伤疤——尽管这对于兽人来说是一种荣耀，因为伤疤象征着力量以及战斗经验。对兽人来说，交错的老疤是自豪与荣耀的勋章，就如同被斩首的敌人头颅或类似战利品一般的存在。

兽人是会将一切事情投入强烈情感的种族，而非仅仅在战争中如此。血脉的羁绊在兽人之间尤其强烈，血统也至关重要。最强大的兽人团体通常是由兄弟血亲组成，而非倚靠武装；兽人在保护自身亲族的时候会更加勇猛地战斗，兽人战士们会为了替阵亡的家族成员复仇而不知疲倦地作战。然而，这种对血统的强调并非出于利他主义的想法，实际上这是一把双刃剑。那些家人被杀害的兽人通常会发现自己身处部落阶级的底层，即便是知名的首领，如果缺乏亲族的支持，也会在一夜之间失势。

作为兽人文化那混乱与易怒的本性带来的结果，不同部落间产生了大量且多样的信仰、迷信观念和习俗。这种文化差异导致了兽人部落间的大量内斗，在许多情况下还防止了更大规模的兽人国家的崛起。这也使得许多外交尝试付诸流水，因为某个部落的禁忌很可能是其他部落中普遍允许或者完全可以接受的做法。对于那些在战争之外与兽人打交道的人来说，是否能够驾驭部族的特有文化往往意味着生与死的差别。尽管一般来说，兽人很少与外来者打交道，但他们明白交易带来的好处，并愿意与其他暴力民族交换资源，比如大地精、卓尔精灵和许多人类。

RUBYPaAp1dlf9rWN.name: Shoddy Breastplate
RUBYPaAp1dlf9rWN.description: Though referred to as a breastplate, this type of armor consists of several pieces of plate or half‑plate armor that protect the torso, chest, neck, and sometimes the hips and lower legs. It strategically grants some of the protection of plate while allowing greater flexibility and speed.

DmNGJHLmXcMGdmUS.name: 兽人指匕 Orc Knuckle Dagger

Orc Warrior.name: 兽人勇士 Orc Warrior
Orc Warrior.publicNotes:
The typical orc warrior is a violent combatant familiar to many adventurers. Orc warriors fight for their clan, for riches, and- perhaps most of all-for personal glory.

兽人是暴力、可怖的类人生物，他们以力量至上为生活准则。兽人集结成为大大小小的野蛮战帮，屠杀并洗劫那些在前路上遭遇的倒霉蛋。无数的小型定居点、哨站和堡垒落入了兽人劫掠者的手中，兽人的繁殖能力以及纯粹的破坏能力在他们所征服的土地上留下了不可磨灭的印记。在兽人入侵中幸存下来的人不是被当做饲料喂给了他们的战兽，就是被当做奴隶掠走。无法言说的暴行等待着被兽人带回营地的外来者，因此对大多数人来说，与其被兽人复活，死亡可能是更好的结果。

论体格，兽人比大多数类人生物高大，身上野蛮的肉体、坚硬的骨骼和强健的肌肉让他们的肉体看起来就是为了暴力而定制出来的。然而相较于兽人彪悍的外表，他们却并非战无不胜的存在。首先，缺乏军纪的兽人无法开展大规模的作战，此外他们通常会在激烈的战斗中失去理智。兽人的皮肤也很容易留下伤疤——尽管这对于兽人来说是一种荣耀，因为伤疤象征着力量以及战斗经验。对兽人来说，交错的老疤是自豪与荣耀的勋章，就如同被斩首的敌人头颅或类似战利品一般的存在。

兽人是会将一切事情投入强烈情感的种族，而非仅仅在战争中如此。血脉的羁绊在兽人之间尤其强烈，血统也至关重要。最强大的兽人团体通常是由兄弟血亲组成，而非倚靠武装；兽人在保护自身亲族的时候会更加勇猛地战斗，兽人战士们会为了替阵亡的家族成员复仇而不知疲倦地作战。然而，这种对血统的强调并非出于利他主义的想法，实际上这是一把双刃剑。那些家人被杀害的兽人通常会发现自己身处部落阶级的底层，即便是知名的首领，如果缺乏亲族的支持，也会在一夜之间失势。

作为兽人文化那混乱与易怒的本性带来的结果，不同部落间产生了大量且多样的信仰、迷信观念和习俗。这种文化差异导致了兽人部落间的大量内斗，在许多情况下还防止了更大规模的兽人国家的崛起。这也使得许多外交尝试付诸流水，因为某个部落的禁忌很可能是其他部落中普遍允许或者完全可以接受的做法。对于那些在战争之外与兽人打交道的人来说，是否能够驾驭部族的特有文化往往意味着生与死的差别。尽管一般来说，兽人很少与外来者打交道，但他们明白交易带来的好处，并愿意与其他暴力民族交换资源，比如大地精、卓尔精灵和许多人类。

AsGPSfdLJ7pQhwZZ.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

Owlbear.name: 枭熊 Owlbear
Owlbear.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Owlbear.publicNotes:
With the body of a powerful brown bear and the keen senses of an owl, the owlbear is a dangerous territorial predator, fearlessly attacking any creature that strays into its domain. Those who run afoul of an owlbear hear its terrifying screech only seconds before the massive creature is upon them, ripping them apart with deadly talons and a powerful beak.

Although their origin is lost to time, owlbears are assumed to be the result of a magical experiment to make a more cunning predator. According to the legend, the wizard was too successful and ended up being the flrst victim of the beast. Today, owlbears can be found around the world, with a variety of features. While the most common subspecies looks like a brown bear with the features of a great horned owl, owlbears from the frozen north might resemble polar bears mixed with snowy owls, and in temperate rain forests they might resemble black bears with the heads of barn owls.

Most owlbears live solitary lives, gathering only to mate and raise cubs, which are hatched from eggs. An owlbear's territory usually extends to around 5 miles from its lair, with clear signs of its habitat appearing with 1 mile (clawed up trees, gigantic feathers, and shredded carcasses). The lair of an owlbear rarely holds anything of value, but some adventurers have found trinkets, coins, and even jewelry in the massive pellets of undigested bones these monsters leave behind.

vTXaShzYmcNbRjzk.name: Bloodcurdling Screech
vTXaShzYmcNbRjzk.description:
The owlbear unleashes a loud screech that terrifies its prey. Each creature in an @Template[type:emanation|distance:80] must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:20] save. Regardless of the result, creatures are temporarily immune for 1 minute.

大成功 The creature is unaffected.

成功 The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 1}.

失败 The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}.

大失败 The creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing} for 1 round and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 3}.

vudcfpUT9un2pDOP.name: Gnaw
vudcfpUT9un2pDOP.description:
需求 The owlbear has a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} with its talons.

效果 The owlbear attempts to disembowel the creature with a beak Strike. If the Strike hits, the target must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:22] save.

大成功 The target is unaffected.

成功 The target is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{恶心 Sickened 1}.

失败 The target is sickened 1 and @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} as long as it remains sickened.

qCmKPruRObzVL1Dr.name: Screeching Advance
qCmKPruRObzVL1Dr.description: The owlbear makes a Bloodcurdling Screech and Strides twice. All creatures within @Template[type:emanation|distance:80]{80尺} of the owlbear at any point during this movement are subjected to the effects of Bloodcurdling Screech.

Pegasus.name: 天马 Pegasus
Pegasus.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Pegasus.publicNotes:
The pegasus is a winged horse prized for its capacity to serve as an aerial mount. Unfortunately for those who desire a saddle-trained pegasus, pegasi are wild creatures and do not readily accept even well-intentioned riders. Pegasi actively resist being mounted or controlled by evil creatures, attempting to buck an unwanted rider at every opportunity. A typical pegasus stands 6 feet high at the shoulder, weighs 1,500 pounds, and has a wingspan of 20 feet.

Pegasi are highly intelligent beasts and have a strong sense of pride and honor. The best way to entreat a pegasus is by speaking to it with grace and offering gifts appropriate to a creature of such majesty. Prospective riders who seek the mount for a worthy cause or virtuous quest have a much easier time coaxing a pegasus into granting its favor. Regardless, a pegasus never accepts a bit or saddle, for reasons both practical and purely egotistical.

In the wild, pegasi live in small herds and establish territories on remote mountains where they are relatively safe from hunters and slavers. They mature at the same rate as horses and can even breed with other equines, though the outcome of such unions is typically a foal with the traits of its least magical parent. On rare occasions, the interbreeding of a pegasus and a unicorn may result in a winged unicorn with characteristics of both parents and an unrivaled sense of righteousness.

Some pegasi carry in them the blood of a mighty and heroic ancestor. These champions of pegasus-kind dedicate their long lives to the pursuit of justice. They possess powerful supernatural abilities to aid them in this fight, such as resistance to fire and poison, immunity to petrification, and holy hoof attacks.

YdXTRnJYFdbi7JTh.name: Assisted Mount
YdXTRnJYFdbi7JTh.description:
需求 The pegasus is Flying without a rider.

效果 The pegasus Flies. At any point during the movement, it can allow a willing adjacent creature to @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.PM5jvValFkbFH3TV]{Mount} it. That creature must use a reaction to do so.

kHo1nNFrNvhFTdVm.name: Gallop
kHo1nNFrNvhFTdVm.description: The pegasus uses 2 move actions, each of which can be either Stride or Fly. It gains a +20-foot circumstance bonus to its Speeds during a Gallop.

Plague Zombie.name: 瘟疫丧尸 Plague Zombie
Plague Zombie.publicNotes:
Plague zombies are infested with hideous contagions.

丧尸唯一的欲求便是啃食活物。丧尸作为永不停歇地蹒跚前行且不会思考的死亡之兆，只有将其摧毁才能使之停步。

MuiyXm8KyQF57NaW.name: 啮咬 Jaws
MuiyXm8KyQF57NaW.description: 需求 The zombie has a creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}.

a2pZeef5wn9y5xAA.name: Slow
a2pZeef5wn9y5xAA.description: 丧尸具有永久性的@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}且无法使用反应动作。

RhGXKyPEo0bWS5D1.name: Zombie Rot
RhGXKyPEo0bWS5D1.description:
An infected creature can't heal damage it takes from zombie rot until it has been cured of the disease.

豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

阶段1 携带病原但没有不良效果(1天)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6负能量伤害} (1天)

阶段3 [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6负能量伤害} (1天)

阶段4 [[/r {1d6}[negative]]]{1d6负能量伤害} (1天)

阶段5 dead, rising as a plague zombie immediately

Quasit.name: 小恶魔 Quasit
Quasit.publicNotes: Unlike other demons, quasits are formed when a mortal spellcaster sheds a portion of their own sinful soul to create a familiar or companion. When these quasits outlive their creators, they become free willed and seek methods of returning to the Abyss, a task that requires pledging servitude to more powerful demons, so many quasits instead opt to remain on the Material Plane to promote evil and hope for chance and luck to someday provide them with a method of reaching the Abyss on their own.

NFnbEaaMOHmME3CN.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

8e3vdJRcFBLL1E8q.name: 隐形术(随意施法,仅限自身) Invisibility (At Will) (Self Only)
8e3vdJRcFBLL1E8q.description:
目标被幻术包复，变得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}. 这令该生物对所有生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VRSef5y1LmL2Hkjf]{无踪Undetected} ，但生物可以尝试寻找目标，令其改为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}。如果目标使用敌对动作，法术在敌对动作完成后结束。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续1分钟，但目标使用敌对动作时该法术不会结束。

JcNx2oSCr0ITXfqs.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限善良) Detect Alignment (At Will) (Good Only)
JcNx2oSCr0ITXfqs.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

cNFzUdZr8X6PFBwV.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
cNFzUdZr8X6PFBwV.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

E6yHKgr49GpD3BXa.name: Abyssal Knowledge
E6yHKgr49GpD3BXa.description: When a quasit offers @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.HCl3pzVefiv9ZKQW]{Aid} for an Arcana or Religion check, it gets the critical success result on any success and gets the critical failure result on any failure.

GdWAi69mvxSgSJOn.name: Virtue Aversion
GdWAi69mvxSgSJOn.description: The quasit's link to a mortal soul gave it birth, but it presents a vulnerability. Once per round, a creature can present an object related to something virtuous or good in the life of the quasit's creator (such as a beloved daughter's doll) as an Interact action to automatically deal the quasit [[/r {2d6}[mental]]]{2d6心灵伤害}.

9boiwlXx7yggBu6F.name: Abyssal Healing
9boiwlXx7yggBu6F.description:
频率 每轮一次

效果 The quasit restores [[/r {1d6}[healing]]]{1d6 HP} to itself.

o7HPbnFCe1XPngQQ.name: Change Shape
o7HPbnFCe1XPngQQ.description:
• Bat
    • Senses Echolocation 40尺
    • 速度 15 feet, fly 30尺
    • 近战 fangs [[/r 1d20+7 #Fangs]]{+7}/[[/r 1d20+3 #Fangs]]{+3}/[[/r 1d20-1 #Fangs]]{-1} (agile), 伤害 [[/r {1d4-1}[piercing]]]{1d4-1穿刺伤害}
    • 近战 wing [[/r 1d20+7 #Wing]]{+7}/[[/r 1d20+3 #Wing]]{+3}/[[/r 1d20-1 #Wing]]{-1} (agile), 伤害 [[/r {1d4-1}[bludgeoning]]]{1d4-1钝击伤害}
  • Centipede
    • 速度 10 feet, climb 10尺
    • 近战 mandibles [[/r 1d20+7 #Mandibles]]{+7}/[[/r 1d20+2 #Mandibles]]{+2}/[[/r 1d20-3 #Mandibles]]{-3} (poison), 伤害 [[/r {1}[piercing]+{1d4}[poison]]]{1 piercing damage + 1d4毒素伤害}
  • Toad
    • Senses @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.rqfnQ5VHT5hxm25r]{Scent} (Imprecise) 30尺
    • 速度 5尺
    • 近战 jaws [[/r 1d20+7 #Jaws]]{+7}/[[/r 1d20+2 #Jaws]]{+2}/[[/r 1d20-3 #Jaws]]{-3}, 伤害 [[/r {1}[bludgeoning]]]{1钝击伤害}
  • Wolf
    • 体型 中型
    • Senses @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.rqfnQ5VHT5hxm25r]{Scent} (Imprecise) 30尺
    • 速度 40 feet, climb 10尺
    • 近战 jaws [[/r 1d20+7 #Jaws]]{+7}/[[/r 1d20+2 #Jaws]]{+2}/[[/r 1d20-3 #Jaws]]{-3}, 伤害 [[/r {1d10-1}[piercing]]]{1d10-1穿刺伤害} plus @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.BCLvAx4Pz4MLa2pu]{击倒 Knockdown}

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

PJbq8TKDuFGf9n7l.name: Quasit Venom
PJbq8TKDuFGf9n7l.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段3 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} (1轮)

Quatoid.name: 人面章鱼 Quatoid
Quatoid.publicNotes:
Quatoids are peculiar, mysterious elementals native to the Plane of Water that resemble four-tentacled octopuses with eerily humanoid faces on their mantles.

水元素可能具有非凡的破坏力，但这往往并非出于本心；就像水可以给主物质位面带来生命一样，它的波浪可以冲击海岸，雨水也能淹没城市。水元素同样如此难以捉摸。

2PnyMPtvBpBFJJyw.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

Zo1gKFEHyKae5EQL.name: 水流冲击(随意施法) Hydraulic Push (At Will)
Zo1gKFEHyKae5EQL.description:
你唤来一团强力的高压水流，撞击目标并令其后退。尝试一次远程法术攻击骰。

大成功 目标承受6d6钝击伤害，并且被击退10尺。

成功 目标承受3d6钝击伤害，并且被击退5尺。

升阶 (+1) 该伤害增加2d6。

QphofWAqcVVsApgN.name: Calming Bioluminescence
QphofWAqcVVsApgN.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

The aura sheds dim light. Creatures in the emanation gain a +2 circumstance bonus to saving throws against emotion effects. The quatoid can activate or deactivate its calming bioluminescence as a single action, which has the concentrate trait.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.pfG1S7yShwkHT9e0]{效果: Calming Bioluminescence}

Redcap.name: 红帽精 Redcap
Redcap.publicNotes: Redcaps are sadistic and capricious fey who thrill in bloodletting and murder. While they are most famous for appearing as wizened, bearded men, redcap women are no less fearsome or cruel. Redcaps are ultimately craven bullies, cowed by anything more powerful than themselves, a trait that leads them to fear and despise the symbols of good deities. Many fairy tales explain how the redcaps draw power from dipping the hats for which they are named in fresh blood. Just as iconic to these cruel little fey are their iron-clad boots, and the clanging sound of their metal soles clanking on stone floors is both discordant and disconcerting-especially to those who recognize the sound for what it is. Redcaps typically stand only 3 feet tall, with hunched frames, pointed ears, crooked teeth, and long, white, tangled hair.

2OPayJrYVYfP1LZk.name: Red Cap
2OPayJrYVYfP1LZk.description:
A redcap's woolen hat is dyed with the blood of its victims. If the redcap loses its cap, it no longer benefits from fast healing and takes a -4 status penalty to its damage rolls. It can create a new cap in 10 minutes, but that cap doesn't grant its powers until the redcap has turned it red with Blood Soak. A cap has no benefit for creatures other than the redcap who made it.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.s5mS7CyE0oOYlecv]{效果: Lost Red Cap}

7XdX39vruCh59MIe.name: Divine Revulsion
7XdX39vruCh59MIe.description:
If a redcap sees a creature brandish a religious symbol of a good deity (which requires an interact action by that creature) or use one to cast a divine spell, the redcap must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:19] save. It then becomes temporarily immune to all brandished religious symbols for 10 minutes.

大成功 The redcap is unaffected

成功 The redcap is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 2}

失败 The redcap gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing} condition for 1 round and is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TBSHQspnbcqxsmjL]{惊惧 Frightened 4}

ivsgBmmJjZW5Wr5S.name: Blood Soak
ivsgBmmJjZW5Wr5S.description:
The redcap dips its cap in the blood of a slain foe. The foe must have died in the last minute, and the redcap must have helped kill it. The redcap gains a +4 status bonus to damage rolls for 1 minute.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.wPIGBcpCqCWgrCiq]{效果: Blood Soak}

Q9TQFtMzhVqywWrB.name: Deadly Cleave
Q9TQFtMzhVqywWrB.description:
触发 The redcap reduces a creature to 0 Hit Points with a scythe Strike.

效果 The redcap makes another scythe Strike against a different creature, using the same multiple attack penalty as the scythe Strike that triggered this reaction. This counts toward its multiple attack penalty.

P7S7nuGr7qWkygVT.name: Stomp
P7S7nuGr7qWkygVT.description: The redcap Strides up to half its Speed and makes a boot Strike at any point during that movement. If the boot Strike hits a @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.j91X7x0XSomq8d60]{倒地 Prone} creature, it deals an extra @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Bleed2d6.success].

Reefclaw.name: 礁爪怪 Reefclaw
Reefclaw.publicNotes:
Reefclaws are aquatic monsters that resemble huge shrimp or lobsters. As one might expect from its name, a reefclaw's oversized claws are powerful weapons with their vicelike grip and the ability to inject potent venom into unfortunate prey.

While reefclaws can't speak, they are intelligent enough to understand the local language of humanoids near their hunting grounds. The creatures sometimes listen to conversations, either to gain intelligence on the best place to ambush aquatic or land-dwelling prey, or merely for entertainment value-reefclaws are particularly fond of listening to people with high-pitched voices. Reefclaws are usually solitary hunters, but small swarms of female reefclaws have been known to gather around a single male for mating purposes or together for the communal raising of their broods. In the latter case, the females will perform widespread hunts in order to bring back a large enough bounty to feed their young. Such hunting parties are extremely dangerous-they've been known to tip over small flshing boats and attack those who fall overboard.

Once a reefclaw has decided upon a course of action, it follows through even if doing so spells its own end. More than one reefclaw survivor has said that the creature released its bone-crushing grasp only after its brains were leaking from its broken skull, and even then the reefclaw was able to perform a terrible last slash as part of its dying breath. During mating season, female reefclaws are often a little more pragmatic and release their prey before endangering themselves and their offspring.

Despite their intelligence and the accompanying moral quandaries, reefclaws frequently find their way onto the dinner plates of land-dwelling hunters such as humans and hobgoblins. According to those who have a taste for reefclaw flesh, the meat is either delectably sweet or slightly tangy (in the case of warm-water reefclaws). Most civilized people who know of reefclaws' intellect find the act of eating them distasteful, but this does not dissuade unscrupulous nobles in coastal regions, for whom reefclaw meat is a delicacy well worth the expense. Likewise, fisherfolk whose focus is on the bottom line of their ledgers are more than willing to hunt the dangerous creatures-or, even better, hire out the task to naive adventurers.

D2ezhwANZLcMNbz9.name: Death Frenzy
D2ezhwANZLcMNbz9.description:
触发 The reefclaw is reduced to 0 Hit Points.

效果 The reefclaw makes a claw Strike before dying.

We6LladGR4C687q0.name: Reefclaw Venom
We6LladGR4C687q0.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:17]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} (1轮)

Remorhaz.name: 百足魔虫 Remorhaz
Remorhaz.senses: 黑暗视觉, 震颤感知(模糊感官)60尺
Remorhaz.publicNotes:
A remorhaz is an enormous arctic predator that resembles a multilegged insect with draconic features. This monster has chitinous plates and more than a score segmented legs, a multipartite maw, and winglike growths fianking its head. The most unusual aspect of the creature, however, is its internal heat, which burns with such intensity that it causes the armored plates on the creature's back to become superheated whenever the beast is agitated.

Remorhazes are carnivores. Their diet includes arctic animals such as elk, but a hungry remorhaz readily devours anything it can catch and kill. It commonly lurks beneath ice or snow and ambushes prey with a sudden upward strike. Many victims die before even knowing what attacked them.

Those who survive the worm's initial onslaught must face not only its deadly jaws, but also its hideously hot body. This heat can melt weapons, scorch armor, and burn flesh-all tactics the remorhaz uses to disable and defeat its foes. A remorhaz's internal fire allows it to burrow through ice and snow with ease. It leaves smooth tunnels in its wake as melted ice refreezes to leave the telltale signs of its passage. Most people underestimate a remorhaz's intelligence, assuming it to be a mere animal. However, remorhazes are capable of learning languages. Frost giants in particular use this trait to form alliances with them. The giants provide food, protection, and shelter for the worm, and in return the remorhaz acts as a guard beast and helps the giants build fortresses and forge metal weapons. The giants also employ the worms as war beasts, using them to undermine enemy positions.

jZ8U8eTiEuKU6toZ.name: Heat
jZ8U8eTiEuKU6toZ.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:5]{5尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A creature that starts its turn in the aura takes [[/r {1d6}[fire]]]{1d6火焰伤害}. Whenever the remorhaz takes damage from an enemy, this damage increases to [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害} until the start of its next turn. Any creature that hits a remorhaz with an unarmed Strike takes [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害}, and a weapon that hits a remorhaz takes [[/r {2d6}[fire]]]{2d6火焰伤害}.

nvkbBLwKlX05vPo2.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
nvkbBLwKlX05vPo2.description:
The remorhaz unleashes a gout of flame that deals [[/r {8d6}[fire]]]{8d6火焰伤害} in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30] (@Check[type:reflex|dc:26|basic:true]豁免).

它在经过[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}之前无法再次使用吐息。

AcBYEH0GxgM4iV5v.name: Ice Tunneler
AcBYEH0GxgM4iV5v.description: A remorhaz can leave a tunnel when it burrows through ice or snow, and it usually does.

ex0dTLedYlwxNB3T.name: 活吞 Swallow Whole
ex0dTLedYlwxNB3T.description:
Large, [[/r {2d8+5}[bludgeoning]+{2d6}[fire]]]{2d8+5 bludgeoning damage plus 2d6火焰伤害}, Rupture 12

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SwallowWhole]

8RIFanFu6JDiIRH1.name: Thrash
8RIFanFu6JDiIRH1.description: The remorhaz Strikes once with its jaws and once with its tail, each targeting a different creature. Each attack counts toward the remorhaz's multiple attack penalty, but the multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks have been made.

Riding Pony.name: 矮种骑乘马 Riding Pony
Riding Pony.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Riding Pony.publicNotes: 在许多社会中，马都是坐骑和驮兽。它们是忠诚的和典型的温和生物，对于那些想长途旅行的人来说，它们是无价之宝。较小的种族，像侏儒和半身人，经常使用矮种马作为坐骑，而马是人类和其他中型类人所喜欢的坐骑。大多数人类遇到的马都是驯养的，尽管这些强壮动物组成的大型群落可以在野外找到。

CyJqBVfPXX4Fp283.name: Gallop
CyJqBVfPXX4Fp283.description: The riding pony Strides twice. It has a +10-foot circumstance bonus to its Speed during these Strides.

River Drake.name: 河栖龙兽 River Drake
River Drake.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
River Drake.publicNotes:
Although the glistening scales and sleek, fin-like wings on these drakes give them an appearance reminiscent of river fish, they are actually distant relatives of the black dragon. While smaller than most drakes, river drakes are more than capable of plaguing river travelers and are equally at home above and below the water's surface. This flexibility allows them to catch a wide variety of prey, from fish and boggards to deer and the occasional ferry passenger.

这些贪婪、野蛮、受本能驱使的龙兽是原始的龙类怪物，他们从块头更大的表亲那里继承了部分恐怖的力量，但却没保留多少它们的狡诈（若有的话）。尽管相比真龙来说，龙兽更弱、更慢、且做事缺乏动机，但对于他们周遭的生物和城镇来说，已经算是十足的威胁了。龙兽倾向于结成狩猎队伍，一种被称作“暴掠团（rampages）”的小型社交组织，这使得他们变得更为危险；一支河栖龙兽组成的暴掠团能快速毁灭临河的村庄，而徘徊的沙漠龙兽暴掠团对篷车商队来说宛如天灾。

尽管龙兽的栖息地与能力多种多样，但他们有数个共通的体貌特征来使自身结成一个物种。举例来说，龙兽没有前肢，因此当他们要在近战范围发动攻击的话，只能使用强有力的巨颚和布满鳞片的粗壮尾巴。大多数龙兽都倾向于避免近战，更愿意从猎物头顶飞过，从舒适的距离利用喷吐武器造成大范围的破坏。最后，所有龙兽都蕴藏着少量古代龙类先祖的力量，这让他们能爆发出令人难以置信的速度。

jbjsVEFvVsslwVHa.name: 尾扫 Tail Lash
jbjsVEFvVsslwVHa.description:
触发 A creature within reach of the river drake's tail uses an action to Strike or attempt a skill check.

效果 The river drake attempts to Strike the triggering creature with its tail. If it hits, the creature takes a -2 circumstance penalty to the triggering roll.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.QqC9xymSXSVunDgl]{效果: 尾扫(攻击检定)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.4HJJdogS751Z04lD]{效果: 尾扫(技能检定)}

xheziaVMnj1iAjP5.name: Caustic Mucus
xheziaVMnj1iAjP5.description:
The river drake spits a ball of caustic mucus up to a range of 50 feet that explodes in a @Template[type:burst|distance:10].
