Creatures within the burst take [[/r {4d6}[acid]]]{4d6酸液伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:19|basic:true]豁免). Those that fail this save also take @Localize[PF2E.PersistentDamage.Acid1d6.success] and take a -5-foot status penalty to their Speed. This Speed reduction ends with the persistent acid damage.

The river drake can't use Caustic Mucus again for [[/br 1d6 #Recharge Caustic Mucus]]{1d6轮}.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.TbmkcfpKIs558skY]{效果: Caustic Mucus}

GsSxwd5EPNBqxdWC.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
GsSxwd5EPNBqxdWC.description: The river drake makes one Fangs Strike and two Tail Strikes in any order.

qugqAWTLubz9fcj2.name: Speed Surge
qugqAWTLubz9fcj2.description: The river drake moves up to twice its Speed. It can do this three times per day.

Roc.name: 大鹏 Roc
Roc.publicNotes:
大鹏这种传说中体型巨大的猛禽能够捕猎大象，通常从喙到尾巴长约30尺，翼展达80尺以上。它们的狩猎策略是用它们强有力的爪子抓住猎物，然后在进食前从高处将其扔下，再用带钩的喙从骨头上撕下肉来。这种方法会产生大量的腐肉，这会导致一群见机行事食腐动物紧跟在大鹏后面，比如乌鸦和秃鹰，它们很容易就能偷偷啄食残渣。大多数情况下，大鹏并不介意这些生物，它们有时会和死掉的猎物一起被吃掉。

大鹏通常在山顶和崖壁上筑巢，只有最勇敢的陆地居民才能找到其所在。它们捕食的时候会飞很远，在陆地和海洋捕食大型猎物，以维持自己和幼仔的生命。大鹏是孤僻的独行捕食者，会在空中互相激斗以保护领土。大约每十年一次，一对交配的夫妻会一起抚养他们的幼雏。一旦雏鸟长大到可以独立捕食的年龄，父母就会分开，再次单独捕食。

特别有技巧的德鲁伊或游侠可能会捕获并训练大鹏作为飞行坐骑或狩猎伙伴，尽管此等令人难以置信的壮举很难找到几个实例。最简单的方法就是在它刚孵化的那一刻，从幼雏出生时看到的第一个生物的印象开始。然而，获得一枚大鹏的蛋绝非易事，对于想要抢蛋的人来说，这往往意味着给自己判了死刑。

xwHcXDjVTSiAD1kB.name: 翼返 Wing Rebuff
xwHcXDjVTSiAD1kB.description:
触发 一个位于大鹏翼击触及范围之外的生物进入大鹏的翼击触及范围。

效果 大鹏对触发生物进行一次翼击打击。如果大鹏推离Push目标，则目标的移动动作被打断。

4N1vw9fFoiAgxSn1.name: 飞掠 Flying Strafe
4N1vw9fFoiAgxSn1.description: 大鹏以它的飞行速度飞行，并在这一行动中的任何时刻进行两次爪击打击。每次打击必须针对不同的生物。每次攻击正常计算多重攻击减值。

fLIOuEGoDxmXYqNf.name: 小菜 Snack
fLIOuEGoDxmXYqNf.description: 大鹏攻击被自己脚爪@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的生物时在攻击检定上获得+2环境加值。

L1NeMv3ZDcttKLw2.name: 抓握 Snatch
L1NeMv3ZDcttKLw2.description: 大鹏用一只或两只脚爪@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}一个生物的时候能以一半的速度飞行，并带着目标一起移动。

yrKXLmbaekza05cd.name: 精通推离10尺 Improved Push 10尺

Roper.name: 树绳怪 Roper
Roper.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+2状态加值
Roper.publicNotes:
To all but the most sharp-eyed underground explorers, a roper appears to be nothing more than a large stalactite, stalagmite, or pillar of ice. Cunning and patient ambush predators, ropers use this to their advantage.

Ropers do not form large societies (although they can often be found living alongside other deep-dwelling denizens), but they often congregate in small clusters and sometimes hunt in groups. Particularly interested in the philosophy of life and death and the flner points of the more cruel and sinister religions of the world, a roper can talk or argue for hours with those it initially sought merely to eat. Quick-thinking spelunkers can sometimes stave off a roper's appetite by entertaining it with stories or discussions of philosophy, but ropers do not willingly allow such intriguing prey to escape alive. Stories speak of particularly skilled debaters and philosophers who have been kept for days or even years as pets or conversational companions by roper clusters, but in the end, if such pets don't eventually escape, the ropers' appetites win out over their intellectual curiosity-especially in cases where the pets constantly outmaneuver their keepers' wits and patience. A roper is 9 feet tall and weighs 2,200 pounds.

vJxCPyKdG9Aaedkx.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+2状态加值

E0hXra1OswZG4gQM.name: Reactive Lash
E0hXra1OswZG4gQM.description:
触发 A creature within reach of the roper's strand leaves a square during a move action it's using.

效果 The roper makes a strand Strike against the triggering creature.

DZQzqTM8bO1vt4ps.name: Extend Strands
DZQzqTM8bO1vt4ps.description: The roper extends or retracts six thin, sticky tendrils from its body. While the strands are extended, the roper takes a -4 circumstance penalty to Stealth checks, and while they're retracted, it can't use its strand Strikes.

2JiFczs0m1iIKqPZ.name: Flurry of Strands
2JiFczs0m1iIKqPZ.description: The roper makes a strand Strike with each of its strands (except those that are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{Immobilizing} creatures). Each attack must be against a different target. These attacks count toward the roper's multiple attack penalty, but its multiple attack penalty doesn't increase until after all the attacks.

H85aThyyHpy8z06u.name: Pull the Strands
H85aThyyHpy8z06u.description: The roper pulls every creature @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed} by its strands toward itself. The roper rolls a single @Check[type:athletics] check and compares the result to each @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized} creature's Fortitude DC. The roper pulls each creature it succeeds against up to 25 feet closer and each creature it critically succeeds against up to 50 feet closer.

FyUL1Dfsy8YJIJH4.name: Sticky Strand
FyUL1Dfsy8YJIJH4.description: Any creature hit by a roper's strand is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}. Each additional hit from a strand increases the enfeebled condition value by 1 (to a maximum of enfeebled 4). This enfeebled value decreases by 1 every 8 hours. The roper can move while it has a creature grabbed with a strand, but it automatically releases the creature if it moves beyond the strand's reach. The roper can release an grabbed creature as a free action. A creature can sever a strand with a target attack that hits AC 27 and deals at least 18 slashing damage. This doesn't deal any damage to the roper itself, though it can no longer attack with a severed strand.

Rune Giant.name: 符文巨人 Rune Giant
Rune Giant.publicNotes:
古老的巫师用魔法制造和培育出了符文巨人，它们被赋予用魔法命令并控制其他巨人的力量，是巨人中的暴君和诅咒。符文巨人自身侍奉于更强大的主人——被称为符文领主强大巫师，它们为符文领主的帝国指挥整个巨人军队。这些帝国崩溃后的漫长岁月里，符文巨人一直作为单独的民族而存在，尽管在外界看来，它们不过是迷信的巨人们在深夜里窃窃私语的恐怖传说。符文巨人通常居住于最偏远和崎岖的高耸山脉，但也可能出现在失落的岛屿、冰川峡谷中的巨大废墟，甚至是更偏远和神秘的地区。

符文巨人醒目的炭灰色身体上装饰者几十枚符文，这些符文是他们强大邪术的有力体现。符文巨人特别高大，平均40尺高，体重25000磅。

巨人是生活在世界偏远地区的大型类人生物。它们被分为许多不同类型。

dvenwngmH8FFaPNZ.name: 奥术内在法术 Arcane Innate Spells

bCgL1BzKQHBGHqPL.name: 凌空而行(永久) Air Walk (Constant)
bCgL1BzKQHBGHqPL.description: 目标可以在空气中行走，如同在坚实地面上。它可以如此上升与下降，最大45度角。

jTCynZS3NcEx1n1y.name: 暗示术(随意施法) Suggestion (At Will)
jTCynZS3NcEx1n1y.description:
你的甜言蜜语令生物难以抗拒。你向目标指示一系列动作，其用语对目标而言必须是一系列合理的动作，并且它不可以招致自毁或者明显违抗目标自身愿望。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且知道你尝试控制它。

成功 目标不受影响，并且认为你在和它们正常对话，而不是对其施放法术。

失败 目标立即按照你的指示行动。该法术的持续时间为1分钟，或者直到目标完成一个有终点的指示，或者直到指示变得会招致自毁，或具有其他明显的负面效果。

大失败 如同失败，但基本持续时间为1小时。

升阶 (8环级) 你能以至多10个生物为目标。

xeRH37MTBNYg5VvM.name: 魅惑术(随意施法) Charm (At Will)
xeRH37MTBNYg5VvM.description:
在目标看来，你的言语甜蜜动听，你的形象笼罩在梦幻般的光晕中。目标必须尝试一次意志豁免，如果你或者你的盟友最近威胁它或者对它进行了敌对行为，会获得+4环境加值。

你可以解消该法术。如果你对目标使用任何敌对动作，法术终止。当该法术结束时，目标不一定会意识到自己被魅惑了，除非它和你的友好关系，或者你说服它去做的事情与其期望发生冲突。这也即是说你可以通过常规的方法说服目标继续作为你的朋友。

大成功 目标不受影响，并且意识到你尝试魅惑它。

成功 该目标不受影响，但是认为你的法术是某种无害的东西，而不是魅惑术，除非它能识别该法术（通常通过辨识法术（Identifying Spells））。

失败 目标对你的态度变为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.v66R7FdOf11l94im]{友好 Friendly}）。如果已经是友好，则变为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.v44P3WUcU1j0115l]{乐于帮助 Helpful}。它不能对你做出敌对行为。

大失败 目标变为乐于帮助（helpful）并且不能对你做出敌对行为。

升阶 (4环级) 该法术持续时间为持续到下次你进行你的日常准备。

升阶 (8环级) 该法术持续时间为持续到下次你进行你的日常准备，并且你能以至多10个生物作为目标。

YQSLCIq7hpOxQjiS.name: +1板条甲 +1 Splint Mail
YQSLCIq7hpOxQjiS.description: 这种盔甲在链甲上灵活加固并连锁金属板件，通常位于穿戴者的躯干、上臂和腿上。这种盔甲包含一套内衬的布甲和一双手套。

uwBAscSuJG489hpI.name: 命令巨人 Command Giants
uwBAscSuJG489hpI.description: 当符文巨人对其他巨人施展心灵法术时，其DC为39，而非35。

Cu6pedSvnaK0fqOF.name: 提出要求 Demand
Cu6pedSvnaK0fqOF.description: 当符文巨人施展内在法术@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R9xqCBblkS5KE4y7]{短讯术 Sending}时，他也能同时对目标施展@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{暗示术 Suggestion}。

7CjSawx6weIPrIFL.name: 闪耀符文 Flashing Runes
7CjSawx6weIPrIFL.description:
触发 符文巨人使用带有奥术特征的能力或施展奥术法术。

效果 符文巨人身体上的符文爆发出魔法能量。@Template[type:emanation|distance:10]{10尺弥漫}范围内的所有生物必须尝试一次@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35]检定。

大成功 生物不受影响。

成功 生物@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}1轮。

失败 生物@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}一轮。

JBksJycZVWAJ0ESS.name: 祈祷符文 Invoke Rune
JBksJycZVWAJ0ESS.description:
符文巨人向身体上其中一个符文祈祷，该符文对@Template[type:cone|distance:30|damaging:yes]{30尺锥形}范围喷射出火花，对范围内所有生物造成[[/r {6d12}[electricity]]]{6d12电击伤害}（@Check[type:reflex|dc:37|basic:true]豁免）。

一个发光的符文副本出现在巨人持有的一件武器上，给与该武器下列可选效果之一。巨人在[[/br 1d4 #rounds]]{1d4轮}内无法再次祈祷符文。

武器效果持续1分钟，如果巨人在武器上放置了一个新符文，则旧符文的符文立即消失并且效果结束。

  • 毁灭符文 Rune of Destruction 武器获得致命（deadly）特征，重击时增加3个该武器的基础伤害骰。并且被该武器命中的生物必须通过@Check[type:fortitude|dc:35|name:Rune of Destruction]检定，否则陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1}。
  • 火焰符文 Rune of Flames 该武器的所有攻击造成额外[[/r {3d6}[fire]]]{3d6火焰伤害}。
  • 猛击符文 Rune of Smiting 该武器命中时，巨人能击退目标10尺（重击则击退20尺）。

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.svXRrZvixRInmabj]{效果: 毁灭符文(巨剑)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.vJAHjBoEuFKGQoGs]{效果: 毁灭符文(长矛)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.vbxcQIjLVWa43sdt]{效果: 毁灭符文(投石)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.zBQM4rzLfkLzpET6]{效果: 火焰符文(巨剑)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.0ifqiVhhKULXJyf9]{效果: 火焰符文(长矛)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.3QUaxNvpHDmf9cTo]{效果: 火焰符文(投石)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.VAy6IZ0ck7ALVL4b]{效果: 猛击符文(巨剑)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.Y5vsF5Kb8oNIccWo]{效果: 猛击符文(长矛)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.bV70ZxnUAoYnfXaZ]{效果: 猛击符文(投石)}

yUMh1Oa8g3zZ6utm.name: 猛挥 Wide Swing
yUMh1Oa8g3zZ6utm.description: 符文巨人进行一次单独的巨剑打击，并和触及范围内最多两名敌人的AC相比较。此攻击在计入符文巨人的多重攻击减值时算作两次攻击。

Rust Monster.name: 锈蚀怪 Rust Monster
Rust Monster.publicNotes:
Found in lost dungeons, deep caves, and abandoned mines, rust monsters are a bane to any adventurers who rely on armor, weapons, or other metal items. These strange-looking creatures grow to about 5 feet long, with four insectile legs and a long tail ending in a four-pronged appendage resembling a tiny windmill. However, it is the rust monster's feathery antennae that strike fear in the hearts of battle-hardened warriors, for a single touch from even just one antenna can reduce an adventurer's most valuable tools to a useless pile of rust.

Rust monsters aren't inherently aggressive creatures, but they're voracious oxidivores, meaning they consume the rust created by their antennae. The creatures savagely attack anything that gets between them and a possible meal, and they relentlessly pursue any source of metal. A rust monster can be distracted by a single metal-rich item, but they are often encountered in groups of three or more, sharply raising the cost of escape.

Rust monsters are a terrible scourge in mining communities. If a group of rust monsters discovers rich veins of ore, they can multiply quickly. By weakening tunnels, attacking workers, and consuming the source of the miners' livelihood, these aberrations have created many mountainside ghost towns.

fLzaGzA3jMdzslmt.name: Metal Scent 30尺
fLzaGzA3jMdzslmt.description: A rust monster can smell metal as a precise sense.

RYEcc50Tn0g5GE6m.name: Tail Trip
RYEcc50Tn0g5GE6m.description:
触发 A creature carrying a metal item attempts to move out of a square within reach of the rust monster's tail.

效果 The rust monster makes a tail Strike against the triggering creature.

3EkDCh4CkGrgHhlf.name: Antenna Disarm
3EkDCh4CkGrgHhlf.description:
The rust monster attempts to @Compendium[pf2e.action-macros.ooiO59Ch2QaebOmc]{Disarm} a metal item a creature is holding using its antenna (with the same modifier as an antenna Strike).

On a success, the item is subject to the rust monster's rust ability in addition to the effects of the Disarm, and if the check to Disarm is a critical success, the rust monster drops the item on the ground in its own space.

aeZh7jl8AKKWs8Qv.name: Rust
aeZh7jl8AKKWs8Qv.description:
A rust monster's antenna causes metal to rapidly rust and corrode.

If it succeeds at an antenna Strike or Disarm attempt with its antenna, the rust monster deals [[/r {2d6}]]{2d6伤害} (doubled on a critical hit) to a metal item the target is wearing or holding, ignoring its Hardness.

If the rust monster hits an unattended metal item, the item takes this damage automatically.

If a creature uses the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.jM72TjJ965jocBV8]{Shield Block} reaction with a metal shield against an antenna attack, the shield is automatically broken, but no other item is rusted on that attack.

Salamander.name: 火蜥蜴 Salamander
Salamander.publicNotes:
Salamanders have serpentine lower torsos, but humanoid upper bodies with toothy reptilian snouts. Their affinity for cruelty and violence puts them in close alliance with the demons of the Abyss.

火元素是灼热的火元素位面的破坏性的具现。

MOmmOyY0sUO8EEIX.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

osaWxy5RrqJdKuni.name: Armor of Flames
osaWxy5RrqJdKuni.description: The salamander stokes its internal flames. Until the start of its next turn, it gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC, and when an adjacent creature touches it or hits it with a physical attack, that creature takes [[/r {2d6}[persistent,fire]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续火焰伤害} unless it succeeds at a @Check[type:reflex|dc:25|traits:damaging-effect] save.

Satyr.name: 萨堤尔 Satyr
Satyr.publicNotes:
To a satyr, life is a party and everyone is invited. Notorious for their hedonism, these fey believe there's no greater beauty than can be found in song, drink, indulgent meals, and carnal pleasures. Satyrs use their enchanting songs and natural charm to encourage all manner of people to follow their true desires and free themselves from society's rules. This usually involves enticing mortals to join raucous parties or engage in trysts in moonlit glades. If a potential companion rejects a satyr's advances, however, the satyr has little interest in continuing a conversation and goes off to find more amenable revelers.

The lifestyle of a satyr leaves no room for ongoing affairs or long-term friends. Once his party is over or his lust is satiated, the satyr disappears back into the forest. The offspring satyrs leave behind are satyrs themselves, and usually end up being taken from their cradles by other fey rather than being left in mortals' care. Satyrs are always male.

The untouched beauty of the forest is sacred and precious to a satyr. Brutish intruders who clear-cut trees or massacre animals without eating them risk drawing a satyr's ire. A satyr so provoked uses his spells to undermine foes and attempts to dispatch them either with brutal ambushes or by leading a rush of forest animals to attack.

Other fey, particularly good fey, look upon satyrs as loutish, embarrassing cousins. They're rarely hostile toward satyrs, but most find them insufferable and advise any mortals they like to steer clear of satyrs' glades.

GA9tSWJmy7KFgUjB.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

VPctIxAu5NWL32Aq.name: 三拍子 Triple Time
VPctIxAu5NWL32Aq.description:
你以活跃的节奏起舞，加速你盟友的移动。你和所有区域内的盟友的所有速度获得+10尺状态加值，持续1轮。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.HtaDbgTIzdiTiKLX]{法术效果：三拍子}

whnlIeB6kAxCZ72U.name: 激发表现 Inspire Competence
whnlIeB6kAxCZ72U.description:
你的鼓舞激励盟友完成任务。这视为进行了完善的准备援助盟友进行你所选定的一个技能检定，无视环境因素。当你之后使用援助动作时，你可以投掷表演检定而非通常的技能检定，如果你投出失败，你会反而获得成功。如果你在表演中为传奇等级，你自动获得大成功。

GM可以规定若你的表演会干涉队友的技能检定，则无法使用这一能力援助队友（比如在安静情况下使用隐匿或者维持易容）。

h4qPfDnAjrfUEFX6.name: Sylvan Wine
h4qPfDnAjrfUEFX6.description:
A satyr's wineskin magically enchants any alcohol inside. With an Interact action, a living creature can imbibe the alcohol and gain a +1 item bonus to Will saves and a +3 item bonus to Will saves against fear effects for the following hour. When the wineskin is removed from a satyr's person, the magic remains only until the wine spoils. The wineskin holds up to eight drafts of wine.

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.QDs8t1U1IepzYlyi]{效果: Sylvan Wine}

hbBhekpAkC55ljY1.name: Fleet Performer
hbBhekpAkC55ljY1.description: When the satyr Plays the Pipes to cast a spell, he can Step or Stride as part of the activity.

vius8NahqzVZYRSE.name: Play the Pipes
vius8NahqzVZYRSE.description:
需求 The satyr is holding a musical instrument.

效果 The satyr plays a melody on his instrument to cast @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{魅惑术 Charm}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear}, @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{睡眠术 Sleep}, or @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{暗示术 Suggestion} without expending the spell slot and using his music in place of providing the spell's component actions. The spell gains the auditory trait and targets all creatures in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] instead of its usual targets. A creature that succeeds at its Will save against any spell is then temporarily immune from spells played from that satyr's pipes for 1 minute. Satyrs are immune to this music.

Scorpion Swarm.name: 蝎群 Scorpion Swarm
Scorpion Swarm.publicNotes:
While a single scorpion is itself a menace, swarms of these vermin can be outright devastating. These skittering droves of death swiftly bring down their prey before devouring everything short of the victim's bones.

蝎子是生活在沙漠、森林、热带稀树大草原和荒地的包复着甲壳的虫害，它们是致命的蛛形纲动物，有着强大的钳子和令人痛苦的尾刺。蝎子在几乎所有的气候带中出没，它们以耐心的潜行和原始的蛮力捕食猎物。大多数蝎子生活在地下洞穴里，要么作为独行猎手，要么组成蝎群。这些蛛形纲动物是如此可怕和危险，以至于在许多文化中，它们被视为神或死亡和防卫的二元论象征。

APm9xzjMvRMHIYon.name: Scorpion Venom
APm9xzjMvRMHIYon.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:18]

最大持续时间 6轮

阶段1 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d6}[poison]]]{1d6毒素伤害}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

tZ39PkV2oWLySkOs.name: Swarming Stings
tZ39PkV2oWLySkOs.description: Each enemy in the swarm's space takes [[/r {2d8}[piercing]]]{2d8穿刺伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:21|basic:true]豁免) and is exposed to scorpion venom.

Simurgh.name: 西牟鸟 Simurgh
Simurgh.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Simurgh.publicNotes:
Desert-dwelling people consider the sight of a simurgh a herald to a lifetime's worth of luck, and those who are unfamiliar with the majestic beast might mistake it for the avatar of a deity. Beautiful, graceful, and truly gargantuan, the simurgh resembles nothing so much as a massive multicolored bird with the head of an equally enormous and regal lupine. Simurghs act as intermediaries in world-threatening conflicts, serving as agents of good deities or vigilantes who spread their own brand of justice, typically by obliterating or banishing evil extraplanar beings.

Simurghs can live for thousands of years, and because these ancient beings are so rare many doubt their existence. But they are very real, as those who have been aided by a simurgh can enthusiastically attest. A simurgh does not show itself often, but when it does, it is typically in response to a truly grave threat, such as the incursion of an undead army or the rampage of some truly epic monster. Simurghs are nothing if not paragons of righteousness, and goodly heroes can hardly find a better ally in their quest to vanquish evil than a simurgh.

G4HjijhXg27QNTqn.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

aIlJ68HccllslBhH.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
aIlJ68HccllslBhH.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

ff4wdxelwlYQwvOS.name: 诚实之域(随意施法) Zone of Truth (At Will)
ff4wdxelwlYQwvOS.description:
你指定一个区域，此区域中生物被迫只能说出真话。处于区域中或者进入区域中的生物难以撒谎。每个会被影响的生物必须在法术被施放时、或者它第一次进入该区域时，尝试一次意志豁免。如果它离开并再次进入该区域，它会使用相同的豁免结果。受影响的生物会知晓此惑控效果的存在；因此，它们会避免回答那些它们通常以撒谎来回应的问题，或者在说真话的范围内闪烁其词。

大成功 目标不受影响。

成功 目标在欺骗（Deception）检定上承受-2状态减值。

失败 该目标无法说出任何故意的谎言，并且在欺骗（Deception）检定上承受-2状态减值。

大失败 该目标无法说出任何故意的谎言，并且在欺骗（Deception）检定上承受-4状态减值。

K6Ty6fjWIqDqupgg.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (At Will) (Evil Only)
K6Ty6fjWIqDqupgg.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

LExzjKETFlcOY6aw.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
LExzjKETFlcOY6aw.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

JRoSNngd9XENOzDl.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

QqqqheeizksJ9NkJ.name: Aura of Peace
QqqqheeizksJ9NkJ.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:50]{50尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

A creature that starts its turn in the aura must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:37] save or be affected by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{安定心神 Calm Emotions}. Creatures that successfully save are unaffected, but must attempt another save each turn they start in the aura.

EQs2G0f4rbGphFRv.name: Banishing Swipe
EQs2G0f4rbGphFRv.description: If a creature hit by the simurgh's tail Strike is not currently on its home plane, it must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:42] save or be affected by @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.bay4AfSu2iIozNNW]{Banishment}, except that if the creature critically succeeds its save the simurgh is not @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned}.

lKC4So6E50bV5RRz.name: Radiant Feathers
lKC4So6E50bV5RRz.description:
频率 每天一次

效果 The simurgh fans out its glimmering tail feathers and blasts its foes with a @Template[type:cone|distance:100] of radiant light. Aside from the size of the cone, this effect is identical to @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.d6o52BnjViNz7Gub]{Prismatic Spray} (DC 42).

Sphinx.name: 斯芬克斯 Sphinx
Sphinx.senses: 黑暗视觉; detect magic, see invisibility
Sphinx.publicNotes:
Sphinxes are mystical beings with the body of a lion, the wings of a great bird, and the upper torso and head of a human. They are often maligned in legends as nothing more than monsters, and though they are quick to anger and are capable of exacting deadly retribution for perceived slights, they are also very intelligent.

Sphinxes are often associated with desert regions, but they can dwell in more moderate climates as well. They form small groups consisting of a single, extended family that hunts and works together to protect and teach their young. As they mature, sphinxes develop a wanderlust, a drive to gather hidden lore and solve the world's greatest riddles-the trait that is perhaps most often identified with their kind.

While sometimes bound into service as guardians for powerful spellcasters, lone sphinxes may also be encountered on journeys of discovery and as purveyors of esoteric lore. If treated with the proper respect-and fed well-a sphinx can demonstrate a willingness to exchange information. Their favorite currency is, of course, riddles and secrets. One who can trade knowledge for knowledge has a much better chance of succeeding while bargaining with a sphinx. However, a sphinx's insatiable thirst for new riddles as well their extensive collection of secrets accumulated over hundreds of years of life-makes it difficult to offer them something they don't already know. Those who attempt to trade petty insight and stale riddles may invoke a sphinx's ire and will not live long enough to regret it.

pxfevBUBi49C9LID.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

lt3BOPlp3xHdHIpR.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
lt3BOPlp3xHdHIpR.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

0PvvdloURD8opkYS.name: 鹰眼术(随意施法) Clairvoyance (At Will)
0PvvdloURD8opkYS.description: 你在射程内创造出一个 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}的悬浮眼睛（它甚至可以在你的视觉线或者效果线之外）。这只眼睛不能移动，但是你可以从该处看到所有方向，如同使用你通常的视觉感官。

wLITcsSw02suvEfW.name: 锐耳术(随意施法) Clairaudience (At Will)
wLITcsSw02suvEfW.description: 你在射程内创造出一个 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible}的悬浮耳朵（它甚至可以在你的视觉线或者效果线之外）。它不能移动，但是你可以通过该耳朵听到声音，如同你通常的听觉感官。

kQ3f06MvY2faGWKA.name: 识破隐形(恒定法术) See Invisibility (Constant)
kQ3f06MvY2faGWKA.description:
你能看见 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.zJxUflt9np0q4yML]{隐形 Invisible} 的生物和物体。对你而言它们看起来如同半透明一般，并且对你视为 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed} 。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术的持续时间为8小时。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.T5bk6UH7yuYog1Fp]{法术效果：识破隐形}

02y19dbrh9JOvh5r.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
02y19dbrh9JOvh5r.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

B9QrAlNM1MoP8sDk.name: Bardic Lore
B9QrAlNM1MoP8sDk.description: Sphinxes are naturally curious, and their love of puzzles and mysteries leads them to gather information on a broad range of topics. Sphinxes have the @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.uVXEZblPRuCyPRua]{Bardic Lore} bard feat, allowing them to Recall Knowledge on any topic.

1uZuWVNr0woQanKG.name: Claw Rake
1uZuWVNr0woQanKG.description: The sphinx rears back on their hind legs and makes two claw Strikes at the same target, using the same attack bonus as their highest melee attack. If both attacks deal damage, the target takes extra damage equal to one claw Strike.

XbyGgxrnfchvOdm3.name: Pounce
XbyGgxrnfchvOdm3.description: The sphinx Strides and makes a Strike at the end of that movement. If the sphinx began this action @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.iU0fEDdBp3rXpTMC]{藏匿 Hidden}, they remain hidden until after the attack.

Vyc7HceERBcZQuXT.name: Warding Glyph
Vyc7HceERBcZQuXT.description: Once per week, a Sphinx can create a magical symbol as though casting a heightened @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o0l57UfBm9ScEUMW]{Glyph of Warding} spell. The sphinx usually shapes the glyph to take the form of a written riddle, and sets the password to the answer. A creature that gives the wrong answer or tries to pass without answering must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:26] save or suffer one of the following spell effects, chosen by the sphinx when creating the symbol: @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.BilnTGuXrof9Dt9D]{Synaptic Pulse} (5th), @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.vLA0q0WOK2YPuJs6]{魅惑术 Charm} (4th), @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.4koZzrnMXhhosn0D]{Fear} (3rd), @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R8bqnYiThB6MYTxD]{Phantom Pain} (3rd), @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.o4lRVTwSxnOOn5vl]{睡眠术 Sleep} (3rd). The sphinx learns the identity of any creature that answers the riddle and tends to be friendly to them.

Spider Swarm.name: 蜘蛛群 Spider Swarm
Spider Swarm.publicNotes:
An abundance of food, the sudden hatching of a clutch of eggs, or magical influence can cause smaller spiders to gather in terrifying, deadly masses.

很少有害虫能像声名狼藉的蜘蛛那样让人如此恐惧。

bmmCoxENGAgHtWP1.name: Web Sense
bmmCoxENGAgHtWP1.description: The spider swarm has imprecise @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.j2wsK6IsW5yMW1jW]{震颤感知 Tremorsense} to detect the vibrations of creatures touching its web.

NIgj8uAlgosxMdVf.name: Spider Swarm Venom
NIgj8uAlgosxMdVf.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:14]

最大持续时间 4轮

阶段1 [[/r 1 #poison]]{1毒素}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

阶段2 [[/r {1d4}[poison]]]{1d4毒素}和@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} (1轮)

bEsmMOS1PqhLHHbh.name: Swarming Bites
bEsmMOS1PqhLHHbh.description:
Each enemy in the spider swarm's space takes [[/r {1d4}[piercing]]]{1d4穿刺伤害} with a @Check[type:reflex|dc:14|basic:true] save.

A creature that fails its save is exposed to spider swarm venom.

Sprite.name: 小妖精 Sprite
Sprite.publicNotes:
Common sprites are primeval guardians that latch onto a person, place, or object and defend it for their own inscrutable reasons. Their dispositions vary from kind to spiteful, but all sprites have a capricious streak. Being only about 9 inches tall, they are wary of animals that might hunt them, particularly house cats, and prefer flight to a fight. On the other hand, sprites are incredibly curious about all forms of magic and heedlessly gather around ley line nexuses or other places of power.

飘忽、热情、难以捉摸的小妖精是许多村夫在听到“精类”或“妖精”一词时首先想到的东西。尽管性格各不相同，从亲切的格利精到喜欢恶作剧的皮克精，所有小妖精都具备和魔法的内在联系以及微小的体格。这个精类家族中最罕见与人口最多的成员都有着共同的名称——以最常见的小妖精命名。

ja5ZUKm30pmuCb0m.name: 原能内在法术 Primal Innate Spells

uzpjBUvQhQD08nx4.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
uzpjBUvQhQD08nx4.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

h7p7zhkW6OBX6N85.name: Luminous Fire
h7p7zhkW6OBX6N85.description: A sprite naturally sheds light like a torch. The sprite can extinguish, rekindle, or change the color of this light using a single action, which has the concentrate trait. While this light is extinguished, the sprite's Strikes don't deal fire damage and they can't use their luminous spark Strike.

Stegosaurus.name: 剑龙 Stegosaurus
Stegosaurus.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Stegosaurus.publicNotes:
The stegosaurus is easily recognized by its twin rows of diamond-shaped dorsal plates that run down its spine, and thick tail adorned with four large spikes. This strange configuration protects this herbivore from predators, as the stegosaurus can hunker down to interpose its dorsal plates between an attacker and its thick body. A stegosaurus defends itself by swinging its spiked tail at larger foes and trampling smaller opponents underfoot.

The stegosaurus often inhabits grasslands, where nutritious vegetation is plentiful and only its dorsal plates rise above waving fields of tall grass. The stegosaurus is among the most curious of dinosaurs, and hunters often find it easy to bait them with shiny trinkets or strange noises. A stegosaurus is about 30 feet long, 16 feet high at the top of its highest dorsal plate, and weighs between 2 and 3 tons.

The stegosaurus is generally more even-tempered and even gentle, despite its size, than the ankylosaurus. This combination makes it even more popular as a trained pet or guard, but even then one should take care to not annoy the dinosaur-an angry or annoyed stegosaurus can lash out with its tail with little warning. Often, it's wiser to train smaller variants, such as the kentrosaurus. Regardless, their dorsal plates make this dinosaur a poor choice as a mount.

这些巨大的爬行动物是世界原始时代的遗留物，现在仍然大量存在于偏僻的荒野中，或者在黑暗之地Darklands 的地下魔法洞穴中。蜥蜴族、半兽人、巨人和其他人形生物有时会把恐龙当作坐骑、守卫或猎兽。众所周知，人类和其他族裔也收集恐龙，把它们放在动物园里展出，或把它们当作异域宠物或守卫。这通常是富人或怪咖喜欢干的事情，但确实也有一些德鲁伊和其他自然的守护者能与恐龙亲密相处，甚至把它们作为动物伙伴。当恐龙在它们正常栖息地以外的地区安家时，通常可能是因为被圈养的恐龙逃进荒野造成的。

sSd80IXHhedyt6q5.name: Dorsal Deflection
sSd80IXHhedyt6q5.description:
触发 The stegosaurus is targeted with a melee attack.

效果 The stegosaurus leans its dorsal plates into the attack, gaining a +2 circumstance bonus to its AC against the triggering attack. If the attack misses, the stegosaurus Steps after the attack.

Stone Giant.name: 石巨人 Stone Giant
Stone Giant.publicNotes:
石巨人坚忍的、避世而居的牧人和艺术家，它们有丰富的历史和收集传统。他们生活在高山和崎岖的岩洞里，灰色的皮肤使它们能融入周围的环境里，不被粗心大意的冒险者注意到。那些善良的旅行者遇到石巨人时不用太担心，石巨人不会主动挑起冲突。总的来说它们是爱好和平的民族，它们通过探索自然和对自然世界元素的长期冥想来寻求智慧。它们的长老是最聪明的石巨人，使用它们的魅力和德鲁伊魔法来领导部落走向繁荣并和自然和谐相处。

典型的石巨人高12尺，重约1500磅。

巨人是生活在世界偏远地区的大型类人生物。它们被分为许多不同类型。

k1wz9hBi74eZjENe.name: 石头袋 Sack for Holding Rocks

206EmbcftIC6vntv.name: 大回摆 Big Swing
206EmbcftIC6vntv.description:
石巨人进行一次巨木棒打击。如果命中，目标被推离10尺，重击则为20尺。

如果目标碰撞到坚硬物体或坠落地面，则它受到等同于其移动距离的坠落伤害（钝击）。

Vampire Spawn Rogue.name: 吸血鬼子嗣游荡者 Vampire Spawn Rogue
Vampire Spawn Rogue.hp: coffin restoration, fast healing 5, negative healing
Vampire Spawn Rogue.publicNotes:
Vampires use their spawn for infiltration and reconnaissance.

吸血鬼是一种以活物鲜血为食的不死生物。

RaYfxxlT031lUgCP.name: Coffin Restoration
RaYfxxlT031lUgCP.description: Unlike other undead, a vampire isn't destroyed at 0 HP. Instead, it falls @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}. If its body rests in its coffin for 1 hour, the vampire gains 1 HP, after which its @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.fJSNOw4zHGbIm4bZ]{快速愈合 Fast Healing} begins to function normally.

mK3REH0Jcz0NP7Bh.name: Vampire Weaknesses
mK3REH0Jcz0NP7Bh.description:
All vampires possess the following weaknesses.

  • Compulsions Vampires are creatures of strange and unknowable compulsions. A typical vampire can't voluntarily cross running water unless it is transported while it hides within its coffin, nor can it enter a private dwelling unless invited in by someone with the authority to do so. At your discretion, vampires might have different compulsions-a pirate vampire might not be able to set foot on solid ground without being invited, for example. The vampire can still be forced to do these things and might be able to overcome its compulsion just as it does its revulsion.
  • Revulsion A vampire can't voluntarily come within 10 feet of brandished garlic or a brandished religious symbol of a non-evil deity. To brandish garlic or a religious symbol, a creature must Interact to do so for 1 round (similar to Raising a Shield). If the vampire involuntarily comes within 10 feet of an object of its revulsion, it gains the @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing} condition, running from the object of its revulsion until it ends an action beyond 10 feet. After 1 round of being exposed to the subject of its revulsion, a vampire can attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:25|name:Overcome Revulsion] save as a single action, which has the concentrate trait. On a success, it overcomes its revulsions for [[/br 1d6 #rounds]]{1d6轮} (or 1 hour on a critical success).
  • Stake A wooden stake driven through a vampire's heart drops the vampire to 0 HP and prevents it from healing above 0 HP, even in its coffin. Staking a vampire requires three actions and works only if the vampire is unconscious. If the stake is removed, the vampire can heal above 0 HP again, and if it's in its coffin the 1-hour rest period begins once the stake is removed. If the vampire's head is severed and anointed with @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.z9T4c1hXwOotsMCp]{Holy Water} while the stake is in place, the vampire is destroyed.
  • Sunlight If exposed to direct sunlight, a vampire immediately becomes @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1}. The slowed value increases by 1 each time the vampire ends its turn in sunlight. If the vampire loses all its actions in this way, it is destroyed. Due to their supernatural aversion to light, vampires don't cast shadows or show a reflection in mirrors.

hn5GBufYeA5C1oOg.name: Drink Blood
hn5GBufYeA5C1oOg.description:
需求 A @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.6uEgoh53GbXuHpTF]{麻痹 Paralyzed}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.fBnFDH2MTzgFijKf]{失去意识 Unconscious}, or willing creature is within the vampire's reach.

效果 The vampire sinks its fangs into that creature to drink its blood. This requires an Athletics check against the victim's Fortitude DC if the victim is grabbed and is automatic for any of the other conditions.

The victim is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} and the vampire regains [[/r {5}[healing]]]{5生命值}, gaining any excess HP as temporary Hit Points. Drinking Blood from a creature that's already drained doesn't restore any HP to the vampire but increases the victim's drain value by 1. A vampire can also consume blood that's been emptied into a vessel for sustenance, but it gains no HP from doing so.

A victim's drained condition decreases by 1 per week. A blood transfusion, which requires a @Check[type:medicine|dc:20|name:Blood Transfusion] check and sufficient blood or a blood donor, reduces the drain by 1 after 10 minutes.

1jREnmv7xdTiRRHp.name: 偷袭 Sneak Attack
1jREnmv7xdTiRRHp.description:
The vampire spawn deals 1d6 extra precision damage to flat-footed creatures.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.SneakAttack]

Veiled Master.name: 面纱之主 Veiled Master
Veiled Master.allSaves: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+2状态加值
Veiled Master.publicNotes:
The powerful vidileths are the insidious veiled masters of the alghollthus. These manipulators of mind and body alike lead their species in the open, using their ability to change form to walk among and deceive humans and other sapient species. Many veiled masters are even more powerful than the typical specimen presented here and can use a wide range of arcane or occult spells and rituals. While veiled masters command significant combat prowess and impressive magical skills, the greatest danger they pose to others is their uncanny ability to infiltrate into societies much different than their own. The most paranoid of adventurers and conspiracy scholars worry that every major city has been infested by secret cabals of vidileths, while others dismiss this as hogwash and fearmongering. The truth is likely somewhere in between, but it doesn't take many veiled masters pulling the strings behind the scenes to wreak havoc upon an entire nation!

在过去的几千年里，水生怪物阿尔古苏使用它们的神秘力量征服并统治了全世界大部分地区。它们的帝国里有无数被当做牲畜的奴隶。阿尔古苏们利用精神控制和肉体塑造的魔法创造了这些奴隶和忠于它们的其他族群。从无面潜伏者到拟形怪（mimics）都能溯源出被阿尔古苏影响的痕迹。阿尔古苏的统治者们，即所谓的“幕后尊主”，不断通过改造被控制的族群的形态来进一步塑造自身的社会。无论是位高权重的权贵亦或愁云惨雾的贫民，这些幕后尊主按照它们自己的黑暗计划操纵着这些社会，并以奴役、杀戮、以及恐怖的改造来对付那些发现自己计划或试图奋起反抗的人们。

随着时间的推移，阿尔古苏对它们昔日奴隶的崛起感到失望，并试图抹去过去犯下的错误——既能让一切回归原点，又能惩罚那些任性而背叛的种族。因此它们用不可思议的魔法力量发动了一场灾难，希望摧毁那些过去被它们操纵但是如今背叛了它们的社区。然而，它们错误地估计了信仰的力量以及自己曾经的爪牙和奴隶们的生存意志，最终整个世界恢复了元气，再次变得强大起来——这一次不再有阿尔古苏在背后影响它们了。

如今，阿尔古苏已经从它们曾经操纵过的地表世界中大规模地撤退，并且它们中的大部分只在深海区域活动，在那里它们依然是无可动摇的统治者。然而它们并没有完全放弃它们的阴谋，像无面潜伏者这样的奴隶种族重新出现在世界上就证明了这种可怕的可能性——阿尔古苏们那仇视的目光已经再次盯上了地表世界。

I6M7YvqndCsq8oLj.name: 异能内在法术 Occult Innate Spells

Nt7T41ncTB9oAvqg.name: 投影术(随意施法) Project Image (At Will)
Nt7T41ncTB9oAvqg.description:
你投射出一个自身的幻影。你必须保持在幻影的射程中，并且当你无法看到幻影时，该法术结束。当你施放一个区域不是弥漫的法术时，你可以令法术效果从你或者幻影上发出。由于该幻影是幻术，它无法从法术中获益，但法术的视觉效果仍然会出现。幻影具有和你相同的AC。如果它被攻击命中，或者豁免失败，法术结束。

升阶 (+2) 你通过维持该法术可以达到的最大持续时间增加到10分钟。

0yJUHf23Yd5Mb0jv.name: 幻象场景(随意施法) Illusory Scene (At Will)
0yJUHf23Yd5Mb0jv.description:
你创造一个幻想的场景，包括至多10个各种大小的生物或者物体，它们都必须在法术区域中。这些组成元素会产生合适的声音和气味，它们摸起来也很正常。幻象场景的组成元素不能说话。不同于 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.f8SBoXiXQjlCKqly]{幻象生物 Illusory Creature} 法术，在你的场景中的生物没有战斗能力和数据。你的场景不能改变其周围的环境，但你可以将你的场景放在 @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.HBJPsonQnWcC3qdX]{幻景 Hallucinatory Terrain} 法术的幻象环境中。

当你创造该场景时，你可以选择它是静态的还是依某特定程序运动。虽然静态场景是静止的，但它仍包含基础的自然运动。例如，风吹过一张幻术纸时会卷走它。一段程序至多长1分钟，并且在其结束时重复。例如，你可以创造一个两个兽人互相打斗的场景，每次重复中这场战斗都是相同的。如果你创造一个循环，两个战士在场景结束时，会处在场景开始的位置，但你也可以让程序更流畅，从而很难指出哪里是循环的开始和结束。任何观察该场景数分钟的人几乎总会发现它是循环的。你不能在你创造幻术之后改变程序。

任何接触幻象的一部分，或者使用搜索（Seek）动作来检查它的生物可以尝试不相信你的幻觉。如果它和幻象的一部分交互，它仅不相信这部分。仅在大成功时，它才会不相信整个场景。

升阶 (6环级) 在你的场景中的生物或者物体可以说话。你必须在创造你的程序时，念出你的每个演员的每行台词。该法术会依每个演员掩饰你的声音。

升阶 (8环级) 如6环级版本，但是持续时间无限。

tQdxiNeNIuzDNd4P.name: 巧言术(恒定法术) Tongues (Constant)
tQdxiNeNIuzDNd4P.description:
无论什么语言，目标都可以理解其所有的词语，并且向其他生物用该语言交流。当处于一群各异的生物中时，每次目标将要说话，他可以选择一个生物，并使用一种该生物理解的语言来讲述，即使该目标不知道这语言具体是什么。

升阶 (7环级) 持续时间为8小时。

G0iMqJT4TeHMVS0N.name: 幻景(随意施法) Hallucinatory Terrain (At Will)
G0iMqJT4TeHMVS0N.description:
你创造一个幻觉，令自然地形看起来，听起来，感觉起来，闻起来都是另一种地形。这无法掩盖任何区域中的建筑或者生物。任何接触幻觉或者使用搜索（Seek）动作来检查它的生物可以尝试不相信你的幻觉。

升阶 (5环级) 你的幻想也会掩盖建筑或者创造幻象建筑（但仍然无法掩盖生物）。

Aj7yfMuoeLfNlfqn.name: 隐匿之纱(随意施法) Veil (At Will)
Aj7yfMuoeLfNlfqn.description:
你将目标伪装为另一个身形相似身高相仿体重相近的生物。该伪装能够隐藏目标的身份，或者令其如同其他族裔，但这不足以令其扮作另一个特定个人。该法术不会改变声音，气味，或者仪态。你为每个目标分别选择伪装；例如，你可以令一个目标看起来是矮人，另一个看起来是精灵。施放隐匿之纱视为假扮（Impersonate）动作的设立伪装。这令目标忽视任何可能会从扮作不熟悉生物中获得的减值，并且会赋予其在避免他人看破你的伪装的欺骗（Deception）检定上+4状态加值，并且即使你未受训你也加上其等级。你可以解消任一或者所有这些伪装。

升阶 (5环级) 该法术也会伪装目标的声音和气味；并获得听觉特征。

升阶 (7环级) 该目标外观上可以是任何相同体型的生物，甚至是特定个人。你必须曾见过特定个人，才能重现其外观。该法术也会伪装目标的声音和气味；并获得听觉特征。

VdNSLn7tS9xLZ2zI.name: 催眠图纹(随意施法) Hypnotic Pattern (At Will)
VdNSLn7tS9xLZ2zI.description:
你创造一个漂浮在空中的在几何图形般云雾中变换色彩的图纹。在图纹中的生物 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.TkIyaNPgTZFBCCuh]{目眩 Dazzled}。除此之外，在你施放时处于图纹中的生物，进入图纹中的生物，在图纹中结束回合的生物，或者对图纹使用搜索（Seek）或者交互（Interact）动作的生物在此时必须尝试一次意志豁免。已经被图纹 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.AdPVz7rbaVSRxHFg]{迷魂 Fascinated} 的生物无需尝试新的豁免。

成功 目标不受影响。

失败 目标被该图纹迷魂。

大失败 目标被该图纹迷魂。只要其仍迷魂，它无法使用反应动作。

NYmcjhvAsrctDwBW.name: 浮空术(随意施法) Levitate (At Will)
NYmcjhvAsrctDwBW.description:
你移去重力，令目标漂浮距离地面5尺。在法术持续时间中，你可以通过一个单动作移动目标上或者下移10尺，这具有专注特征。因浮空术而漂浮的生物在攻击骰上承受-2环境减值。漂浮的生物可以花费一个交互（Interact）动作来稳定自身，并在其回合剩余时间里取消该减值。如果目标邻接一个固定的物体，或者足够稳定的地形，他可以通过攀爬（如果平面是垂直的，例如一堵墙）或者匍匐（如果平面是水平的，例如天花板）沿着该平面移动。GM决定具体什么表面可以攀爬，什么表面应当匍匐。

@Compendium[pf2e.spell-effects.JqrTrvwV7pYStMXz]{法术效果：浮空术}

0qKIgNFS4fQjI3ej.name: 读心术(随意施法) Mind Reading (At Will)
0qKIgNFS4fQjI3ej.description:
你通过一次短暂的心灵接触来尝试阅读目标的想法。它必须尝试一次意志豁免。目标会暂时免疫你的读心术1小时。

大成功 目标得知当施放该法术时你模糊的表层想法。

成功 你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

失败 你得知当施放该法术时目标模糊的表层想法，并且你得知目标的智力调整值是高于，等于，还是低于你。

大失败 如失败，并且在法术持续时间中，你可以维持该法术来再次侦测目标的表层想法。目标不会获得另外的豁免。

XDcfEKeWZX4di6Tq.name: 秘密文页(随意施法) Secret Page (At Will)
XDcfEKeWZX4di6Tq.description: 你令目标的上的文本转变成完全不同的文本。如果该文本是法术书或者卷轴，你可以令其显示为一个你知道的，且环级低于秘密文页的法术。该替换后的法术无法被施放，或者用于准备一个法术。你也可以将该文本转变为其他你已经写过或者能够取得的文本。你可以指定一个密语，接触该书页的生物能通过该密语将文本变回原样以及替换回来。如果有，你必须在施放时选择替代文本和密语。

hDc6QDQc92oPCzYA.name: 幻象造物(随意施法) Illusory Object (At Will)
hDc6QDQc92oPCzYA.description:
你创造一个固定物体的视觉幻象。该幻象必须能完全处于法术区域中。该物体会自然活动，但是不会发出声音或者产生气味。举例而言，幻象瀑布中会出现水并流下，但是它会是安静的。

当生物触摸幻像，或者使用搜索（Seek）动作来检查它时，该生物可以尝试不相信你的幻术。

升阶 (2环级) 你的幻象也会发出合适的声音，产生正常气味，并且摸起来也很正常。该法术获得听觉特征。该持续时间增加到1小时。

升阶 (5环级) 如2环级，但是持续时间为无限。

X7eyVZD1ZflrSoj8.name: Mucus Cloud
X7eyVZD1ZflrSoj8.description:
@Template[type:emanation|distance:30]{30尺} @Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-ability-glossary-srd.v61oEQaDdcRpaZ9X]{灵光}

While underwater, a veiled master exudes a cloud of transparent slime. An air-breathing creature adjacent to a veiled master must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36] save each round or lose the ability to breathe air but gain the ability to breathe water for 24 hours.

d574MMQ1MIrxdW3F.name: 在所有对魔法的豁免上获得+2状态加值

xX27SX9rrvhMXhIZ.name: Change Shape
xX27SX9rrvhMXhIZ.description:
Once per round, a veiled master can take on the appearance of a humanoid of Large, Medium, or Small size or resume its true form. While in humanoid form, the veiled master's Speed is 30 feet, and it loses its mucus cloud aura and swim Speed. If the humanoid form assumed lacks the aquatic trait, the veiled master loses its own aquatic trait as well. In humanoid form, the veiled master can use weapons, or it can make Strikes that work like its tentacle attack but use the reach of its current form. If the assumed form has fangs or claws, the veiled master can also make such Strikes, but these attacks lack the veiled master's slime.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

1EXMfAvy6zP7X2ix.name: Consume Memories
1EXMfAvy6zP7X2ix.description: When a veiled master makes a fangs Strike against a creature, it can consume some of that creature's memories. The target must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:37] saving throw or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1}. A veiled master regains 5 Hit Points each time it successfully consumes memories. When a veiled master consumes memories, it learns some of the creature's memories (subject to the GM's discretion).

7ivzzqnDwOSXosG5.name: Delayed Suggestion
7ivzzqnDwOSXosG5.description: When a veiled master successfully casts @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.OsOhx3TGIZ7AhD0P]{支配术 Dominate} on a creature, a @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.qwlh6aDgi86U3Q7H]{暗示术 Suggestion} spell triggers when the dominate spell ends. This suggestion usually causes the target to return to the veiled master, so the creature can cast dominate again, but a veiled master can set the suggestion to different orders if it wishes.

fP1MPx5mw7OZ0cma.name: Slime
fP1MPx5mw7OZ0cma.description:
豁免检定 @Check[type:fortitude|dc:36]

阶段1 no ill effect (1轮)

阶段2 the victim's skin softens, inflicting @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 1} (1轮)

阶段3 the victim's skin transforms into a clear, slimy membrane, inflicting @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.4D2KBtexWXa6oUMR]{流失 Drained 2} until the curse ends; every hour this membrane remains dry, the creature's drained condition increases by 1 (permanent). A @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RneiyehRO6f7LP44]{Remove Disease} spell can counteract this curse, but immunity to disease offers no protection against it

4eIvZ5FrB8u5CTbJ.name: Tentacle Flurry
4eIvZ5FrB8u5CTbJ.description: The veiled master thrashes about with its tentacles. Make a tentacle Strike against each creature within its reach. Roll only one attack roll, and roll the damage only once for all targets.

EwP4uiI1GXQ7aYst.name: Thoughtlance
EwP4uiI1GXQ7aYst.description: A creature touched by the veiled master's tentacles, whether those tentacles deal damage or not, must attempt a @Check[type:will|dc:34] save, becoming @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 1} on a failure or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.xYTAsEpcJE1Ccni3]{缓慢 Slowed 2} on a critical failure. Each time the affected creature ends its turn, its slowed value decreases by 1.

Velociraptor.name: 伶盗龙 Velociraptor
Velociraptor.senses: 昏暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 30尺
Velociraptor.publicNotes:
A smaller cousin of the deinonychus, the velociraptor is a swift, cunning pack hunter. It has no fear of larger creatures, and a group of these dinosaurs won't hesitate to attack creatures the size of a horse. Velociraptors are social animals, and tend to live in groups of up to a dozen other velociraptors. They have manes of feathery plumage that extend down their backs and along the sides of their arms, legs, and tail, while their underbellies and flanks are scaly. These feathers allow them to blend into their natural terrains with ease, but when excited, attempting to intimidate, or seeking a mate, a velociraptor can puff and frill this plumage to expose much brighter colors normally covered by the longer feathers. A typical velociraptor is 1-1/2 feet tall, 7 feet long, and weighs 35 pounds.

这些巨大的爬行动物是世界原始时代的遗留物，现在仍然大量存在于偏僻的荒野中，或者在黑暗之地Darklands 的地下魔法洞穴中。蜥蜴族、半兽人、巨人和其他人形生物有时会把恐龙当作坐骑、守卫或猎兽。众所周知，人类和其他族裔也收集恐龙，把它们放在动物园里展出，或把它们当作异域宠物或守卫。这通常是富人或怪咖喜欢干的事情，但确实也有一些德鲁伊和其他自然的守护者能与恐龙亲密相处，甚至把它们作为动物伙伴。当恐龙在它们正常栖息地以外的地区安家时，通常可能是因为被圈养的恐龙逃进荒野造成的。

FoGyFrPjwdSydW4U.name: Leaping Charge
FoGyFrPjwdSydW4U.description: The velociraptor Strides up to 10 feet, ignoring difficult terrain as it leaps over obstacles. It then makes a Strike with its talons, gaining a +1 circumstance bonus to its attack roll.

RibPgalaxUxyuwym.name: Pack Attack
RibPgalaxUxyuwym.description: The velociraptor deals [[/r {1d4}]]{1d4额外伤害} to any creature that's within reach of at least two of the velociraptor's allies.

Voidworm.name: 虚空虫 Voidworm
Voidworm.senses: 熵力感知(模糊)30 feet, darkvision
Voidworm.publicNotes:
Other proteans don't consider the flying, iridescent beings known as voidworms to be part of a protean caste at all, but instead merely a shameful side effect of the Maelstrom's constantly churning energy. To call a voidworm a protean in the presence of a more powerful protean is as sure a way to instigate combat as any.

Voidworms themselves have little interest in whether anyone sees them as proteans. They maintain a thriving ecology in the Maelstrom, frolicking in schools of up to 20 and playing in the chaos of constantly shifting realities. Elsewhere (such as on the Material Plane), voidworms are mesmerized by the principle of object permanence; many latch onto specific features of a region (such as a hillside or pond) and flit through the air around it for months or even years as they wait for the object of their curiosity to change. Minor changes- such as a tree's change of color in the fall, a corpse's slow decay, or periodic venting of steam from a geyser-all fascinate voidworms. A voidworm is about 2 feet long and weighs 2 pounds.

幻蛇是混乱的捍卫者，被称为大漩涡（the Maelstrom）的混沌原初位面的原住民，他们将散播混乱与加速熵的终结视为自己的使命。最强大的幻蛇是被集体称之为幻蛇领主（protean lords）的半神，然而这些变幻莫测的存在在主物质位面中的信仰往往暧昧不明且藏于暗处。

幻蛇按照一种松散的种姓制度划分自身族群，并掌握着令人眼花缭乱的多样能力。大多数幻蛇拥有蛇形的躯体和原初猛兽的头颅。学者们一直着迷于这个事实——即这些无序分裂的后代为何会有如此多具备共性的特征——因此他们指出，即便在最纯粹的混沌中，也存在着某些秩序的表象。而其他人则注意到蛇形是最为原始的形态之一，这也许是在暗示一个事实，即在时间的起点，此类形态可能是唯一的存在。幻蛇自身对此并没有任何好说的，而讽刺的是，这种态度反而使得人们对其种群的说法缺乏共识并加深了人们的困惑。毕竟，连混沌本身都不能信赖混沌，难道这不才是熵的最纯粹形式么？

eczygEywMNK3dNd7.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

ffXBW5zCqVdRH2Mq.name: 行动自如(恒定法术) Freedom of Movement (Constant)
ffXBW5zCqVdRH2Mq.description: 你驱散可能会阻碍一个生物或者令其移动减慢的效果。当处于该法术效果中时，法术目标忽视会赋予其速度环境减值的效果。当法术目标尝试 @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.SkZAQRkLLkmBQNB9]{逃脱 Escape} 一个令其 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.eIcWbB5o3pP6OIMe]{禁足 Immobilized}, @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.kWc1fhmv9LBiTuei]{擒抱 Grabbed}或 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.VcDeM8A5oI6VqhbM]{束缚 Restrained}的效果时，它自动成功，除非该效果是魔法性的，并且其环级比行动自如更高。

YBc2ftFQZOcgTMZ9.name: 朦胧术(仅限自身) Blur (Self Only)
YBc2ftFQZOcgTMZ9.description: 目标的形态变得模糊不清。它获得 @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.DmAIPqOBomZ7H95W]{隐蔽 Concealed}。由于该效果的原理，目标的位置仍然是显然的，目标不能使用该隐蔽来隐匿（Hide）或者潜行（Sneak）。

UQTsotgAYqaouOS9.name: 侦测阵营(随意施法,仅限守序) Detect Alignment (At Will) (Lawful Only)
UQTsotgAYqaouOS9.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

tGAFUCC4Emx6CfMD.name: 熵力感知(模糊)30尺
tGAFUCC4Emx6CfMD.description: A voidworm能通过对混乱的概率与机运的超自然洞察力来预测到生物的存在。这会赋予它在所列范围内感知生物的能力。身处@Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.EoKBlgf6Smt8opaU]{回避侦测 Nondetection}效果影响，或者其他屏蔽预言和预测的手段可以让生物免于被熵力感知注意到。

GsuMeqU77NP6vTqI.name: 幻蛇体质 Protean Anatomy
GsuMeqU77NP6vTqI.description:
幻蛇的要害器官会不断地变形和改变位置。当幻蛇承受酸、电击、或音波伤害后，它会立即获得抗力数据中所列数值的对应伤害抗力。这会持续1小时或直至幻蛇承受上述伤害类型中的其他种类为止（在这种情况下，幻蛇的抗力会再度变换并与该类型相匹配），以较先发生者为准。除非幻蛇自身是自愿的目标，否则它对变形效果免疫。若陷入@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.XgEqL1kFApUbl5Z2]{目盲 Blinded}或@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{耳聋 Deafened}，幻蛇会在它的下个回合结束时自动恢复，因为新的感受器官已经形成并取代了受损的器官。

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.c6SiBB3mzV8lZUQr]{效果: 幻蛇体质}

IGHgjWHfJlqh674F.name: Change Shape
IGHgjWHfJlqh674F.description:
The voidworm takes on the appearance of a Tiny animal. This doesn't change its Speed or its attack and damage bonuses with its Strikes, but might change the damage type its Strikes deal.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.ChangeShape]

cL0kuYeKKUFMb9w0.name: Confounding Lash
cL0kuYeKKUFMb9w0.description: A creature hit by the voidworm's tail Strike is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 1} for 1 round (@Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.e1XGnhKNSQIm5IXg]{呆滞 Stupefied 2} on a critical hit). A successful @Check[type:will|dc:16] save negates this effect and grants temporary immunity to confounding lash for 1 minute.

Vrock.name: 鹫魔 Vrock
Vrock.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Vrock.publicNotes:
When the gates to the Abyss swing wide, the first demons through are often vrocks, vulture-headed scions of rage who wheel through the air on black wings or dance with the exultation of their fiendish power. Their hatred for mortals is matched only by their desire to inflict suffering through their horrible screech or their devastating dance. Vrocks form from the souls of hateful mortals who are thus given another chance to inflict their rage on the world.

Vrocks often travel in small groups so as to make the best use of their dance of ruin ability, but they rarely appear in groups larger than four. Against small groups and individuals, they swoop down without fear, hoping to play with their prey before going for the kill. Against formidable foes, they are just as happy to fly above, using their dance of ruin to cast a storm of lightning down on them.

当一个有罪之人的灵魂受到审判并被送至无底深渊时，它会成为致命的魔族——恶魔。恶魔是罪恶的化身，从一般的罪恶例如愤怒、暴食，到更“特别”的堕落，例如对酷刑的痴迷或对祖国的背叛。恶魔一经诞生，它们便被双重目的驱动：其一是不断积累力量变得更强，其二是腐化凡人的灵魂让其被罪恶玷污。通过这种方式恶魔保证了有源源不断的新恶魔来支持它们在深渊中不断扩张的军队。

eqiwUtaFLOTC1oND.name: 神术内在法术 Divine Innate Spells

Eis3bEsqm4vb29Uc.name: 次元门(随意施法) Dimension Door (At Will)
Eis3bEsqm4vb29Uc.description:
你通过开启一扇绕过通常空间的门，将自身以及任何你穿戴和持握的物品从你当前所在的空间立刻传送到你能看见的范围内的开阔空间。如果此时另一个生物会与你随行—即使你使用异次元存储空间—你会失去该法术。

升阶 (5环级) 该射程增加到1英里。你无须看见你的目标，只要你曾经去过那里，并且了解其与你的相对位置和距离。你会暂时免疫1小时。

FUwL7sL45SGQB0N6.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity
FUwL7sL45SGQB0N6.description:
If the vrock is flying and a creature triggers an attack of opportunity, the vrock can make 2 Strikes with its talons against that creature instead of 1 Strike.

@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.AttackOfOpportunity]

6h9jexgK3OdaDWsq.name: Peace Vulnerability
6h9jexgK3OdaDWsq.description: A vrock's wrath is the heart of their essence, and forcing peace upon them wrenches at their soul. If they fail a save against @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.b515AZlB0sridKSq]{安定心神 Calm Emotions} or a similar effect forcing them to be peaceful, a vrock takes [[/r {4d6}[mental]]]{4d6心灵伤害}.

pSi2yAlBjhVTBwq8.name: Dance of Ruin
pSi2yAlBjhVTBwq8.description:
The vrock dances in flight and chants to create a ruinous explosion of electricity. If more vrocks within 30 feet want to join the dance, the vrock can delay the dance to wait for more vrocks; in that case, the effect occurs after the last vrock uses Dance of Ruin or one of the vrocks chooses to complete that round of the dance. Each non-demon creature in a @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] from any of the dancing vrocks takes [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]]{2d12电击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免). For each additional vrock that joins the dance, the damage increases by 1d12 and the save DC increases by 1 (to a maximum of four vrocks dealing 5d12 electricity damage with a DC 31豁免). The vrocks can continue dancing by using Dance of Ruin each round, for up to 3 rounds in total. The emanation's size increases by 20 feet each round, and the damage increases by 1d12 per vrock each round.

  • 1 Vrock Dancing
    Round Effect
    1 @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]]{2d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]
    2 @Template[type:emanation|distance:40] [[/r {3d12}[electricity]]]{3d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]
    3 @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] [[/r {4d12}[electricity]]]{4d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]
  • 2 Vrocks Dancing
    Round Effect
    1 @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] [[/r {3d12}[electricity]]]{3d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]
    2 @Template[type:emanation|distance:40] [[/r {5d12}[electricity]]]{5d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]
    3 @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] [[/r {7d12}[electricity]]]{7d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:29|basic:true]
  • 3 Vrocks Dancing
    Round Effect
    1 @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] [[/r {4d12}[electricity]]]{4d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true]
    2 @Template[type:emanation|distance:40] [[/r {7d12}[electricity]]]{7d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true]
    3 @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] [[/r {10d12}[electricity]]]{10d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:30|basic:true]
  • 4 Vrocks Dancing
    Round Effect
    1 @Template[type:emanation|distance:20] [[/r {5d12}[electricity]]]{5d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:31|basic:true]
    2 @Template[type:emanation|distance:40] [[/r {9d12}[electricity]]]{9d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:31|basic:true]
    3 @Template[type:emanation|distance:60] [[/r {13d12}[electricity]]]{13d12电击伤害} @Check[type:reflex|dc:31|basic:true]

rCo3WVukDgsbPhLD.name: Spore Cloud
rCo3WVukDgsbPhLD.description:
The vrock emits a cloud of spores from their body, dealing [[/r {2d8}[poison]]]{2d8毒素伤害} to all adjacent creatures. Each creature damaged this way must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28|traits:damaging-effect] save or take [[/r {2d8}[persistent,piercing]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.lDVqvLKA6eF3Df60]{持续穿刺伤害} as the spores penetrate its skin and grow into thick, green vines. The vines cease growing after 10 rounds, and they wither away in [[/br 1d4 #Spore Cloud Duration]]{1d4天} if not shaved off before then. The vines can be destroyed if the creature is affected by a good spell or if @Compendium[pf2e.equipment-srd.z9T4c1hXwOotsMCp]{Holy Water} is applied to the vines (with an Interact action).

Once the vrock uses Spore Cloud, the ability can't be used for [[/br 1d6 #Recharge Spore Cloud]]{1d6轮}.

nLB0CpyqlvJpfjnr.name: Stunning Screech
nLB0CpyqlvJpfjnr.description:
频率 每分钟一次

效果 The vrock emits a shrill screech. Each non-demon creature within a @Template[type:burst|distance:30] must attempt a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:28] save. On a failure, the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 2}, and on a critical failure, it's @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.dfCMdR4wnpbYNTix]{震慑 Stunned 3}.

Young Black Dragon.name: 青年黑龙 Young Black Dragon
Young Black Dragon.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60尺
Young Black Dragon.publicNotes:
身为君临于沼地的暴君，黑龙以它们炽热的激情震慑着属于它们的国度。依靠着迅雷般的掠袭和恶毒的诡计，这些以施虐为乐的暴君自幽暗的洞窟或是沼泽的孤岛之中统治着属于它们的腐臭王国。它们对于其他生物的憎恶就像它们吐息的酸液那般强烈，除非是为了交配或是暂时合作来消灭共同的敌人，它们甚至无法容忍其他的龙类出现在它们的王国之中。

黑龙是两栖生物，它们既能够呼吸空气，也能够使用鳃在水下呼吸。它们表皮上褶皱起的鳍状物使它们成为了游泳健将，得以适应湿地环境和被水淹没的巢穴。它们免疫那些由它们自己腐败之水的魔法能力所产生的臭水。

黑龙的巢穴就和它们的灵魂一样污秽。腐烂的肉块散落一地，掠夺而来的宝物躺在粪便之中，纠葛的树根和藤蔓上滴落着阴湿洞穴中独有的粘液。这种地方往往遍布着蛇虫和粘液。虽然它们会尽可能地占据天然的洞窟，不过也能勉为其难地将沼泽中那扭曲的植被最为稠密的区域作为自己的巢穴。由于那些贵重却柔软的物品往往无法从黑龙的强酸中幸存下来，它们的财宝主要都由宝石和昂贵的玻璃制品组成。

从强大无比的位面龙到奇幻诡谲的灵域龙，尽管这世上龙的种类多种多样，却少有一类龙能够像彩色龙那样广为人知却又令人恐惧。爪抓、齿咬、吐息，即使鳞片的颜色各不相同，每种彩色龙都会以其独有的风格散布它们各自的暴虐。与大部分的生物不同，龙只会随着年龄的增长而变得愈发强大。对财宝的贪婪，对食物的饥渴，对鲜血的渴望，对权势的欲望，这些都是属于它们的传说。拥有着无可匹敌的强韧肉身，这些龙类大多道德败坏，并且常常扮演者犯罪黑幕、邪恶暴君或是贪婪掠夺者的角色。

2vzPRuTJZNWARxiC.name: 尾扫 Tail Lash
2vzPRuTJZNWARxiC.description:
触发 一个位于龙的尾击触及范围内的生物将使用一个动作进行打击或者尝试一次技能检定

效果 龙使用它的尾击打击触发的生物，它在此次打击中需承受-2罚值。如果命中，则该生物在触发效果的投掷中承受-2环境罚值。

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.QqC9xymSXSVunDgl]{效果: 尾扫(攻击检定)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.4HJJdogS751Z04lD]{效果: 尾扫(技能检定)}

yYFISOz912MYdEDd.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
yYFISOz912MYdEDd.description:
The dragon breathes a spray of acid that deals [[/r {8d6}[acid]]]{8d6酸液伤害} in a @Template[type:line|distance:60]{60尺线形} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true]豁免).

它在经过[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}之前无法再次使用吐息。

0FCCLjtCWvBlUoFA.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
0FCCLjtCWvBlUoFA.description: 龙以任意顺序进行两次爪抓打击和一次角抵打击。

76JTH3gizL3NZAYl.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
76JTH3gizL3NZAYl.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。.

Young Bronze Dragon.name: 青年青铜龙 Young Bronze Dragon
Young Bronze Dragon.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Young Bronze Dragon.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60尺
Young Bronze Dragon.publicNotes:
青铜龙是最常见的金属龙之一，也是最有可能在有价值的任务中与凡人结盟的龙。可惜他们是天生的学者，宁可待在自己的窝里钻研深奥的学识，也不愿去野外冒险。这些超然而克己的龙也扮演着守护者的角色，保卫着远古学识的宝库免遭毁灭与腐化。青铜龙富有原则性与保护欲，当他们的银龙同胞们迫不及待地为正义而战时，青铜龙更喜欢找一个值得他们守卫的重要地点，保护其不受攻击与入侵。

青铜龙对水的掌控与对电的亲和意味着他们是陷入雷暴雨中的水手们的福音。而青铜龙的敌人则会很快地发现无论是乌云密布的天空还是波涛汹涌的大海都无法为他们在怒火之中提供些微庇护。

青铜龙沿着海岸线筑巢，通常是在部分被海水淹没的海蚀洞穴之中。虽然所有龙类都会收集宝藏，但是青铜龙的藏宝库更像是一座巨大的图书馆——当然，这些书架都被小心翼翼地安放在水位线之上。出了喜欢收集深奥的学识之外，青铜龙还收藏着与海洋有关的珍宝，例如美丽的贝壳、无暇的珍珠、嵌有珍珠母和石决明的装备。

身为美德、高贵和优雅的典范，仁爱的具现，金属龙因其堪比诸神的力量与威严而被人类奉为堪比神祇的神话之物。几乎无人得以亲见一条活生生的金属龙，然而他们介入人类生活——而后离去——的故事却总是广为流传。他们因为其鳞片与类人生物们在商业、战争和工业中所用到的那些闪闪发亮的金属类似，这些庞然大物的兴趣和能力各不相同，不过貌似都不介意将他们与这些世俗的材料联系在一起。毕竟，金币之于金龙就如滴水之于大海，尽管一瞥之间仿若相似，然而后者的本源与存在上的宏达都完全碾压了前者。

除了金属龙以及与之相对应的彩色龙，其他类型的龙族也同样漫步在这个世界以及其他的多元宇宙中。在星球另一边的传说大陆天夏上居住着帝龙，体态与蛇相似的他们保护着宇宙的平衡，守卫着他们那古老的家园。在主物质界之外，诸如盛气凌人的洋龙或是隐遁避世的云龙塑造了元素位面中的种种自然活动。肯定还有着无数不同类型的龙类存在，他们有的存在于那些遥远的位面中，甚至据说还有着能够在星际间翱翔的原初之龙。

IWJbZROV26XdSO2U.name: 奥术内在法术 Arcane Innate Spells

JVw9Lbq6vKp5vmAb.name: 动物交谈(恒定法术) Speak with Animals (Constant)
JVw9Lbq6vKp5vmAb.description: 你可以对动物提出问题，从动物获得回答，以对动物及使用交涉（Diplomacy）技能。该法术不会令动物比正常更为友好。聪明的动物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

fZx0EfFDzx8aK7tG.name: 借机攻击 Attack of Opportunity

fchD9qieGM9L8Vag.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
fchD9qieGM9L8Vag.description:
青铜龙从两种方式中选择一种吐息。

它在经过[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}之前无法再次使用吐息。

  • 闪电 Lightning The dragon breathes lightning in a @Template[type:line|distance:60|traits:arcane,electricity,evocation,damaging-effect]{60尺线形} that deals [[/r {6d12}[electricity]]]{6d12电击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免).
  • 驱人气体 Repulsion Gas The dragon breathes a @Template[type:line|distance:60|traits:arcane,abjuration,incapacitation,mental]{60尺线形} of repulsive gas. Each creature in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing} from the dragon for 1 round (or 2 rounds on a critical failure).

TpHVJUZhgcIfmmBv.name: 龙之狂怒 Draconic Frenzy
TpHVJUZhgcIfmmBv.description: 龙以任意顺序进行两次爪抓打击和一次尾击打击。

zOzr7HCfJlCH6I7z.name: 龙之威势 Draconic Momentum
zOzr7HCfJlCH6I7z.description: 当龙在一次打击中造成重击时，它立刻为吐息充能。

PMBSc3Ypq9HMYeKR.name: 水之主 Water Mastery
PMBSc3Ypq9HMYeKR.description: For up to 30 minutes per day, the dragon, along with allied creatures and vessels within 50 feet, can move at double their normal Speed in water.

Young Gold Dragon.name: 青年金龙 Young Gold Dragon
Young Gold Dragon.allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Young Gold Dragon.senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60尺
Young Gold Dragon.publicNotes:
拥有着无可匹敌的力量与智慧，金龙正可谓是金属龙中的金属龙。其他的金属龙坚定地崇敬着金龙们，将他们视为自己的领袖和导师。金龙的原始力量甚至能够与红龙相匹敌，这让他们的红龙表亲异常恼怒，也使得这两个种族常常将彼此视为死敌。尽管有着非凡的力量，然而比起使用蛮力，金龙却更喜欢通过交流和对话来解决问题。由于他们的长寿，金龙对所有事物都有着广阔的眼界，并且只有在对所有的情况和结果进行了深思熟虑之后才会付诸于行动。因此，金龙愿意与任何寻觅他们的生物交谈，甚至包括邪恶的彩色龙。考虑到彩色龙和金属龙之间那漫长的战争，凡人可能会对这种行为感到疑惑，然而龙族却清晰的明白在绝望的局势下有时候恰恰就需要这种极端的联盟。尽管金龙会考虑与他们的彩色龙表亲暂时休战以面对可能导致世界末日的威胁，但他们也清楚这样的联盟会在何时走到尽头。

当另一条金属龙面临超越了他自身能力的困境或敌人时，向永远明智且光荣正直的金龙寻求建议往往是他最好的选择。然而金龙却是出了名的避世，要找到这些传说中的生物绝非易事。他们超凡的才智使得他们喜欢隐居在避世之所思考生命中最重大的问题，努力为世界上最紧迫的问题寻求解决之道。因此，金龙时常会在金属龙的集会中缺席，或是在寻求他们意见的审判中消失。那些性急的龙有时会对金龙这种显而易见的不靠谱感到不快，不过这些风言风语往往源自于他们的嫉妒，而非真正的批判；因为他们心里也非常清楚，面对真正重要的事情，没有金龙会故意置身事外。

金龙超凡的远见和无与伦比的智慧使得他们不太可能干预个人事务，因此那些能够引起金龙注意的人可谓是凤毛麟角的天运之人，能够听取整个宇宙中都屈指可数的谨慎周全的建议。统治者和位于权利巅峰的人更容易获得金龙的帮助；多亏了一条金龙在最后时刻的斡旋，才避免了全面战争的爆发。

金龙通常会出现在温带和热带草原上，在那里他们可以在飞行时保持长时间的冥想而不会受到敌人的打扰。他们往往会睡在偏远、贫瘠、空旷的地方，或是在隐秘坚固的场所筑巢，诸如被遗忘的天坑和迷宫般的洞窟。金龙可能会招募值得信赖的仆从和盟友来守卫他们的巢穴，不过更多的真正孑然一身的金龙更喜欢用非致命的陷阱以及魔法守卫来保护他们的巢穴。

身为美德、高贵和优雅的典范，仁爱的具现，金属龙因其堪比诸神的力量与威严而被人类奉为堪比神祇的神话之物。几乎无人得以亲见一条活生生的金属龙，然而他们介入人类生活——而后离去——的故事却总是广为流传。他们因为其鳞片与类人生物们在商业、战争和工业中所用到的那些闪闪发亮的金属类似，这些庞然大物的兴趣和能力各不相同，不过貌似都不介意将他们与这些世俗的材料联系在一起。毕竟，金币之于金龙就如滴水之于大海，尽管一瞥之间仿若相似，然而后者的本源与存在上的宏达都完全碾压了前者。 除了金属龙以及与之相对应的彩色龙，其他类型的龙族也同样漫步在这个世界以及其他的多元宇宙中。在星球另一边的传说大陆天夏上居住着帝龙，体态与蛇相似的他们保护着宇宙的平衡，守卫着他们那古老的家园。在主物质界之外，诸如盛气凌人的洋龙或是隐遁避世的云龙塑造了元素位面中的种种自然活动。肯定还有着无数不同类型的龙类存在，他们有的存在于那些遥远的位面中，甚至据说还有着能够在星际间翱翔的原初之龙。

erqQJ4VimGjwkftc.name: 奥术内在法术 Arcane Innate Spells

KuKxJ2Kk7PAZFs0r.name: 定位术(仅限宝石) Locate (Gems Only)
KuKxJ2Kk7PAZFs0r.description:
你了解目标的方位（如果你选择一个特定物品，例如 "我母亲的剑") 或者最近的目标（如果你选择一类物品，例如 "剑")。如果目标是特定物体，你必须曾经通过你自身的感官观察过它。如果是一类物体，你仍然需要有该类物体的精确内心印象。如果你和目标之间有铅或者流动的水，该法术无法定位该物体。这意味着你可能找一类物体时，因为最近的那个在铅或者流动的水后面，而获得较远的结果。

升阶 (5环级) 你能以一个特定生物或者族裔为目标，而不是物体。但你必须遇见过或者近距看过你想要作为目标的生物或者族裔。

RMvjozPBvuaFNpnM.name: 侦测阵营(仅限邪恶) Detect Alignment (Evil Only)
RMvjozPBvuaFNpnM.description:
当你感受到阵营灵光时，视野中会闪动光芒。选择混乱，邪恶，善良或者秩序。你侦测该阵营的灵光。你不会获得存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择不侦测你知晓已经有该阵营的生物或者效果。

只有6或者更高等级的生物具有阵营灵光——除非是神术施法者，不死生物，或者外层位面（Outer Sphere的存在）。

升阶 (2环级) 你能了解到各个灵光的位置和强度。

  • 烈焰 Flame The dragon breathes a blast of flame in a @Template[type:cone|distance:30|traits:arcane,evocation,fire,damaging-effect] that deals [[/r {11d6}[fire]]]{11d6火焰伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:31|basic:true]豁免).

Each creature within a @Template[type:cone|distance:30|traits:arcane,necromancy] must succeed at a @Check[type:fortitude|dc:31] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 1} for 1 minute (or @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.MIRkyAjyBeXivMa7]{力竭 Enfeebled 2} on a critical failure).

Young Black Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 青年黑龙施法者 Young Black Dragon (Spellcaster)
Young Black Dragon (Spellcaster).senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60尺
Young Black Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
身为君临于沼地的暴君，黑龙以它们炽热的激情震慑着属于它们的国度。依靠着迅雷般的掠袭和恶毒的诡计，这些以施虐为乐的暴君自幽暗的洞窟或是沼泽的孤岛之中统治着属于它们的腐臭王国。它们对于其他生物的憎恶就像它们吐息的酸液那般强烈，除非是为了交配或是暂时合作来消灭共同的敌人，它们甚至无法容忍其他的龙类出现在它们的王国之中。

黑龙是两栖生物，它们既能够呼吸空气，也能够使用鳃在水下呼吸。它们表皮上褶皱起的鳍状物使它们成为了游泳健将，得以适应湿地环境和被水淹没的巢穴。它们免疫那些由它们自己腐败之水的魔法能力所产生的臭水。

黑龙的巢穴就和它们的灵魂一样污秽。腐烂的肉块散落一地，掠夺而来的宝物躺在粪便之中，纠葛的树根和藤蔓上滴落着阴湿洞穴中独有的粘液。这种地方往往遍布着蛇虫和粘液。虽然它们会尽可能地占据天然的洞窟，不过也能勉为其难地将沼泽中那扭曲的植被最为稠密的区域作为自己的巢穴。由于那些贵重却柔软的物品往往无法从黑龙的强酸中幸存下来，它们的财宝主要都由宝石和昂贵的玻璃制品组成。

从强大无比的位面龙到奇幻诡谲的灵域龙，尽管这世上龙的种类多种多样，却少有一类龙能够像彩色龙那样广为人知却又令人恐惧。爪抓、齿咬、吐息，即使鳞片的颜色各不相同，每种彩色龙都会以其独有的风格散布它们各自的暴虐。与大部分的生物不同，龙只会随着年龄的增长而变得愈发强大。对财宝的贪婪，对食物的饥渴，对鲜血的渴望，对权势的欲望，这些都是属于它们的传说。拥有着无可匹敌的强韧肉身，这些龙类大多道德败坏，并且常常扮演者犯罪黑幕、邪恶暴君或是贪婪掠夺者的角色。

4ysvHeALdBNPXE0e.name: 奥术准备法术 Arcane Prepared Spells

vRDFgDc50KBQBtK9.name: 侦测魔法 Detect Magic
vRDFgDc50KBQBtK9.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

2vzPRuTJZNWARxiC.name: 尾扫 Tail Lash
2vzPRuTJZNWARxiC.description:
触发 一个位于龙的尾击触及范围内的生物将使用一个动作进行打击或者尝试一次技能检定

效果 龙使用它的尾击打击触发的生物，它在此次打击中需承受-2罚值。如果命中，则该生物在触发效果的投掷中承受-2环境罚值。

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.QqC9xymSXSVunDgl]{效果: 尾扫(攻击检定)}

@Compendium[pf2e.bestiary-effects.4HJJdogS751Z04lD]{效果: 尾扫(技能检定)}

yYFISOz912MYdEDd.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
yYFISOz912MYdEDd.description:
The dragon breathes a spray of acid that deals [[/r {8d6}[acid]]]{8d6酸液伤害} in a @Template[type:line|distance:60]{60尺线形} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:25|basic:true]豁免).

它在经过[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}之前无法再次使用吐息。

Young Bronze Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 青年青铜龙施法者 Young Bronze Dragon (Spellcaster)
Young Bronze Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
青铜龙是最常见的金属龙之一，也是最有可能在有价值的任务中与凡人结盟的龙。可惜他们是天生的学者，宁可待在自己的窝里钻研深奥的学识，也不愿去野外冒险。这些超然而克己的龙也扮演着守护者的角色，保卫着远古学识的宝库免遭毁灭与腐化。青铜龙富有原则性与保护欲，当他们的银龙同胞们迫不及待地为正义而战时，青铜龙更喜欢找一个值得他们守卫的重要地点，保护其不受攻击与入侵。

青铜龙对水的掌控与对电的亲和意味着他们是陷入雷暴雨中的水手们的福音。而青铜龙的敌人则会很快地发现无论是乌云密布的天空还是波涛汹涌的大海都无法为他们在怒火之中提供些微庇护。

青铜龙沿着海岸线筑巢，通常是在部分被海水淹没的海蚀洞穴之中。虽然所有龙类都会收集宝藏，但是青铜龙的藏宝库更像是一座巨大的图书馆——当然，这些书架都被小心翼翼地安放在水位线之上。出了喜欢收集深奥的学识之外，青铜龙还收藏着与海洋有关的珍宝，例如美丽的贝壳、无暇的珍珠、嵌有珍珠母和石决明的装备。

身为美德、高贵和优雅的典范，仁爱的具现，金属龙因其堪比诸神的力量与威严而被人类奉为堪比神祇的神话之物。几乎无人得以亲见一条活生生的金属龙，然而他们介入人类生活——而后离去——的故事却总是广为流传。他们因为其鳞片与类人生物们在商业、战争和工业中所用到的那些闪闪发亮的金属类似，这些庞然大物的兴趣和能力各不相同，不过貌似都不介意将他们与这些世俗的材料联系在一起。毕竟，金币之于金龙就如滴水之于大海，尽管一瞥之间仿若相似，然而后者的本源与存在上的宏达都完全碾压了前者。

除了金属龙以及与之相对应的彩色龙，其他类型的龙族也同样漫步在这个世界以及其他的多元宇宙中。在星球另一边的传说大陆天夏上居住着帝龙，体态与蛇相似的他们保护着宇宙的平衡，守卫着他们那古老的家园。在主物质界之外，诸如盛气凌人的洋龙或是隐遁避世的云龙塑造了元素位面中的种种自然活动。肯定还有着无数不同类型的龙类存在，他们有的存在于那些遥远的位面中，甚至据说还有着能够在星际间翱翔的原初之龙。
Young Bronze Dragon (Spellcaster).allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Young Bronze Dragon (Spellcaster).senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60尺

IWJbZROV26XdSO2U.name: 奥术内在法术 Arcane Innate Spells

JVw9Lbq6vKp5vmAb.name: 动物交谈(恒定法术) Speak with Animals (Constant)
JVw9Lbq6vKp5vmAb.description: 你可以对动物提出问题，从动物获得回答，以对动物及使用交涉（Diplomacy）技能。该法术不会令动物比正常更为友好。聪明的动物喜欢简要直说或者避而不谈，不那么聪明的则通常会做出傻瓜式的回复。

gNneRwWjDoNQSgfZ.description:
你发出一股标记魔法存在的脉冲。你不会获得魔法存在或不存在以外的任何信息。你可以选择忽略你完全知晓的魔法，例如你或者你盟友的魔法物品以及持续法术。

仅当幻术魔法的环级低于你的侦测魔法环级时，你才能侦测幻术魔法。但是，具有幻术灵光但是没有在外表上做伪装的物品（例如一瓶隐形术药水），通常能够正常侦测。

升阶 (3环级) 你会了解法术侦测区域中最高环级的效果的学派。如果有相同强度的多个效果，GM决定你了解的为哪一个。

升阶 (4环级) 如3环级，你也能指出最高环级魔法的来源。如同一种模糊感官（imprecise sense），你不会了解具体的位置，但是可以将来源锁定到5尺立方（或者最近的那个五尺立方，如果来源体积比这个区域更大）。

fchD9qieGM9L8Vag.name: 吐息 Breath Weapon
fchD9qieGM9L8Vag.description:
青铜龙从两种方式中选择一种吐息。

它在经过[[/br 1d4 #Recharge Breath Weapon]]{1d4轮}之前无法再次使用吐息。

  • 闪电 Lightning The dragon breathes lightning in a @Template[type:line|distance:60|traits:arcane,electricity,evocation,damaging-effect]{60尺线形} that deals [[/r {6d12}[electricity]]]{6d12电击伤害} (@Check[type:reflex|dc:28|basic:true]豁免).
  • 驱人气体 Repulsion Gas The dragon breathes a @Template[type:line|distance:60|traits:arcane,abjuration,incapacitation,mental]{60尺线形} of repulsive gas. Each creature in the area must succeed at a @Check[type:will|dc:28] save or become @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.sDPxOjQ9kx2RZE8D]{逃跑 Fleeing} from the dragon for 1 round (or 2 rounds on a critical failure).

PMBSc3Ypq9HMYeKR.name: 水之主 Water Mastery
PMBSc3Ypq9HMYeKR.description: For up to 30 minutes per day, the dragon, along with allied creatures and vessels within 50 feet, can move at double their normal Speed in water.

Young Copper Dragon (Spellcaster).name: 青年赤铜龙施法者 Young Copper Dragon (Spellcaster)
Young Copper Dragon (Spellcaster).allSaves: 对抗魔法全豁免获得+1状态加值
Young Copper Dragon (Spellcaster).senses: 黑暗视觉, 灵敏嗅觉(模糊感官) 60尺
Young Copper Dragon (Spellcaster).publicNotes:
作为金属龙中最为狡黠的一员，赤铜龙总是随心所欲，笑口常开，不过这从来都不会妨碍他们在受压迫的土地上实行传播自由的天命。赤铜龙是享乐主义者，即使小小的快乐也能使他们感到满足。但是他们也保持着与其他生物的同理心，不会急于做出判断，总是尽可能地从多个角度仔细审视一个问题。然而，这一哲理也尤其缺陷，这使得赤铜龙非常容易受到负面影响，并且倾向于原谅他们彩色龙同胞或是其他残忍生物们所犯下的不太严重的邪恶行径。然而一旦被激怒，赤铜龙就很难再保持住他们的好脾气了。

赤铜龙喜欢在温暖的山岭上筑巢，而且由于天性使然，他们每隔几年就会换一个新家。他们有时会和其他人——尤其是那些住在附近的矮人们——住在一起。一些赤铜龙甚至会崇拜通常只有类人生物才会崇拜的善良神祇。而其中又以凯登·凯连最受这些巨龙欢迎，因为他对于自由的热爱和对酒精的沉醉简直正中了大多数赤铜龙的心房。

赤铜龙的战斗策略就和他的幽默感一样离经叛道，他们更有可能使用嘲弄和诡计而非直接的力量来赢得战斗。随着年龄的增长，一条赤铜龙的完美笑话甚至能让它的敌人大笑到再起不能。

身为美德、高贵和优雅的典范，仁爱的具现，金属龙因其堪比诸神的力量与威严而被人类奉为堪比神祇的神话之物。几乎无人得以亲见一条活生生的金属龙，然而他们介入人类生活——而后离去——的故事却总是广为流传。他们因为其鳞片与类人生物们在商业、战争和工业中所用到的那些闪闪发亮的金属类似，这些庞然大物的兴趣和能力各不相同，不过貌似都不介意将他们与这些世俗的材料联系在一起。毕竟，金币之于金龙就如滴水之于大海，尽管一瞥之间仿若相似，然而后者的本源与存在上的宏达都完全碾压了前者。

除了金属龙以及与之相对应的彩色龙，其他类型的龙族也同样漫步在这个世界以及其他的多元宇宙中。在星球另一边的传说大陆天夏上居住着帝龙，体态与蛇相似的他们保护着宇宙的平衡，守卫着他们那古老的家园。在主物质界之外，诸如盛气凌人的洋龙或是隐遁避世的云龙塑造了元素位面中的种种自然活动。肯定还有着无数不同类型的龙类存在，他们有的存在于那些遥远的位面中，甚至据说还有着能够在星际间翱翔的原初之龙。
